column13: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#36820#36820#TD4036E.TXT.r_2955;TD4036E.TXT.r_2956# lag pa dang  rkang pa dang  mgo dang  sha dang  khrag dang  zhag la sogs pa gang la  byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par snang ba sbyin par byed pa de yang / / +sems can du bgrang ba'i sbyin pa yin te / /
column14: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1888623#1888624#TD4054E.TXT.r_7962;TD4054E.TXT.r_7963# ji srid du mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa dang po'o zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o // / +de  la ji ltar na gzugs can zhes brjod pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas / /

column17: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#1160590#1160590#TD4069E.TXT.r_3373# dus su chos mnyan par bya ba dang  bkur sti dang nyan par gus pa dang  ma rangs pa med pa dang  bsgo ba bzhin byed pa dang  klan ka mi tshol ba dang  chos la gus    pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  gang zag chos smra ba la gus pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  chos la brnyas pa med pa nyid dang  gang zag chos smra ba la brnyas pa med pa nyid dang  bdag nyid la brnyas pa med pa nyid dang  kun du shes par bya ba'i sems dang  sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang  rna blags pa dang  sems kun du btud pa dang  sems thams cad kyis bsams nas chos mnyan par bya ste / /
column18: 0.020#TD4079E.TXT.r#1368000#1368001#TD4079E.TXT.r_33;TD4079E.TXT.r_34# thub pa rnams kyi sras po de ni dpa' bo yin snyam byed // / +go 'phang de nyid myur du bde ba ster bar byed pa'i sngags // /

column4: 0.0#TD4011E.TXT.r#641969#641973#TD4011E.TXT.r_527# smyon pa bzhin du gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang   grong nas grong dang  srang nas srang du rgyu zhing skye bo thams cad kyi mdun du bdag bcom mo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#681692#681696#TD4043E.TXT.r_2557# rang gi sa bon ni snga na yod PA STE ZHES BYA BA ni sa bon ni 'bras bu bas snga ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.009#TD4036E.TXT.r#37325#37327#TD4036E.TXT.r_3001# sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i phyir sbyin par byed pa dang  'di lta ste phan 'dogs  pa rnams la byas pa gzo ba'i phyir sbyin par byed pa dang  'di lta ste / /
column7: 0.009#TD4037E.TXT.r#2399426#2399427#TD4037E.TXT.r_1276# gal te gzugs la sogs par ming du btags pa'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming rnam par mi 'jog na ni / /
column8: 0.009#TD4047E.TXT.r#2149232#2149233#TD4047E.TXT.r_9028# bsam gtan la brten nas de'i stobs kyis sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don bdag gi lus sprul pa dus gcig tu spros pas sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang  phan pa byas pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i phyir du byed pa dang  'jigs pa  rnams las srung ba dang  sdug bsngal bar gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan sel ba dang  skrag par byed pa'i bar du'o // /
column9: 0.009#TD4099E.TXT.r#210906#210908#TD4099E.TXT.r_1497;TD4099E.TXT.r_1498# tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad cing // /
column10: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#36513#36513#TD4036E.TXT.r_2937# yo byad med pa rnams dang  bkren pa rnams dang  sdug phongs pa rnams dang  lam du zhugs pa rnams dang  slong mo pa rnams dang  long ba rnams dang  'on pa rnams dang  mgon  med pa rnams dang  rten med pa rnams dang  gzhan yang gang dag de lta bu dang mthun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba rnams zhes bya'o // /

column12: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#288653#288653#TD4035E.TXT.r_5157;TD4035E.TXT.r_5158# 'dug la dge ba ni lan cig kyang mi byed pa lta bu'o // / +de la mi mthun pa'i phyogs sel ba ni / /

column14: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#36477#36478#TD4036E.TXT.r_2937# yo byad med pa rnams dang  bkren pa rnams dang  sdug phongs pa rnams dang  lam du zhugs pa rnams dang  slong mo pa rnams dang  long ba rnams dang  'on pa rnams dang  mgon  med pa rnams dang  rten med pa rnams dang  gzhan yang gang dag de lta bu dang mthun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba rnams zhes bya'o // /
column15: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#36595#36596#TD4036E.TXT.r_2940# pha dang  ma dang  snun par byed pa dang  gso bar byed pa dang  skyed par  byed pa dang  'brog dgon pa dang  mu ge dang  pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang  bcings pa dang  nad kyi 'jigs pa las sgrol bar byed pa rnams dang  de la phan pa ston pa rnams dang  bde ba ston pa rnams dang  phan pa dang bde ba nye bar sgrub pa rnams dang   rtsod pa byung ngo cog la grogs byed pa rnams dang  lhan cig dga' ba rnams dang  lhan cig mya ngan byed pa rnams dang  de nyam thag par gyur ba'i tshe yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang  gzhan yang gang dag de lta bu dang mthun pa de dag ni phan 'dogs pa rnams zhes bya'o // /
column16: 0.021#TD4051E.TXT.r#2265595#2265596#TD4051E.TXT.r_2452# bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni sbyin pa dang  snyan par smra ba dang  don spyod pa dang  don mthun pa'o // /

column18: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#36820#36820#TD4036E.TXT.r_2955;TD4036E.TXT.r_2956# lag pa dang  rkang pa dang  mgo dang  sha dang  khrag dang  zhag la sogs pa gang la  byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par snang ba sbyin par byed pa de yang / / +sems can du bgrang ba'i sbyin pa yin te / /

'o na zhes bya'i sgrib pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig / /

column10: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2533680#2533681#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_78# slob dpon gyis ni dngos su dgos pa yin pa'i phyir che ba'i bdag nyid shes pa gcig pu dgos par bshad kyi de las gzhan pa dag ni dpag par nus pas ma bshad do // /

column14: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#33549#33549#TD4036E.TXT.r_2671# shes  nas dad pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gsungs pa gang yin pa dag yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung nas / /
column15: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#45061#45061#TD4036E.TXT.r_3727;TD4036E.TXT.r_3728# rnal 'byor ba de brtag par bya ba shes  bya'i dngos PO'I RANG BZHIN DE LA yang dag par rtog par byed pa na / / +yon tan dang skyon nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni / /

column19: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2603091#2603091#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4425# gang zhig gang na ches gsal zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par  'byung ba ni sa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rdzas gang zhig 'dus pa gang la ches gsal zhing mngon pa yin no // /

column22: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#153656#153656#TD4095E.TXT.r_3919;TD4095E.TXT.r_3920# bsam gtan khyad par can dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can du  skyes pa ma gtogs so // / +gzugs med par skyes pa rnams la yang ldan pa kho na'i sgo nas yod do // /
column23: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#14234#14235#TD4036E.TXT.r_1038;TD4036E.TXT.r_1039# me tog gi spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis bskyod pa las phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su spos kyi ngad yid du 'ong ba dag ldang ba bzhin du / / +phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dge ba snyan pa bsngags pa grags pa'i sgra sna tshogs grags par 'gyur bas na de'i phyir tshul khrims ni spos kyi rnam pa'i sgrar yang gsungs so // /
column24: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#2812#2812#TD4036E.TXT.r_71;TD4036E.TXT.r_72# smras pa / / +'di ltar dbus kyi mi rnams su skyes pa'i bar du rgyas par gyur kyang mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang ldan par gyur nas sbyin pa med do zhes bya ba nas 'di las srid gzhan mi shes so // /
column25: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1123923#1123923#TD4069E.TXT.r_606;TD4069E.TXT.r_607# rang bzhin dang  dus kyi khyad par gnyis kyis zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyis shin tu gzhon pa nyid rdzogs par bshad pa'i phyir ro // / +dus kyi khyad par gyis kyang shin tu gzhon pa nyid rdzogs par bshad pa'i phyir ro // /
column26: 0.027#TD4067E.TXT.r#1981548#1981548#TD4067E.TXT.r_615;TD4067E.TXT.r_616# mi rtag pa nyid dang  sdug bsngal ba nyid dang  stong pa nyid dang  bdag med pa nyid do // / +de la gang sems  rtse gcig pa ni rnam par mi gyeng ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column27: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2187502#2187502#TD4047E.TXT.r_12044;TD4047E.TXT.r_12045# rab tu 'byung ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / +de'i rjes la phyogs bstan to // /
column28: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2151853#2151854#TD4047E.TXT.r_9238# rab tu gnas pa ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i gnas bzhi la chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pas gnas par mi byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column29: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1334499#1334499#TD4091E.TXT.r_8137# chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de nyid la goms pa las rim gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dro bar gyur pa zhes bya pa skye'o // /
column30: 0.027#TD4061E.TXT.r#2783565#2783565#TD4061E.TXT.r_3217# gang zhig skye ba'i kun tu sbyor ba ni spangs la mngon par 'grub pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ni ma spangs pa'i gang zag yod do zhes bya ba yang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba yin te zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang 'dir lha rnams dga'  bas ni spangs pa'i don mi shes te / /
column31: 0.028#TD4014E.TXT.r#795027#795027#TD4014E.TXT.r_224# sa lta bur sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir 'gro ba mtha' dag gi 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa dang  yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel ba dang  nad thams cad dang bral ba dang  lha dang mi dag gi nang na tshe dpag tu med par byed  pa lta bu gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la zhugs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do // /
column32: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1815986#1815987#TD4054E.TXT.r_1552;TD4054E.TXT.r_1553# shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sun  'byin pa'i shes pa nas / /
column33: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#2040597#2040597#TD4047E.TXT.r_187;TD4047E.TXT.r_188# de ltar na gnas skabs gang du yang rigs ni rgyun 'chad pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +de ltar skye mched drug gi khyad par gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs kyang 'ga' zhig gi res 'ga' bar 'gyur te / /
column34: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#2790455#2790457#TD4061E.TXT.r_3718;TD4061E.TXT.r_3719# ci'i phyir gang dag sgra ji bzhin gyi don ma yin no zhes de skad bstan dgos pa'i tshig de dag bstan zhe na / / +re  zhig tshigs su bcad pa las / /
column35: 0.029#TD4044E.TXT.r#699345#699346#TD4044E.TXT.r_550;TD4044E.TXT.r_551# mtho ris kyi don du tshul khrims dang  brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab rnams yang dag par blangs nas gnas pa ni 'ba' zhig par sngar bstan to // / +sbyin pa dang  bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas  pa'i ma bstan pa'i rgyu rab tu bstan pa las brtsams te / /
column36: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2625946#2625946#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5889;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5890# de gtong ba ni yongs su  nyams pa 'am 'phos pa'i sgo nas yin no // / +sems med pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa ni mi 'thob ste dge ba'i sems ni ma 'ongs pa thob par 'gyur gyi sems med pa 'di ni ma yin pas de dang 'dra bar ma 'ongs pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: de spangs pas thams cad mkhyen pa thob     // / +par ni ji ltar 'gyur snyam pa la / /

column5: 5.960#TD4036E.TXT.r#36934#36939#TD4036E.TXT.r_2966;TD4036E.TXT.r_2967# nor gyi dngos po dang  'bru'i dngos po dang  yul gyi dngos po'o // / +de la nor gyi dngos po gang zhe na / /
column6: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#924577#924577#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8188# gzhan yang punda r'i ka'i 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u las / / +don rnam pa lnga'i phyir    bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams la bka' stsal pa mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' mi stsal to zhes bshad do // /
column7: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#17346#17346#TD4036E.TXT.r_1304;TD4036E.TXT.r_1305# sems dang yid rnam par shes pa skye zhing 'gro la  'brang bar 'gyur ba'i dmigs pa de dang de dag la sems dang yid rnam par shes pa de dang mtshungs par ldan pa / / +lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa kun nas slong bar byed la / /
column8: 0.015#TD4095E.TXT.r#153233#153234#TD4095E.TXT.r_3879;TD4095E.TXT.r_3880# sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang / / +shi dang mtshan gnyis byung ba dang / /
column9: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#1235502#1235502#TD4083E.TXT.r_449# 'bogs par 'os shing 'cham pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1678337#1678338#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3987# sa dgu pa'i snying rje bas sa bcu pa'i snying rje che bar gyur pa ni khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ste / /
column11: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#965271#965271#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11242;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11243# rang gi ngo bo nyid dang bye brag gi don rgya cher bshad pa ni  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +chos rnams kyi gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs  pas ni gnyis pa gzhan gyi dbang bstan to // /
column12: 0.017#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3044935#3044936#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12976# dmigs pa spangs pas ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas  pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur te / /
column13: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#1160393#1160393#TD4069E.TXT.r_3360# dad pa can de dag dad nas chos  gos dang bsod snyoms la sogs pas bkur sti byed par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'o // /
column14: 0.019#TD4089E.TXT.r#1012559#1012559#TD4089E.TXT.r_332# dga' dang gus nyid ngo tsha shes // /

column17: 0.021#TD4095E.TXT.r#117281#117281#TD4095E.TXT.r_301# yang de dag  las gzhan pa'i yid kyi khams de dag gang zhe na / /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8233;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8234# mdo 'di las tshig gcig las mi smos pa ni don gnyis te bsdus pas de'i phyir mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig gsungs so // / +shes pa brda sprod par byed pa yod pa zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal med pa'i dngos po'i nus pa bstan pa'o // /
column19: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1476807#1476812#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7765;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7766# lus kyi dbang po dang ldan pa ni rdzas bcu pa'o // / +dbang po gzhan dang ldan pa ni rdzas bcu gcig pa ste / /
column20: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#170818#170818#TD4095E.TXT.r_5610;TD4095E.TXT.r_5611# de las ngo tsha med pa dang / / +khrel med rmugs gnyid rgod rnam gnyis // /
column21: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2732276#2732276#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12664# de lta bas na 'di skad du nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i snyigs ma dag gis ni 'dod pa'i bsod nyams la rtsom pa dang bdag ngal ba la rtsom pa'i dbang du byas shing brtsams nas dge ba'i phyogs rgud par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa yin te / /
column22: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#87647#87647#TD4036E.TXT.r_7286;TD4036E.TXT.r_7287# smras pa / / +de ltar khyab pa'i mtshan nyid rnams par gzhag pa la / /
column23: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2356774#2356774#TD4086E.TXT.r_2470# dper na shing khur bcu la brten nas / /
column24: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#351128#351129#TD4035E.TXT.r_10945;TD4035E.TXT.r_10946# de la mi shes byis pa rnams // /
column25: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1439221#1439221#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4541# mig la sogs pa rnams la gang zhig gzugs la sogs pa dag la yod pa ma yin pas sems yul na mi gnas pa'i rten gyi dngos po  gang zhig yod ce na / /
column26: 0.024#TD4027E.TXT.r#995038#995039#TD4027E.TXT.r_107;TD4027E.TXT.r_108;TD4027E.TXT.r_109# de yi khyad par sems las byung // / +zhes bya ba'o // /
column27: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#1123848#1123848#TD4069E.TXT.r_600;TD4069E.TXT.r_601# yid dga' na lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro // / +lus shin tu  sbyangs na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro // /
column28: 0.024#TD4095E.TXT.r#152195#152195#TD4095E.TXT.r_3781# ci de dag gis de dag las kyang / /
column29: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#2072431#2072431#TD4047E.TXT.r_2821# yongs su  shes nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  mya ngan las 'das pa dang rnam par grol ba rab tu sgrub par mi byed de / /
column30: 0.025#TD4095E.TXT.r#154701#154701#TD4095E.TXT.r_4033# srid pa bar ma gang yin pa dang  de'i  rgyu las byung ba gnas skabs bcu po gang dag yin pa de ni las gcig gis 'phangs pa yin no // /
column31: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1816324#1816324#TD4054E.TXT.r_1586;TD4054E.TXT.r_1587# nyid  mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par rig pa ni / / +ji ltar lus rnams du mar 'grub pa'i las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa yod pa dang  de bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus na shin tu mi gsal ba'i tshe / /
column32: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#864668#864668#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3589# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig dang sbyar na yongs su grub pa'i chos dang  yon tan bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column33: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#396852#396852#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_26# gsum pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pas dngos po'i 'chi 'pho ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur par ston pas so // /
column34: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#82164#82164#TD4036E.TXT.r_6826;TD4036E.TXT.r_6827# yang de sred ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po dag ni nang gi dbang phyi rol gyi yin par mos shing / / +nang gi dang phyi rol gyi yin par mos shing / /
column35: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1768905#1768905#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10730# chos 'chad pa'i dus na mu stegs pas brgal na mi thub pa'o snyam pa'i 'jigs pa mi mnga' bas na mi zhum pa zhes bya'o // /
column36: 0.026#TD4087E.TXT.r#2838357#2838357#TD4087E.TXT.r_1228# de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stan las langs te / /
column37: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#11161#11161#TD4036E.TXT.r_773# bslab pa'i gzhi phra ba dang shin tu phra ba gang dag la ltung ba byung ba dang  bslang bar bya ba yod pa de dag gi ltung ba 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni kha na tho ba phra rab tsam dag ces bya'o // /
column38: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#126845#126845#TD4095E.TXT.r_1194# sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni pho'i dbang po dang  yid mi bde ba dang  dad pa  la sogs pa gzung ste / /
column39: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#1134209#1134209#TD4069E.TXT.r_1372# rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang  rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu yin par ston te zhes bya ba ni las kyi gzhi dag ces bya ba 'dis ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu ston to // /
column40: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2549436#2549436#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1027# gang zag ni rnam par rig byed kyi sems dang mi 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan  pa dang rnam par rig byed kyi sems dang 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang  sems med pa dang gsum kho na yin no // /
column41: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2152111#2152111#TD4047E.TXT.r_9262# thor bu thor bus zhes bya ba ni nyung shas nyung shas kyis bstan pa rnams so // /
column42: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1634718#1634718#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_901;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_902# sbyor ba 'gal lo // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni nam mkha' khams ltar kun tu khyab pa la bsod nams kyi tshogs ni phyogs bzhi'i rgya mtsho'i chu bzhin du bsams na / /
column43: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1416832#1416832#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_2599# de ltar na rigs su 'dra bas khams kyi sgra 'di ni rigs kyi tshig yin no // /
column44: 0.028#TD4043E.TXT.r#670497#670497#TD4043E.TXT.r_1757;TD4043E.TXT.r_1758# yid kyi rnam par shes pa nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yul yongs su tshol bar byed pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis bsam pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +nges pa  ni dus gzhan na yang mi 'byung ste / /
column45: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#1261956#1261956#TD4091E.TXT.r_1351# gang lus kyi dbang po dang ldan pa de yang gsum po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po ste dbang po bzhi dang ngo // /
column46: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1203578#1203578#TD4069E.TXT.r_6642;TD4069E.TXT.r_6643# de bzhin du yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma yin // /
column47: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#283219#283219#TD4035E.TXT.r_4682;TD4035E.TXT.r_4683# 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang  gti mug rnams so // / +bag la nyal zhes bya ba ni / /
column48: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1596743#1596743#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17611# rten pa mtshungs pa phan tshun ltos pa rnams ni reg pa'i tshogs smos pas smos pa'i    phyir na de don gzhan gyi dngos po ma yin yang / /
column49: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#19690#19690#TD4036E.TXT.r_1505;TD4036E.TXT.r_1506# de ni nyes par spyad pa las byung ba'i nyes dmigs zhes bya'o // / +de 'di snyam du sems te / /
column50: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2930298#2930298#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_3536# re zhig ji ltar na 'das pa la ltos pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma tha mas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skyed par byed / /
column51: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#42903#42903#TD4036E.TXT.r_3558# de la gdu ba dang  yid bde ba mang ba dang  kun dga' ba mang ba dang  khro gnyer med pa dang  bzhin gyi mdog gsal ba dang  'dzum pa sngar gtong ba yin te / /
column52: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2971142#2971142#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6847# chu de ni bsil ba dang  zhim pa dang  yang pa dang  'jam pa dang  dangs pa dang  dri nga ba med pa dang  'thung na mgrin pa la mi gnod pa dang  'thungs na lto la mi gnod pa'o // /

column3: de'i phyir shes bya'i sgrib pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /

column13: 0.024#TD4041E.TXT.r#2301872#2301874#TD4041E.TXT.r_121;TD4041E.TXT.r_122# shes rab 'byor pa ni nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa dang  spong ba'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // / +shes rab yongs su skong ba ni de nyid mthar thug par 'gro  ba'o ; / /
column14: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1816324#1816324#TD4054E.TXT.r_1586;TD4054E.TXT.r_1587# nyid  mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par rig pa ni / / +ji ltar lus rnams du mar 'grub pa'i las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa yod pa dang  de bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus na shin tu mi gsal ba'i tshe / /

column16: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2552789#2552790#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1228# mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo YIN NO ZHES BYA BA NI 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya'o zhes mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin te / /
column17: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#8926#8926#TD4036E.TXT.r_587# gdon mi za bar skye ba gsum mngon par sgrub par byed de / /

column31: 0.028#TD4043E.TXT.r#670497#670497#TD4043E.TXT.r_1757;TD4043E.TXT.r_1758# yid kyi rnam par shes pa nges par 'byung bar 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA NI yul yongs su tshol bar byed pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis bsam pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +nges pa  ni dus gzhan na yang mi 'byung ste / /
column32: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#1261956#1261956#TD4091E.TXT.r_1351# gang lus kyi dbang po dang ldan pa de yang gsum po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po ste dbang po bzhi dang ngo // /
column33: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#158503#158504#TD4095E.TXT.r_4385# bzhi dang ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge bsnyen dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o // /
column34: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1657375#1657376#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2433# so so'i skye bo'i dus nas brtsams nas te mos pas spyod pa'i sa chos mchog man chad kyi dus na bskyed pa ni sa dang mtshungs par shes par bya ste / /
column35: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2930298#2930298#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_3536# re zhig ji ltar na 'das pa la ltos pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma tha mas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skyed par byed / /
column36: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#157423#157423#TD4095E.TXT.r_4295# mig rna yid kyi  rnam shes dang  gsum gyis nyams su myong gang de // /
column37: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#157469#157469#TD4095E.TXT.r_4298# mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba de ni mthong ba dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pas myong ba de ni thos pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pas  myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pas myong ba ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do // /
column38: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#42903#42903#TD4036E.TXT.r_3558# de la gdu ba dang  yid bde ba mang ba dang  kun dga' ba mang ba dang  khro gnyer med pa dang  bzhin gyi mdog gsal ba dang  'dzum pa sngar gtong ba yin te / /

column41: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#11809#11809#TD4036E.TXT.r_830# khan ma thob ba phra rab tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang  bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs shing slob par byed pa zhes gang gsungs pa des ni / /

column43: 0.029#TD4095E.TXT.r#184718#184718#TD4095E.TXT.r_7002# sangs rgyas kyis ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to // /

column5: 0.015#TD4041E.TXT.r#2303258#2303259#TD4041E.TXT.r_244# rgyas par ni dkar po'i phyogs dang nag po'i phyogs dang bcas par 'di lta ste rtog pa dang bcas pa dang  dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4041E.TXT.r#2303275#2303276#TD4041E.TXT.r_245# tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa dang so sor thar pas bsdams bzhes bya brgyas par 'byung ba dang  dbang po dag gi sgo bsdams te gnas pa dang dran pa kun tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba dang  zas kyi  tshod rig pa so sor brtags shing zas za bar byed kyi rgod pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang  rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin pa zhes bya brgyas par 'byung ba dang  'gro ba dang ldog pa ni shes bzhin du gnas pa yin no zhes bya brgyas par 'byung ba de dag thams cad rgyas ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column10: 0.013#TD4044E.TXT.r#704782#704786#TD4044E.TXT.r_1107;TD4044E.TXT.r_1108# mngon sum nyid du dmigs pa'o // / +yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i nyes pa ji snyed pa  de dag ni thog ma nyid du dpyad cing gsal bar byas la dkrol zhing bstan zin zhes bya ba ni / /
column11: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772760#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column12: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#2779282#2779283#TD4061E.TXT.r_2899# de bas na 'di ni mi 'dra'o zhe na / /
column13: 0.013#TD4064E.TXT.r#765609#765611#TD4064E.TXT.r_598;TD4064E.TXT.r_599# de ni sems khengs pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +'di ltar phung po rnams la bdag gam bdag gi dngos por sgro btags nas / /
column14: 0.013#TD4069E.TXT.r#1195869#1195870#TD4069E.TXT.r_6039;TD4069E.TXT.r_6040# mig ni ma skyes pa las skye zhing zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro // / +de bzhin du gzugs 'das pa yod do zhes gsungs na / /
column15: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#2751528#2751528#TD4061E.TXT.r_756# slob dpon  gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba'i phyir tshur shog ltos shig pa yang yin te / /

column25: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#2778663#2778664#TD4061E.TXT.r_2852;TD4061E.TXT.r_2853# nus pa nyid la ni lan cig smras pas 'dzin to zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column26: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#2788202#2788205#TD4061E.TXT.r_3530# de la phyin ci log gi lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i mtshan mar lta ba can de nyid gang gis na de'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa de mi 'grub pa stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid du mi rtog pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma med pa nyid du mi rtog pa dang  smon pa med  pa la smon pa med pa nyid du mi rtog pa gang yin pa ste / /
column27: 0.015#TD4086E.TXT.r#2342306#2342306#TD4086E.TXT.r_1500# rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang  gling bu dang  pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang  'khar rnga dang  ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do // /
column28: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#1335443#1335443#TD4091E.TXT.r_8226# nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po gnyis 'dod pa'i khams na yang yod pas sa bdun pa yin no zhes zer ro // /

column30: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#21182#21182#TD4036E.TXT.r_1645;TD4036E.TXT.r_1646# so sor rtogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa / / +nyes dmigs su lta ba nges par 'byung ba rab tu shes pa ni / /

column32: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#42959#42959#TD4036E.TXT.r_3562# zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po la khong khro ba'i rgyu mtshan chung dus kyang khong khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa sdug pa dang mang po skye bar byed na / /

column38: 0.016#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1559625#1559625#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14600# mthong ba'i lam sa gsum la brten pa'i mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod ba'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang skyes nas thob pa spyi yid la byed pa rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan ba mngon du byed par 'gyur te / /
column39: 0.016#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1560125#1560126#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14638# ting nge 'dzin shin tu goms pa'i phyir dang  bsam pa kha nang du bltas nas 'jug pa'i phyir de dag sems pa na ting nge 'dzin kho nas nye bar gnas pa yin no // /
column40: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3125678#3125680#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3268# dge slong dag chos gcig dang ldan na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa'i skal pa yod de rnyed pa'o // /

column48: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#352849#352849#TD4035E.TXT.r_11155# ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa dbu pa rdos pa la sogs pa lta bur rang gi mtshan nyid dang  skye ba dang  gnas pa dang  'gag pa  mtshungs pas 'dus byas kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir / /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#38832#38841#TD4036E.TXT.r_3161;TD4036E.TXT.r_3162# 'da' bar bya ba'i las su mi rung ngo // / +de bzhin du 'di na la la bsod snyoms la chags pas bsod snyoms la sems zhen cing kun tu zhen pa dang  chos gos la chags pas chos gos la sems zhen cing kun tu zhen pa dang  gnas  mal la chags pas gnas mal la sems zhen cing kun tu zhen pa de sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gis 'di lta ste / /

column5: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1893481#1893484#TD4054E.TXT.r_8361# sku dang  gsung dang  thugs kyi phrin las thun mong ma yin pa yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'byor pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po gnas dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnams ma thob pa'i yongs su nyams pa med pa yang dag par 'byor ba dang  thun mong ma     // /

column3: de bas na mtha' gcig tu smra ba rnam pa 'di gnyi ga yang rigs pa med pas gtang bar bya bar slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do zhes 'grel pa byed pas rang ma gtogs par gsang  nas slob dpon rnams la khungs phyung ngo // /

column13: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1537852#1537852#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12831# 'di ltar pad ma'i sa bon rnams rtsa ba dang  myu gu dang  lo ma dang  sdong bu dang  ge sar dang  ze'u 'bru dang  lte ba sna tshogs pa yin pa dang  shing nya gro dha la sogs pa sdong bu dang  yal ga dang   lcug ma dang  lo ma dang  lo ma phran dang  myu gu dang  me tog dang  'bras bu du ma dang ldan pa dag sprin ltar spyod par snang ba de bzhin du / /

column15: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#85205#85205#TD4036E.TXT.r_7093# rjes su brtson pa dang  don nyung ba dang  bya ba nyung ba dang  gyeng ba nyung ba dang  yun ring po nas byas pa dang  yun ring po nas smras pa rjes su dran zhing dran par byed pa dang  de lta bu dang ma mthun pa'i chos rnams ni mi 'gal ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ste / /

column7: 0.013#TD4050E.TXT.r#2028790#2028790#TD4050E.TXT.r_2701# ye shes de ni de bzhin nyid de la mnyam par 'byung bas mtshan ma med pa tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa ste / /
column8: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#2049019#2049019#TD4047E.TXT.r_892;TD4047E.TXT.r_893# thos nas rgya che  ba la mos pa rnams kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ro // / +dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lung gi chos thos nas dbang po rnon po rnams sems skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4027E.TXT.r#1006817#1006817#TD4027E.TXT.r_1303;TD4027E.TXT.r_1304# don gyi yod pa spangs pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir ro // / +med pa spangs pa ni der snang ba'i  'khrul pa yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1797590#1797590#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12985;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12986# mi mtshungs mnyam las skyes pa dang  mtshungs kyis // / +rtag par shin tu dga' bar byas pa'i sems // /

column3: gal te 'di yang byed rgyu tsam du rnam par gzhag na ni de'i tshe de dag dang bye brag med par 'gyur ro // /

column9: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1678489#1678489#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3999# brtan pa dang  bzod pa dang  mi brjed pa dang  zhe sdang med pa la sogs pa ni  bzod pa'i ming gi rnam grangs so // /

column11: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#1275303#1275304#TD4091E.TXT.r_2630# mi rnams kyi rnam bzhi la sgo nga las skye ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column19: 0.026#TD4061E.TXT.r#2792189#2792189#TD4061E.TXT.r_3856# 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i rjes las thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma yin no // /

column22: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1852559#1852559#TD4054E.TXT.r_4895# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kun nas slong ba dag gis nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon 'joms pa'i dus na 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral bas spong ba gang yin pa dang  bsam gtan dang po la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang   bsam gtan gsum pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba spong ba gang yin pa'o // /
column23: 0.027#TD4027E.TXT.r#1003827#1003828#TD4027E.TXT.r_994;TD4027E.TXT.r_995# kun nas nyon mongs pa ni gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ro // / +shin tu sbyangs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi ste / /

column28: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1214104#1214104#TD4069E.TXT.r_7424# skad cig de la kun nas bslang ba ni bya ba'i dus su rjes su 'jug pa yin no // /

column33: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#126981#126981#TD4095E.TXT.r_1203;TD4095E.TXT.r_1204# kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la // / +bcu gsum ngag dang ldan pa yin // /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#39220#39228#TD4036E.TXT.r_3205;TD4036E.TXT.r_3206# 'di na bram ze dang  khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste / / +chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal  cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams kyis legs par mgron du gnyer ba na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#39228#39240#TD4036E.TXT.r_3206;TD4036E.TXT.r_3207# chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal  cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams kyis legs par mgron du gnyer ba na / /

column7: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#1245970#1245971#TD4083E.TXT.r_1148# na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / /
column8: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3097832#3097835#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1054# btsun pa bslab pa'i  tshig brgya phyed lhag dang bcas pa ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ste / /
column9: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#559278#559278#TD4026E.TXT.r_5780;TD4026E.TXT.r_5781# de phyir sdug bsngal gnas pa dang / / +yid kyang rnal du mi gnas 'gyur // /

column12: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2217691#2217693#TD4047E.TXT.r_14442;TD4047E.TXT.r_14443# 'bras bu rab kyi mthar gyur pa ni gang yang smras pa / / +byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA'O // /
column13: 0.027#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2963631#2963631#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6231# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phan tshun du lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dus mnyam mo zhes zer ro // /

column15: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#1245800#1245800#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#559373#559373#TD4026E.TXT.r_5790# blo ldan ngo tshas myur du ni // /
column17: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1689242#1689242#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4810# de'i phyir skyabs ni dam pa'o ZHES BYA BA NI SEMS can gzhan la yang skyabs rnam pa lnga byed pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas su grub pas ni skyabs dam pa skyabs bla na med do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.029#TD4087E.TXT.r#2837212#2837212#TD4087E.TXT.r_1144# de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stan  las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo gyas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te / /

column5: 0.013#TD4080E.TXT.r#1649#1651#TD4080E.TXT.r_97# dmod sde ba'i  lta ba la gnas pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i sna tshogs dang de kho na nyid do // /

column3: de'i tshe rdul phra rab las ltos nas 'di ni     // /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40184#40193#TD4036E.TXT.r_3286# dad ldan gyo med nad nyung dang  brtson 'grus shes rab 'dod chung dang  cho ga shes gso sla dgeng  sla dang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40194#40206#TD4036E.TXT.r_3286;TD4036E.TXT.r_3287;TD4036E.TXT.r_3288# dad ldan gyo med nad nyung dang  brtson 'grus shes rab 'dod chung dang  cho ga shes gso sla dgeng  sla dang / /

column3: de med par gyur na shar dang byang la sogs pa yang rdul phra rab kyi char mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40207#40215#TD4036E.TXT.r_3287;TD4036E.TXT.r_3288;TD4036E.TXT.r_3289# sbyangs dang mdzes dang drod rig dang / / +skyes bu  dam chos mkhas rtags dang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40216#40229#TD4036E.TXT.r_3288;TD4036E.TXT.r_3289;TD4036E.TXT.r_3290;TD4036E.TXT.r_3291# skyes bu  dam chos mkhas rtags dang / / +bzod dang des dang gya nom yin // /

column3: de ltar gyur na ci nyes she na // / +de'i phyir rnam par shes  pa bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40229#40242#TD4036E.TXT.r_3290;TD4036E.TXT.r_3291;TD4036E.TXT.r_3292;TD4036E.TXT.r_3293# sdom ni / / +bdag dang gzhan gyi 'byor pa dang / /

column3: gal te rdul phra rab kyi phyogs cha tha dad pa khas mi len na de'i tshe ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus med pa dang  yul na mi gnas pa bzhin du rdul phra rab dag kyang de ltar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40241#40252#TD4036E.TXT.r_3292;TD4036E.TXT.r_3293;TD4036E.TXT.r_3294# mdun dang tshul khrims dbang po dang / / +de bzhin zas dang mi nyal dang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40253#40277#TD4036E.TXT.r_3294;TD4036E.TXT.r_3295;TD4036E.TXT.r_3296;TD4036E.TXT.r_3297;TD4036E.TXT.r_3298# shes bzhin du ni spyod pa dang / /

column3: de ltar phyi rol gyi don bkag nas mjug bsdu ba'i  phyir de ltar na phyi rol gyi don med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40278#40291#TD4036E.TXT.r_3297;TD4036E.TXT.r_3298;TD4036E.TXT.r_3299;TD4036E.TXT.r_3300# bar chad med dang gtong ba dang / / +dge sbyong rgyan ni tha ma yin // /

column3: gang de skad bstan pa'i rnam pas phyi rol gyi don mi 'thad de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40290#40310#TD4036E.TXT.r_3299;TD4036E.TXT.r_3300;TD4036E.TXT.r_3301;TD4036E.TXT.r_3302;TD4036E.TXT.r_3303# bsdus pa'i sdom ni // / +'jig rten pa yi chags bral dang / /

column3: de bas na spros pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa nyid gzugs la sogs pa'i don gyi rnam par 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40310#40319#TD4036E.TXT.r_3303;TD4036E.TXT.r_3304# sa yi ming du byas pa yin // /

column3: dper na rmi lam gyi rnam par shes pa bzhin du khas blang bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40320#40328#TD4036E.TXT.r_3304;TD4036E.TXT.r_3305;TD4036E.TXT.r_3306# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i  sa nyan thos kyi sar gtogs pa las / / +rnal 'byor gyi gnas dang po rdzogs so //// /

column3: de ltar na re zhig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po rnams kyi yul bkag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40329#40343#TD4036E.TXT.r_3305;TD4036E.TXT.r_3306;TD4036E.TXT.r_3307;TD4036E.TXT.r_3308# rnal 'byor gyi gnas dang po rdzogs so //// / +bam po bdun pa // /

column3: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yang dgag pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40339#40352#TD4036E.TXT.r_3307;TD4036E.TXT.r_3308;TD4036E.TXT.r_3309;TD4036E.TXT.r_3310# 'jig rten pa yi chags bral dang / / +de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /

column3: tshor ba la sogs pa dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40349#40365#TD4036E.TXT.r_3308;TD4036E.TXT.r_3309;TD4036E.TXT.r_3310;TD4036E.TXT.r_3311# de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / / +de dag nyid tshogs nges 'byung ba'i // /

column3: tshor ba  la sogs pa dag ni dus gsum du gtogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40361#40376#TD4036E.TXT.r_3310;TD4036E.TXT.r_3311;TD4036E.TXT.r_3312;TD4036E.TXT.r_3313# sa yi ming du byas pa yin // / +zhes nges par 'byung ba'i sa ji  skad bstan cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40436#40437#TD4036E.TXT.r_3322;TD4036E.TXT.r_3320;TD4036E.TXT.r_3321;TD4036E.TXT.r_3323# rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor du bya ba dag ni gang / /
column6: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3128936#3128936#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3473;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3474# 'du shes la bdag yod do zhes yang dag par rjes su  mi mthong mod kyi / / +'on kyang 'du byed bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // /
column7: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1876322#1876322#TD4054E.TXT.r_6980# dbang po zhi  ba thob pa dang  'gro ba bzang po thob pa dang  bsil ba'i gnas yin pas tshul khrims te go rims bzhin du dbang po rnams sdom par byed pa dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang  'gyod pa med pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1849954#1849954#TD4054E.TXT.r_4684;TD4054E.TXT.r_4685# yang srog gcod pa brten pas ni phyi rol gyi dngos po snum bag chung bar 'gyur ro // / +ma byin par blangs pas ni mi brtan zhing nyams par byed pa mang bar 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1876095#1876095#TD4054E.TXT.r_6963;TD4054E.TXT.r_6964# tshegs med pa dam pa ni / / +gzhan gyi sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i  phyir ro // /

column3: de la re zhig gang dag 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa de dag ni rang gi rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa skyed pa ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40377#40394#TD4036E.TXT.r_3313;TD4036E.TXT.r_3314;TD4036E.TXT.r_3315# gang dag nges par 'byung ba'i gang zag rnams ni du / /

column3: 'das pa rnams ni 'gags pa'i phyir ro // /
ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma skyes pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40395#40402#TD4036E.TXT.r_3315;TD4036E.TXT.r_3316;TD4036E.TXT.r_3317# dmigs pa ni gang / / +gdams ngag ni gang / /

column3: 'gags pa dang ma skyes  pa ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40403#40415#TD4036E.TXT.r_3316;TD4036E.TXT.r_3317;TD4036E.TXT.r_3318;TD4036E.TXT.r_3319# gdams ngag ni gang / / +bslab pa ni gang / /

column3: ji ltar rnam par shes pa skyed par 'gyur // / +de la 'dir 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40414#40427#TD4036E.TXT.r_3318;TD4036E.TXT.r_3319;TD4036E.TXT.r_3320;TD4036E.TXT.r_3321# bslab pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams ni gang / / +rnal 'byor nyams pa ni gang / /

column3: da ltar gyi dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhe na / /
de'i phyir da ltar gyi dag kyang da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smras so / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40436#40457#TD4036E.TXT.r_3322;TD4036E.TXT.r_3323;TD4036E.TXT.r_3324;TD4036E.TXT.r_3325;TD4036E.TXT.r_3326# rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor du bya ba dag ni gang / /

column3: da ltar gyi tshor ba la sogs pa dag kyang  rang gi rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40458#40467#TD4036E.TXT.r_3326;TD4036E.TXT.r_3327# gang zag gi rnams grangs dag ni du / /

column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +skye ba'i tshe na ni med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40468#40489#TD4036E.TXT.r_3327;TD4036E.TXT.r_3328;TD4036E.TXT.r_3329;TD4036E.TXT.r_3330;TD4036E.TXT.r_3331# bdud dag ni du / / +bdud kyi las dag ni du / /
column5: 0.019#TD4004E.TXT.r#199331#199331#TD4004E.TXT.r_215;TD4004E.TXT.r_216# dper na mar me mdzad dang da ltar gyi sems can tham la ba la yang khyad med par mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa yin no zhes ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'i don bshad pa yin zhes mkhas pa yan chad gsungs la / / +kho bos kyang de la sems pa phra ba skyes pa 'di brjod pas kha cig skrag pa dang dngang ba la  sogs pa'i yul can la 'di ni bstan par bya ba ma yin te / /

column3: de la skye ba'i tshe na skyed par 'gyur ram / /
column4: 0.028#TD4004E.TXT.r#199331#199331#TD4004E.TXT.r_215;TD4004E.TXT.r_216# dper na mar me mdzad dang da ltar gyi sems can tham la ba la yang khyad med par mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa yin no zhes ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'i don bshad pa yin zhes mkhas pa yan chad gsungs la / / +kho bos kyang de la sems pa phra ba skyes pa 'di brjod pas kha cig skrag pa dang dngang ba la  sogs pa'i yul can la 'di ni bstan par bya ba ma yin te / /

column3: skyes pa'i tshe skyed par 'gyur zhes gnyis su brtag grang na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40490#40501#TD4036E.TXT.r_3330;TD4036E.TXT.r_3331;TD4036E.TXT.r_3332# smras pa / / +de la gang zag ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod de / /

column3: skye ba'i tshe na ni tshor ba la sogs pa yod pa ma    yin no / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40502#40512#TD4036E.TXT.r_3331;TD4036E.TXT.r_3332;TD4036E.TXT.r_3333;TD4036E.TXT.r_3334# de la gang zag ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod de / / +nyi shu rtsa brgyad gang zhe na / /

column3: de'i phyir yod pa ma yin pas skyed par ji ltar 'gyur // / +gang gi tshor ba la sogs skyes pa'i tshe na ni rnam par shes pa yang de'i rnam par skyes pa nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40513#40523#TD4036E.TXT.r_3333;TD4036E.TXT.r_3334# 'di lta ste / / +dbang po rtul po dang  dbang po rnon po dang  'dod chags shas che ba dang  zhe sdang shas che ba dang  gti    mug shas che ba dang  nga rgyal shas che ba dang  rnam par rtog pa shas che ba dang  cha mnyam par gyur pa dang  nyon mongs pa chung ba'i rang bzhin can dang  zhugs pa dang  'bras bu la gnas pa dang  dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang  chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang  dang  bas mos pa dang  mthong bas thob pa dang  lus kyi mngon du byed pa dang  re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa dang  rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang  par chad gcig pa dang  bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag  mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang  gong du 'pho ba dang  dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol pa dang  gnyi  ga'i cha las rnam par gro la ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40524#40535#TD4036E.TXT.r_3334# dbang po rtul po dang  dbang po rnon po dang  'dod chags shas che ba dang  zhe sdang shas che ba dang  gti    mug shas che ba dang  nga rgyal shas che ba dang  rnam par rtog pa shas che ba dang  cha mnyam par gyur pa dang  nyon mongs pa chung ba'i rang bzhin can dang  zhugs pa dang  'bras bu la gnas pa dang  dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang  chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang  dang  bas mos pa dang  mthong bas thob pa dang  lus kyi mngon du byed pa dang  re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa dang  rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang  par chad gcig pa dang  bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag  mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang  gong du 'pho ba dang  dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol pa dang  gnyi  ga'i cha las rnam par gro la ba'o // /

column3: de'i phyir de la bya ba cung zad kyang med pas de dag ni de'i skyed pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#40536#40550#TD4036E.TXT.r_3334# dbang po rtul po dang  dbang po rnon po dang  'dod chags shas che ba dang  zhe sdang shas che ba dang  gti    mug shas che ba dang  nga rgyal shas che ba dang  rnam par rtog pa shas che ba dang  cha mnyam par gyur pa dang  nyon mongs pa chung ba'i rang bzhin can dang  zhugs pa dang  'bras bu la gnas pa dang  dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang  chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang  dang  bas mos pa dang  mthong bas thob pa dang  lus kyi mngon du byed pa dang  re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa dang  rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang  par chad gcig pa dang  bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag  mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang  gong du 'pho ba dang  dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol pa dang  gnyi  ga'i cha las rnam par gro la ba'o // /

column3: de bas na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i  dmigs pa yang ci yang med par grub bo // /

column3: de ltar na gzung ba med pas rnam par shes pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur te / /

column3: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i mtshan nyid chos la bdag med par grub bo // /

column3: gang zag la bdag med pa ni rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du bstan  pas bstan pa yin te / /

column5: 0.010#TD4011E.TXT.r#640864#640871#TD4011E.TXT.r_438;TD4011E.TXT.r_439# rnam par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o // / +mya ngan 'das pa ston ces bya ba 'di la rab tu zhi mtha' zhes bya bas bshad pa ni tshig kha bskang ba'i don du yin par rtogs so // /

column10: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2643408#2643408#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6989# skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir skye ba dang ldan pa rnams skye ba la rang las gzhan pa'i chos rnams bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor gnas pa de'i phyir byed pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba yin no // /
column11: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#25833#25833#TD4036E.TXT.r_2090;TD4036E.TXT.r_2091# des kun nas nyon mongs pa skyes pa de nyid legs pa kho nar rab tu shes shing / / +da dung mi len pa stong par byed / /

column18: 0.022#TD4061E.TXT.r#2802023#2802023#TD4061E.TXT.r_4581# chung dus mang po yang dag par 'joms pa'i khyad par gyis ni 'di ltar spong ba'i lam skad cig ma gcig gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa mang po yang dag par 'joms pas so // /
column19: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#2174731#2174731#TD4047E.TXT.r_11015;TD4047E.TXT.r_11016# mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba'i bya ba ston pa yin gyi bsam pas ni ma yin no // / +'jig rten 'di'i dus re zhig pa'i sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba bskyed pa don med pa  las zlog par byed kyi / /
column20: 0.023#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2942994#2942994#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4549# sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba dang  nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can dang  nying  mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na'o // /

column7: 0.027#TD4085E.TXT.r#2742001#2742001#TD4085E.TXT.r_449# 'phags pa thogs med dang klu sgrub snying po'i thugs kyi dgongs pa ma nor par rtogs shing bstan pa'i gsal byed mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir dang  btsun pa zla grags la sogs pa klu sgrub kyi dgongs pa las 'chal bar gyur na rang  slad kyis tshe smad la med par smra ba dor nas rgyud zab mo'i 'grel pa byed par 'gyur la / /

column9: 0.029#TD4043E.TXT.r#683730#683730#TD4043E.TXT.r_2703# pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang da ltar byung ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ba dang  rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang lhan cig byung ba la brten nas khas blangs pa'i phyir ba dang  de 'phel ba dang 'grib par 'gyur ba la sogs pa dag gis 'dod kyang lhan cig skyes pa'i mar me rten pa nyid yin pa'i snga ma dag  gis bsgrubs pa'i phyir med pa kho na yin no zhes zer ba de ni rigs pa ma yin no // /
column10: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1530483#1530483#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12237# de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs tha ma la dgongs nas    nam yang rgyu ma yin ba ma yin nyes gsungs pas ma 'ongs pa yang skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir bstan bcos la 'gal ba med do // /

column7: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#41289#41289#TD4036E.TXT.r_3403# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang  dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ste / /

column22: 0.016#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772760#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column23: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1476807#1476807#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7765;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7766# lus kyi dbang po dang ldan pa ni rdzas bcu pa'o // / +dbang po gzhan dang ldan pa ni rdzas bcu gcig pa ste / /

column25: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#2386729#2386732#TD4037E.TXT.r_237;TD4037E.TXT.r_238# de dkar  po'i chos 'di dag la yang mi snang la / / +ngan song dag tu yang skabs 'ga' skye bar 'gyur te / /

column27: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#2127746#2127746#TD4047E.TXT.r_7420# 'das pa'i nyes pa so sor  'chags pa'i phyir ni sngon gyi mtha' dad ldan pa'o // /
column28: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#557625#557625#TD4026E.TXT.r_5611# bdag ni rtag tu snying rjes sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad yongs su gtong ba de nyid kyi phyir khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba med pa nyid du rig par     // /

column32: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#1180386#1180386#TD4069E.TXT.r_4871# de ni kun nas nyon  mongs pa can yang srid pa pa nyid nyes dmigs dang bcas pas yang dag par ston TO ZHES BYA BA NI kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyid nyes dmigs dang bcas pa dang  yang srid pa pa nyes dmigs dang bcas pas ni smad pa nyid yin par ston to // /
column33: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1358876#1358876#TD4091E.TXT.r_10361# sprul pa'i sems la skyang bsam gtan dag pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste / /
column34: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#47786#47786#TD4036E.TXT.r_3976;TD4036E.TXT.r_3977# 'di lta bur gyur pa ste / / +chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa yin no snyam du / /
column35: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387507#2387507#TD4037E.TXT.r_301;TD4037E.TXT.r_302# byang chub sems dpa' ni sems bskyed pa de la brten cing gnas nas / / +byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag la sbyor bar byed de / /

column37: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2217691#2217693#TD4047E.TXT.r_14442;TD4047E.TXT.r_14443# 'bras bu rab kyi mthar gyur pa ni gang yang smras pa / / +byang chub mchog gi 'bras BU ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA'O // /

column39: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#57493#57494#TD4036E.TXT.r_4801# rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni dbang po ji lta ba dang  spyad pa'i lta ba dang   'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa ston par byed cing sgrub pa la rjes su ston par byed de // /
column40: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#54103#54103#TD4036E.TXT.r_4518;TD4036E.TXT.r_4519# de ni gang zag rnam par  rtog pa spyad pa'i spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa lnga po yin no // / +de la mkhas pa'i dmigs pa gang zhe na / /
column41: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#54085#54085#TD4036E.TXT.r_4517# myur ba myur bar dmigs pa la de sems kun tu gnas pa dang  mngon par dga' ba yang dag par skye bar 'gyur te / /

column50: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349255#2349255#TD4086E.TXT.r_1966# rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang  dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa'i  lan kan rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te / /

column8: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#2788199#2788207#TD4061E.TXT.r_3530;TD4061E.TXT.r_3531# de la phyin ci log gi lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i mtshan mar lta ba can de nyid gang gis na de'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa de mi 'grub pa stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid du mi rtog pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma med pa nyid du mi rtog pa dang  smon pa med  pa la smon pa med pa nyid du mi rtog pa gang yin pa ste / /

column12: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111451#3111452#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2075# de dag  mthong nas dge slong mngon par mi dga' ba dang  mi brjod pa dang  ma zhen pa dang  lhag par ma zhen cing gnas pa dang  dge slong dag mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs mi 'dod pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  mi dga' ba dang  yid du mi 'ong ba dang  'dod  par bya ba ma yin pa dang  rab tu dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  nad dang  rjes su mi mthun pa dag yod de / /

column14: 0.019#TD4054E.TXT.r#1867861#1867861#TD4054E.TXT.r_6259# dbang po rnam pa bcu po de dag nyid mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bcu drug pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du slob pa'i lam de la kun zhes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste / /

column6: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#45322#45324#TD4036E.TXT.r_3758;TD4036E.TXT.r_3759# de la ji snyed yod  pa nyid gang zhe na / / +de phan chad gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po med do zhes chos lngas 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad bsdus pa dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams kyis chos  thams cad bsdus pa dang  'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis shes bya'i dngos po thams cad bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni ji snyed yod pa nyid ces bya'o // /
column7: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#45528#45530#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774;TD4036E.TXT.r_3775# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; / +ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de thob pa'i de'i spyod yul gyi shes bya'i dngos po de nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes dang  mthong ba mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur te / /

column7: 0.008#TD4036E.TXT.r#17345#17346#TD4036E.TXT.r_1304;TD4036E.TXT.r_1305# sems dang yid rnam par shes pa skye zhing 'gro la  'brang bar 'gyur ba'i dmigs pa de dang de dag la sems dang yid rnam par shes pa de dang mtshungs par ldan pa / / +lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa kun nas slong bar byed la / /
column8: 0.008#TD4035E.TXT.r#332260#332261#TD4035E.TXT.r_9351# mi gtsang ba'i gnas su skyes pa las yang dag par 'da'  ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.009#TD4043E.TXT.r#686435#686435#TD4043E.TXT.r_2893;TD4043E.TXT.r_2894# de la bla ma rnams ni  phan 'dogs pas gtso bo rnams dang  yon tan gyis gtso bo rnams dang  rigs kyis gtso bo rnams te / / +de dag la bsam pa thag pa nas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir te tshig lngas bstan to // /
column10: 0.009#TD4054E.TXT.r#1864619#1864619#TD4054E.TXT.r_5965# yang de dag gi 'bras bu ni lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang  chos dang bral bar go rims bzhin du rig par bya ste / /
column11: 0.009#TD4091E.TXT.r#1339998#1339998#TD4091E.TXT.r_8635# dang po gsum po gnyis ni snga ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang  dbang po'i bye brag gis khyad par du blta'o // /
column12: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#891016#891016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5735# don med pa la dmigs pa las kyang sems skye bar bshad pas / /
column13: 0.010#TD4061E.TXT.r#2779239#2779241#TD4061E.TXT.r_2896# gal te de gnyis la bya ba med kyang bya ba ni yul re re de skye bar khong du chud pa rnams kyis bsams nas grib ma 'gro bar byed do // /
column14: 0.011#TD4036E.TXT.r#42972#42973#TD4036E.TXT.r_3563# 'breng po dang chen po dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos te / /
column15: 0.011#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349353#2349354#TD4086E.TXT.r_1973# me tog autpa la dang  padma dang  ku mu dang  padma dkar pos yongs su khebs shing / /
column16: 0.011#TD4044E.TXT.r#704782#704787#TD4044E.TXT.r_1107;TD4044E.TXT.r_1108# mngon sum nyid du dmigs pa'o // / +yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i nyes pa ji snyed pa  de dag ni thog ma nyid du dpyad cing gsal bar byas la dkrol zhing bstan zin zhes bya ba ni / /
column17: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1867861#1867861#TD4054E.TXT.r_6259# dbang po rnam pa bcu po de dag nyid mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bcu drug pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du slob pa'i lam de la kun zhes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste / /
column18: 0.011#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772760#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column19: 0.011#TD4061E.TXT.r#2778663#2778664#TD4061E.TXT.r_2852;TD4061E.TXT.r_2853# nus pa nyid la ni lan cig smras pas 'dzin to zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column20: 0.011#TD4061E.TXT.r#2779282#2779283#TD4061E.TXT.r_2899# de bas na 'di ni mi 'dra'o zhe na / /
column21: 0.011#TD4061E.TXT.r#2788202#2788204#TD4061E.TXT.r_3530# de la phyin ci log gi lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i mtshan mar lta ba can de nyid gang gis na de'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa de mi 'grub pa stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid du mi rtog pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma med pa nyid du mi rtog pa dang  smon pa med  pa la smon pa med pa nyid du mi rtog pa gang yin pa ste / /
column22: 0.011#TD4064E.TXT.r#765609#765611#TD4064E.TXT.r_598;TD4064E.TXT.r_599# de ni sems khengs pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +'di ltar phung po rnams la bdag gam bdag gi dngos por sgro btags nas / /
column23: 0.011#TD4086E.TXT.r#2342306#2342306#TD4086E.TXT.r_1500# rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang  gling bu dang  pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang  'khar rnga dang  ham shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do // /
column24: 0.011#TD4036E.TXT.r#55090#55090#TD4036E.TXT.r_4601# de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni gang / /
column25: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#19807#19807#TD4036E.TXT.r_1518# legs par yongs su srung na / /
column26: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#15778#15778#TD4036E.TXT.r_1177# gal te shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rtogs par gyur cig ces 'dod par gyur na yang rtogs par 'gyur te / /
column27: 0.015#TD4069E.TXT.r#1195869#1195870#TD4069E.TXT.r_6039;TD4069E.TXT.r_6040# mig ni ma skyes pa las skye zhing zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro // / +de bzhin du gzugs 'das pa yod do zhes gsungs na / /
column28: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#2769199#2769199#TD4061E.TXT.r_2182# lus zo mdog bde bas shin tu sbyangs pa dang mthun pa nyid kyis bde bar gnas pa'i phyir reg  par gnas pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o // /
column29: 0.015#TD4095E.TXT.r#117280#117280#TD4095E.TXT.r_301# yang de dag  las gzhan pa'i yid kyi khams de dag gang zhe na / /
column30: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3024043#3024043#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11202# ro phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni ro zhim po bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur ro // /
column31: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#24410#24412#TD4036E.TXT.r_1950;TD4036E.TXT.r_1951;TD4036E.TXT.r_1952# rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'am / / +rnam par bam pa'am / / +rnam par zos pa'am / /
column32: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#12511#12512#TD4036E.TXT.r_894# gnyid kyi bde ba dang  nyal ba'i bde ba dang  glos 'bebs  pa'i bde ba bdag gir byed pa dang  mi mkhas pa dang le lo can dang  sgrub mi phyod pa yin zhing / /
column33: 0.017#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1933072#1933073#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2069# de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa  bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so // /
column34: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#830504#830504#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1007# de la nad tha dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i gzhung ni 'di lta ste / /
column35: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#93470#93470#TD4036E.TXT.r_7718# de las dang po pa byams pa bsgom pa la brtson pa phyi rol gyi  mdza' bshes kyi phyogs dang  tha mal pa'i phyogs la mtshan ma bzung ste / /
column36: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2726358#2726358#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12257# 'di'i 'bras bus mtshon pa'i gling la 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column37: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#1338526#1338526#TD4091E.TXT.r_8515# srid pa bdun pa'i spyi yin pa'i phyir re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa zhes bshad de / /
column38: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1749019#1749019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9332;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9333# de yang rgyu rtogs pas dga' ba yid la byed pa nas / / +bdag mchog tu 'dzin pa yid la byed pa'i bar du ste zhes bya ba la / /
column39: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1749073#1749077#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9337# rigs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'  dang por bdag nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rigs su mthong nas rgyu rtogs pa'i dga' bas pha rol tu phyin pa'i khams rgyas par byed do zhes bya ba la / /
column40: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#24552#24552#TD4036E.TXT.r_1966# 'dod pa  la 'dun pa'i kun nas dkris pa skyes pa dang BRAL BAR 'GYUR RO // /
column41: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#1131826#1131826#TD4069E.TXT.r_1192# mi la sogs pa rnyed pa'i sogs pa'i sgras ni yul dbus su skyes pa dang  dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa nyid ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o // /
column42: 0.019#TD4086E.TXT.r#2342363#2342363#TD4086E.TXT.r_1502# lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro // /
column43: 0.019#TD4054E.TXT.r#1871414#1871414#TD4054E.TXT.r_6562# rnam pa  gang phung po byung ba'i chos la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams so // /
column44: 0.019#TD4043E.TXT.r#689233#689234#TD4043E.TXT.r_3093# yang na 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams kyis 'gyur bar 'ong ba'o zhes bya ba ni rgyur 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams ma gtogs par yang ngo // /
column45: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#2765363#2765366#TD4061E.TXT.r_1868# rang gi phyogs rgyal bar 'dod pa dang  rang pham na phyir rgol ba la khong khro ba nyid dang  rang gi phyogs grub na sems khengs pa nyid dang  phyir rgol bas skyon byung ba glengs na de bcas par 'dod pa nyid dang  skyon ma byung ba glengs na khro ba  dang  khros nas sha glan pa'i phyir khon du 'dzin pa dang  pham na yid mi bde ba'i mtshan nyid sems mi gsal ba nyid do // /

column47: 0.024#TD4048E.TXT.r#3068305#3068305#TD4048E.TXT.r_657# lha rnams ji ltar rigs  rigs su // /

column49: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#493295#493295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7167# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtags pa dang rnam par bshad pa ste / /
column50: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1998664#1998665#TD4050E.TXT.r_376# de la mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen byed pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa gang de ma thag par 'gags pa nyid ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas de ni yid gcig go // /
column51: 0.027#TD4024E.TXT.r#804576#804576#TD4024E.TXT.r_124;TD4024E.TXT.r_125# don dam dbyings kyi dgongs don yin zhes bya // / +rin chen nam mkha' chu dag bzhin // /

column53: 0.027#TD4079E.TXT.r#1379561#1379562#TD4079E.TXT.r_1073# sgro btags pa ma yin pa'i phyir bsal ba la ni ma yin te / /
column54: 0.027#TD4051E.TXT.r#2286870#2286870#TD4051E.TXT.r_4264# kun nas nyon mongs pa spong zhing de yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column57: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1154246#1154246#TD4069E.TXT.r_2878# so sor bshags pa yang rgyas par gsungs nas sgra gcan zin khyod kyis lus kyi las de ston pa dang  tshangs ba mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams la so sor bshags par bya  zhing phyin chad bsdam par bya'o zhes 'byung ba dang  nyin mtshan du slob pa yang rgyas par gsungs nas sgra gcan zin gal te / /
column58: 0.028#TD4043E.TXT.r#689551#689551#TD4043E.TXT.r_3110# gal te rgyu med pa zhig yin na ni des na rgyu med pa mngon par gsal bar bya ba'i mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni rkyen nye bar gyur pa'i phyir dang po nyid nas mngon par gsal ba'i    chos yin par thal bar 'gyur ro // /

column9: 0.015#TD4026E.TXT.r#553394#553395#TD4026E.TXT.r_5185;TD4026E.TXT.r_5186# shes bsam dus su 'dud pas bshes gnyen bgrod // / +ces bya ba ni rgyu mtshan rnams pa gsum ste / /
column10: 0.015#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1949980#1949981#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3554;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3555# rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga // / +'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.017#TD4011E.TXT.r#637774#637783#TD4011E.TXT.r_215# nams kyang zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nam yang brjed par ma gyur cig pa ste / /
column12: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#1331062#1331063#TD4091E.TXT.r_7816# bden pa gang zhig sngar mngon par rtogs pa de sngar bstan gyi / /
column13: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#2063176#2063182#TD4047E.TXT.r_2084# de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la chod gos la sogs pa na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams rab tu 'bul ba dang  nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa dang  sdud pa'i las ni sangs rgyas  dkon mchog la zang zing gi mchod pa'o // /
column14: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#1163110#1163110#TD4069E.TXT.r_3548# tshig dang yig 'bru rigs pa dang  'brel ba dang  rjes su mthun pa dang  'byor pa dang  thabs dang ldan pa dang  'tsham pa dang  mthun pa dang  rtag tu 'grus skyong gi yan lag gi tshogs rnams kyis lan ldon par yang byed  do zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /
column15: 0.023#TD4095E.TXT.r#191366#191366#TD4095E.TXT.r_7722# dran dang shes bzhin bde dang gnas // /
column16: 0.023#TD4091E.TXT.r#1324765#1324765#TD4091E.TXT.r_7203;TD4091E.TXT.r_7204# sbyor ba bzhi ste de dag nyid do // / +nye bar len pa bzhi ste / /
column17: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#1073937#1073939#TD4068E.TXT.r_3209# de ltar rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rnam par skyes pa las yul ser pos rkyen byas nas ser po'i rnam pa gzhan skye ba dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs kyi rnam par skyes pa las  dmigs pa'i rkyen sgras rkyen byas nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sgra'i rnam par skye ba dang  dmigs pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam pa gzhan du skye zhing 'jug go // /
column18: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1890655#1890655#TD4054E.TXT.r_8151# de ltar zil gnon gyi skye mched rnams kyi dmigs pa zil gyis mnan nas ma lus pa'i skye mched rnams kyis mtha' yas par byed pa'i gnas yang dag par 'byor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab  gang dang  de dag dang mtshungs par ldan gyi sems sems byung gi chos rnams ni ma lus pa'i skye mched ces ba shad do // /
column19: 0.023#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3085850#3085850#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_71;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_72# gti mug bcom zhing nyon mongs spangs // / +'di yi sdig pa mi dge'i chos // /
column20: 0.023#TD4099E.TXT.r#209000#209000#TD4099E.TXT.r_1243# 'di gang sems la mi 'dzin pa // /
column21: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#956126#956126#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10587# gal te de lta na yid kyi khams ni chos kyi khams 'ba' zhig la ltos nas bsten pa mtshungs pa dang  de'i bsten pa mtshungs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i 'gyur ba'i don ni gzhan khams bcu bdun po dag la dmigs pa dag ni bsten pa  mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column22: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2999441#2999441#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_9140# srog gcod pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'phags pa rnams tshe 'phos kyang mi spyod pa'i phyir dang  lus kyi nyes par spyod pa zhes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro // /
column23: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1858143#1858143#TD4054E.TXT.r_5409;TD4054E.TXT.r_5410# 'gog pa'i bden pa rnam par nges pa rdzogs so //// / +lam gyi bden pa gang yin / /
column24: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#1133388#1133389#TD4069E.TXT.r_1307;TD4069E.TXT.r_1308# yang dang yang du mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir kun du  bsten pa la sogs pa gsum yin te / / +mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ni kun du bsten pa yin no // /
column25: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#1320153#1320153#TD4091E.TXT.r_6828# 'dod pa na spyod pa la dmigs pa rnams ni sa drug gi chos shes pa'i phyogs kyi lam dang  gang yang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po thams cad la dmigs pa nyid do // /
column26: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#260791#260791#TD4035E.TXT.r_2540# gar gyi sgra rnams dang  glu'i sgra rnams dang  rol mo'i sgra rnams dang  bro gar dang gar mkhan dang  bzhad gad dang  'jo sgeg la sogs pa'i sgra rnams dang  gcig tu nges par yid du 'ong    ba'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs la blta ba dang  gcig tu nges par dri zhim po'i spos rnam pa sna tshogs dang  gcig tu nges par ro zhim pa'i ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang  gcig tu nges par reg na bde ba'i lha'i bu mo'i mchog gi reg bya rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis yid 'phrog pas  dus 'da' bar byed de / /
column27: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#310227#310227#TD4035E.TXT.r_7263# lhag ma gsum ni rnam grangs snga ma la brten te / /
column28: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2614910#2614910#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5159;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5160# sems smos pa ni sems dang rigs mthun pa yin par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir te sems dang mi ldan pa ni sems dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +'di dag gi sems dang rigs mthun pa nyid gang yin zhe na / /
column29: 0.025#TD4060E.TXT.r#1226086#1226087#TD4060E.TXT.r_272# dge slong dag  gal te log par lta ba spang bar mi rung na ni log par lta ba spongs shig ces nga mi zer ba zhig na / /
column30: 0.025#TD4084E.TXT.r#2319327#2319327#TD4084E.TXT.r_494;TD4084E.TXT.r_495# gtong phod tshig mi rtsub pa dang / / +dbyen dang brdzun dag mi smra ba // /
column31: 0.025#TD4071E.TXT.r#730518#730518#TD4071E.TXT.r_321# brag pa la sogs pas bdag nyid kyis khas blangs pas de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin du 'bad par mi bya'o // /
column32: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1251030#1251032#TD4091E.TXT.r_305# de'i ngo bo dang mi ldan pa'i phyir phung po la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no // /
column33: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2569535#2569535#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2306# ji ltar na  rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya zhes na zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pas sngon po shes kyi / /
column34: 0.026#TD4013E.TXT.r#1112051#1112051#TD4013E.TXT.r_1237;TD4013E.TXT.r_1238# ngan song ngan 'gro rnams te / / +las kyi dbang gis yang der mi skye ba'i phyir ro // /
column35: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#294515#294515#TD4035E.TXT.r_5707;TD4035E.TXT.r_5708# gzugs na spyod pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o // / +gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni rnam pa gcig bu'o // /
column36: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#60849#60851#TD4036E.TXT.r_5071# rjes su brtson pa'i phyir 'dun pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la rtag tu sbyor ba dang  gus par byas te sbyor ba dang  lam bsgom pa la dga' ba skyed  par byed cing / /
column37: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#541978#541980#TD4026E.TXT.r_4058;TD4026E.TXT.r_4059# go 'phang bla na med pa 'thob // / +'di dag gis ni sgom pa'i lam bstan te / /

column3: de bas na bdag dang chos dngos su med na nye bar 'dogs pa mi rigs  so zhes gang smras pa de mi rigs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43241#43255#TD4036E.TXT.r_3574;TD4036E.TXT.r_3575# gti mug gi kun nas dkris pa de dang yun ring du rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba dang  de rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos  rnams kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur zhing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43255#43266#TD4036E.TXT.r_3575# rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa dang  dbang po bul ba dang  dbang po blun pa dang  dbang po zhan pa dang  lus kyi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang  ngag gi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang  nyes par  bsams pa sems pa dang  nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang  nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa dang  le lo che ba dang  sgrub mi phod pa dang  smra ba zhan pa dang  yid mi gzhungs pa dang  brjed nges pa dang  shes bzhin du mi spyod pa dang  log par 'dzin pa dang  'bral bar  dka' ba dang  yid 'byung bar dka' ba dang  dman pa la mos pa dang  glen pa dang  sdig pa dang  lkugs pa dang  lag pas brda byed pa dang  legs par gsungs pa dang  nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par mi nus pa dang  rkyen gyis phrogs    pa dang  gzhan gyis phrogs pa dang  gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa yin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349674#2349682#TD4086E.TXT.r_2001;TD4086E.TXT.r_2002# mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / /

column3: rnam par shes pa gyur pa gong du bstan pa gang yin pa de'i dbye  ba mi shes pas de'i phyir de ston to // /

column5: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#13330#13330#TD4036E.TXT.r_961;TD4036E.TXT.r_962# tsog pur 'dug cing tsog bu ni spong ba'i sbyor ba yin no zhes rjes su brtson par byed pa'am / / +me la yongs su spyod par byed de / /

column3: tshig gang gis bstan zhes dris pa dang de'i phyir gyur pa de yang rnam pa gsum ste zhes bya ba smras so // /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43314#43322#TD4036E.TXT.r_3575# rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa dang  dbang po bul ba dang  dbang po blun pa dang  dbang po zhan pa dang  lus kyi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang  ngag gi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang  nyes par  bsams pa sems pa dang  nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang  nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa dang  le lo che ba dang  sgrub mi phod pa dang  smra ba zhan pa dang  yid mi gzhungs pa dang  brjed nges pa dang  shes bzhin du mi spyod pa dang  log par 'dzin pa dang  'bral bar  dka' ba dang  yid 'byung bar dka' ba dang  dman pa la mos pa dang  glen pa dang  sdig pa dang  lkugs pa dang  lag pas brda byed pa dang  legs par gsungs pa dang  nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par mi nus pa dang  rkyen gyis phrogs    pa dang  gzhan gyis phrogs pa dang  gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa yin te / /

column3: rnam par shes pa gyur pa gang la bdag nye bar 'dogs pa dang chos nye bar 'dogs par byed pa de rnam pa gsum du blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.014#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1570172#1570177#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15414;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15415# RNAM PAR SHES PA MA gtogs pa'i phung po rnams so zhes bya ba la / / +ngan song rnams kyi RNAM PAR SHES PA NI    bzhir ma 'dus shing bdun du yang ma yin te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#43059#43059#TD4036E.TXT.r_3567# lus dang ngag gis shin tu rnam par mtho btsams pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang  'bral bar sla ba dang  yid  'byung bar sla ba dang  gcor ba dang  mu cor smra ba dang  spyi rtol che ba dang  mi mos pa mang ba dang  las kyi mtha' dam pa dang  las kyi mtha' brtan pa dang  brtul zhugs dam pa dang  brtul zhugs brtan pa dang  yid mi bde ba mang ba dang 'khrug pa mang ba dang      // /
column6: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349556#2349556#TD4086E.TXT.r_1987;TD4086E.TXT.r_1988# smras pa / / +zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni chu shel yang yin zhing / /
column7: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#1137289#1137291#TD4069E.TXT.r_1586# de dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa mang du byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nor dang  khyim dang  bu dang  chung ma la sogs pa dang  'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa mang du byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column8: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#45158#45159#TD4036E.TXT.r_3738;TD4036E.TXT.r_3739# yang dag par 'jog par byed / / +bsdus de 'jog par byed / /
column9: 0.027#TD4079E.TXT.r#1373150#1373151#TD4079E.TXT.r_495# 'di dag rnam par rtog pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ming dang mtshan ma 'di kun rdzob yin par gsal  bar mdzad do // /
column10: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#925766#925766#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8267# lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni gsum skyed par byed de dang po gnyis ma gtogs pa'o // /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#891071#891071#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5739# yid kyi RNAM PAR SHES PA NI med pa yang dmigs par 'dod par shes par bya'o // /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#924577#924577#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8188# gzhan yang punda r'i ka'i 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u las / / +don rnam pa lnga'i phyir    bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams la bka' stsal pa mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' mi stsal to zhes bshad do // /

column3: rnam pa gsum po'i rab tu dbye ba yang bstan pa'i phyir rgyu'i dngos po dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos tha dad do zhes bya ba smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43337#43359#TD4036E.TXT.r_3576;TD4036E.TXT.r_3577;TD4036E.TXT.r_3578# de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa'i rtags rnams su rig par bya'o // / +de la gang zag nga rgyal spyad pa'i rtags rnams gang zhe na / /

column3: rnam par shes pa gyur pa rnam pa gsum po de ni rgyu kho na dang 'bras bu kho nas tha dad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43359#43369#TD4036E.TXT.r_3578# 'di na gang zag nga rgyal spyad pa ni khengs par 'gyur ba dang   mthun pa'i dngos po chung ngu la yang nga rgyal gyi kun nas dkris ba stug po dang  mang po skyed par byad na / /

column3: rgyur gyur pa dang 'bras bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43370#43379#TD4036E.TXT.r_3578;TD4036E.TXT.r_3579# 'di na gang zag nga rgyal spyad pa ni khengs par 'gyur ba dang   mthun pa'i dngos po chung ngu la yang nga rgyal gyi kun nas dkris ba stug po dang  mang po skyed par byad na / /

column3: dang po pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +de la rgyur gyur pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43378#43393#TD4036E.TXT.r_3579;TD4036E.TXT.r_3580# 'bring dang chen po dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos te / /

column3: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la rnam par smin pa'i bag chags dang rgyu mthun pa'i bag chags rgyas pa gang yin pa de rgyur gyur pa zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43394#43414#TD4036E.TXT.r_3580;TD4036E.TXT.r_3581# nga rgyal gyis kun nas dkris ba de yang yun ring du sems kyi rgyud la gnas par byed cing / /

column5: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#33549#33549#TD4036E.TXT.r_2671# shes  nas dad pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gsungs pa gang yin pa dag yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung nas / /
