column9: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3044937#3044937#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12976# dmigs pa spangs pas ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas  pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur te / /
column10: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#62305#62309#TD4036E.TXT.r_5200;TD4036E.TXT.r_5201# de la nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong ba'i las dang po pa ni yid la byed pa thob pa nyon mongs pa rnams las sems sbyong bar 'dod pa'i    mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa gang yin pa la brtsams shing len pa la goms pa ste / /
column11: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#57788#57788#TD4036E.TXT.r_4831# 'di ltar lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas na sems rtse  gcig pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#327945#327945#TD4035E.TXT.r_9004;TD4035E.TXT.r_9005# gcig nas rtog pa dang  tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba dang  tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba dang  mu bzhir sbyor ba dang  dngos po med pa dang  gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang   gzugs can ma yin pa rnams dang  bstan du yod pa rnams dang  bstan du med pa rnams dang  thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  thogs pa med pa rnams dang  zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  zag pa med pa rnams dang  'dus byas rnams dang   'dus ma byas rnams dang  nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams dang  zang zing dang bcas pa rnams dang  zang zing med pa rnams dang  zhen pa la brten pa rnams dang  mngon bar 'byung ba la brten pa rnams dang  'jig rten  pa rnams dang  'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang  khongs su gtogs pa rnams dang  khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa rnams dang  nang gi rnams dang  phyi rol gyi rnams dang  rags pa rnams dang  phra ba rnams dang  ngan pa rnams dang  bzang po  rnams dang  rgyang ring ba rnams dang  nye ba rnams dang  dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  dmigs pa med pa rnams dang  mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang  mi ldan pa rnams dang  rnam pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam pa med pa rnams dang  rten dang bcas  pa rnams dang  rten med pa rnams dang  rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa dang  'bras bu dang 'bras bu ma yin pa dang  rnam par smin pa dang  RNAM PAR SMIN PA MA yin pa rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba ma yin pa rnams dang  'bras     // / +bu dang bcas pa rnams dang  'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  zin pa rnams dang  ma zin pa rnams dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur  byas pa dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa ma yin pa dang  mtshungs pa rnams dang  de dang mtshungs pa rnams dang  gong na yod pa rnams dang  gong na med pa rnams dang  'das pa rnams dang  ma 'ongs pa rnams dang  da ltar byung ba rnams dang  dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba rnams dang   lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa rnams dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  mthong bas spang  bar bya ba rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang  rkyen bzhi ste / /

column18: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772759#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non PA ZHES BYA BA'O ZHES bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#43426#43434#TD4036E.TXT.r_3582# khengs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos rnams zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa dang  dbang po rgod pa dang  dbang po 'dam bu ltar mtho ba dang   dbang po khengs pa dang  lus cher brgyan pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa dang  btsan ngag tu smra zhing mi 'dud pa dang  pha ma dang  nye du dang  bla ma dang  bla ma lta bu dag la dus su rkyen du bab pa'i mchod pa mi byed pa dang  khengs pa dang  lus mi 'dud pa dang  gsod  por smra ba dang  phyag 'tshal ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyor ba dang  'dud par byed pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa dang  bdag nyid kun tu 'dzin pa dang  bdag la stod pa dang  gzhan la smod pa dang  rnyed pa 'dod pa dang  bkur sti 'dod pa dang  grags  pa'i sgra'i tshogs 'dod pa dang  tham thom gyi snod du gyur pa dang  dbral bar dka' ba dang  yid 'byung bar dka' ba dang  rgya chen po la mos pa dang  snying rje chung ba dang  bdag dang  sems can dang  srog dang  gso ba dang  gang zag tu lta ba shas che ba dang   khro gtum che ba dang  'khrug pa dang ldan pa yin te / /

column27: 0.009#TD4054E.TXT.r#1888174#1888179#TD4054E.TXT.r_7925# tshad med rnams dang  rnam thar rnams dang  zil gyis non gyi skye mched rnams dang  ma lus pa'i skye mched rnams dang  nyon mongs med pa dang  smon nas    shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang  mngon shes rnams dang  mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams dang  yongs su dag pa rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  mi 'jigs pa rnams dang dran pa nye bar gnas dang  bsrung med rnams dang  bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid dang  bag  chags legs par bcom pa dang  thugs rje chen po dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos thun mong ma yin pa bco brgyad dang  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de / /

column30: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1750036#1750036#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9397# gong du bdag dang gzhan gyi don la zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu mos par bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column31: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#1816626#1816627#TD4054E.TXT.r_1613# gzugs de'i bdag nyid dang  'byung ba rten du gyur pa dang  dga' ba'i kun 'byung dang  phyogs dang bcas pa dang  yul la khyab  pa dang  yul nye bar bstan du rung ba dang  yul spyod yul du gyur pa dang  gnyi spyod yul du mtshungs pa dang  'brel pa dang  rjes su 'brel pa dang  rab tu rtog pa dang  gnod par byed pa dang  go bar byed pa dang  bsags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  phyi rol tu  bltas pa dang  nang du bltas pa dang  yun ring pa dang  dus yongs su chad pa dang  de'i dus dang  nges par ston pa'i phyir yang gzugs can du blta bar bya'o // /

column34: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1748575#1748576#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9302# bdag nyid sam skri ta'i skad la mkhas pa'i sgo nas bdag la mkhas pa gzhan dag yid ches par bya ba dang  sgra'i gtsug lag shes par rlom pa'i mu stags pa dag tshar gcad par bya ba dang  don gcig la nges pa'i tshig mang po bstan cing bshad pa'i  chos tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir tshol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column35: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3091885#3091886#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_543;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_544# rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang lus dang  yid  'jig cing rab tu 'jig pa dang  gang gi tshe chos dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de'i tshe yang     // / +'jig cing rab tu 'jig ste / /
column36: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#30089#30089#TD4036E.TXT.r_2428# ma bsgo bar stan la 'dug par mi bya ba dang  stan la ma brtags par ma yin pa dang  lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mi dbab pa dang  rkang pa mi bsnol ba dang  bral mi bsnol ba dang  rkang pa ha cang mi dgug pa dang  rkang pa ha cang mi  gdangs par stan la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang  mgo mi gyogs pa dang  phrag pa la mi gzar ba dang  mdun mi brdze ba dang  phrag pa gnyi ga la mi gzar bar chos gos zlum por bgo bar bya zhing / /

column14: 0.015#TD4013E.TXT.r#1101262#1101263#TD4013E.TXT.r_445# gang yang ma byon pa de dag rab tu myur ba kho nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bya ba ste / /

column19: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2727366#2727366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12317# de lta bu de ni rgyu ba'i tshul yin no zhes bya ba ni rnal  'byor spyod pa pa rnams na re ngos bla 'og 'dzul ba'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og rol gyi cha 'bri ba dang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro // /

column16: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#2196245#2196245#TD4047E.TXT.r_12787# mdo'i tshig 'di dag gis bsdus pa'i don bstan pa yin no // /
column17: 0.012#TD4071E.TXT.r#728626#728627#TD4071E.TXT.r_182# ri dags dang  phag  la sogs pa'i gzugs tha dad par ro // /
column18: 0.012#TD4044E.TXT.r#704786#704786#TD4044E.TXT.r_1108# yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i nyes pa ji snyed pa  de dag ni thog ma nyid du dpyad cing gsal bar byas la dkrol zhing bstan zin zhes bya ba ni / /
column19: 0.012#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772759#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column20: 0.012#TD4061E.TXT.r#2779282#2779282#TD4061E.TXT.r_2899# de bas na 'di ni mi 'dra'o zhe na / /
column21: 0.012#TD4064E.TXT.r#765609#765610#TD4064E.TXT.r_598;TD4064E.TXT.r_599# de ni sems khengs pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +'di ltar phung po rnams la bdag gam bdag gi dngos por sgro btags nas / /
column22: 0.012#TD4095E.TXT.r#192999#192999#TD4095E.TXT.r_7889# dge ba'i bsam gtan dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa ni thams cad yin  no ; / /
column23: 0.012#TD4069E.TXT.r#1197797#1197798#TD4069E.TXT.r_6175# 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems mi sgro bar 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'chal pa'i shes rab  ni spro ba ste / /
column24: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#13335#13335#TD4036E.TXT.r_962# me la yongs su spyod par byed de / /
column25: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#2040994#2040997#TD4047E.TXT.r_223;TD4047E.TXT.r_224# nyan thos kyi gtso bo rnams kyang rung / / +rang sangs rgyas kyi bse ru lta bu yang rung / /
column26: 0.014#TD4027E.TXT.r#1000762#1000763#TD4027E.TXT.r_683;TD4027E.TXT.r_684# don dam pa ni de bzhin nyid de ye shes dam pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro // / +thob par bya ba'i don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste don gyi dam pa    yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.014#TD4011E.TXT.r#640865#640866#TD4011E.TXT.r_438;TD4011E.TXT.r_439# rnam par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o // / +mya ngan 'das pa ston ces bya ba 'di la rab tu zhi mtha' zhes bya bas bshad pa ni tshig kha bskang ba'i don du yin par rtogs so // /
column28: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1875088#1875088#TD4054E.TXT.r_6882;TD4054E.TXT.r_6883# sbyin pa'i tshig bzhi po 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du rtsom pa dang  bag chags dang  sku dang  rgyu mthun par yang rig par bya'o // / +de la rtsom pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams te / /
column29: 0.014#TD4068E.TXT.r#1032808#1032808#TD4068E.TXT.r_330# log par 'dzin pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed ni gzugs ma yin gyi gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzhan zhig  yod do snyam du sems pa'o // /
column30: 0.014#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11082# au ta gong na yod pa'i ba da ni 'byung ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni skad  kyi dbyings bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column31: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3103902#3103902#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1488# gnas  ma yin zhing go skabs med de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed la shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems legs par mi gnas shing mi spyod  la ; /
column32: 0.014#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2610326#2610326#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4881;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4882# dpyod pa dang yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gyo dang sgyu yang med do zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa dang  zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig brjod par bya ba las / / +yang zhes bya ba'i sgra lhag mas ni don lhag pa yin te don gzhan de na gyo dang sgyu yang med do zhes bya ba 'di yang yin par 'gyur ro //// /
column33: 0.015#TD4071E.TXT.r#748778#748779#TD4071E.TXT.r_1939# de dag la zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer ba dag la'o // /
column34: 0.015#TD4089E.TXT.r#1024698#1024698#TD4089E.TXT.r_1942# bzhi ni rigs las lnga 'bras la // /
column35: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1451849#1451849#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5605# mig gi rnam par shes pa rkyen du ma las grub pa yin bzhin du  yang gnyis kho na ci'i phyir smos she na / /
column36: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#12336#12336#TD4036E.TXT.r_881# de 'gyod par byed pa'i gnas ma yin pa dag la 'gyod bar byed pa na gnas ma yin pa gzhan dag la mnar ba'i sems sam / /
column37: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#2767589#2767589#TD4061E.TXT.r_2051;TD4061E.TXT.r_2052# rnam pa dang po gsum po dag gis ni legs par chub pa yin te / / +yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column38: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1854542#1854544#TD4054E.TXT.r_5060;TD4054E.TXT.r_5061# bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la slob ces brjod do // / +'di man chad du ni tshul khrims las brtsams nas / /
column39: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#232901#232901#TD4035E.TXT.r_43;TD4035E.TXT.r_44# gang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon rol du 'das ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa'o // / +sa bon thams cad pa'i rnam par shes pa gang zhe na / /
column40: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1127958#1127958#TD4069E.TXT.r_883;TD4069E.TXT.r_884# de'i phyir ma dul ba rnams dul bar mdzad pa'o // / +'gro  ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin du gnas pa yin / /
column41: 0.016#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1942516#1942521#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2892;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2893;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2894# mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro // / +der 'pho ba'i grol ba tha ma la'ang // /
column42: 0.018#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1942509#1942512#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2891;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2892;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2893# mi gyo ba'i chos can gang yin pa des ni bcu 'thob ste / / +mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column43: 0.018#TD4095E.TXT.r#156904#156907#TD4095E.TXT.r_4248;TD4095E.TXT.r_4249# log gyems brnab sems ma byin len // / +chags pa  yis ni rdzogs par byed // /
column44: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1389552#1389554#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_229;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_230# ci'i phyir mi shes pa bcom pa kho na'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa  brjod ce na / / +mi shes pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column45: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1874876#1874876#TD4054E.TXT.r_6870# gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la brtan nas snying rje sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis sdom pa dang bsdams pa thams cad  yang dag par len pa dang  yongs su bsrung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so // /
column46: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1874763#1874763#TD4054E.TXT.r_6860# snying rje sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i lus dang  dag dang yid kyi las te / /
column47: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2395051#2395053#TD4037E.TXT.r_921;TD4037E.TXT.r_922# de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa ni slob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba yin par rig par byas te / / +shes rab de yang byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i thabs chen po    yin no // /
column48: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1493167#1493167#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9156;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9157# 'ching ba mtha' dag ldan pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / / +'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i  rnam pa gcig kyang ma spangs pa'o // /
column49: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1862634#1862635#TD4054E.TXT.r_5789;TD4054E.TXT.r_5790# de'i 'og tu nyon  mongs pa'i lhag ma spong bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang  bar chad med pa dang  rnam par grol ba la bshad pa yin no // / +yang nyon mongs pa spong ba'i sbyor ba bsal nas / /
column50: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#2106467#2106467#TD4047E.TXT.r_5679# myu gu la sogs  pa'i rgyun gnas skabs gzhan du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i rgyud yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par gyis 'bras bu 'byin par byed pa ni 'dren par byed pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o // /
column51: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1826207#1826208#TD4054E.TXT.r_2549;TD4054E.TXT.r_2550# nus pa'i rkyen las byung bar yang dmigs / / +rkyen so so las kun du skye ba sems can med pa yang yin la sems can du yang dmigs / /
column52: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1452357#1452357#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5643# rigs mtshungs nyid yin yang sems can gyi rten tha dad pas mig gi rnam par  shes pa ste / /
column53: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1758082#1758082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9970;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9971# nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs med pa'i chos la  'dod chags la sogs pa nad med pa'i rgyu yang chos yin te / /
column54: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#1193954#1193954#TD4069E.TXT.r_5887# gnyis gnyis 'brel bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mig gi skye mched dang  gzugs  kyi skye mched nas yid kyi skye mched dang  chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du gnyis gnyis 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column55: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1874913#1874914#TD4054E.TXT.r_6872# gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la brten nas snying rje sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis gnod pa byed pa thams cad dang  sdug  bsngal la ji mi snyam pa la lhag par gnas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so // /
column56: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1749892#1749892#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9386# mngon par sangs rgyas par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug  spyad nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column57: 0.027#TD4087E.TXT.r#2857733#2857733#TD4087E.TXT.r_2771# de dag kyang gang zhe na / /
column58: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2395387#2395387#TD4037E.TXT.r_951# kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis 'khor ba na 'khor ba gang yin pa dang  'khor ba la yid skyo ste / /
column59: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#575294#575294#TD4026E.TXT.r_7413# theg pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la bshad do // /
column60: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1493182#1493182#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9157;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9158# 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i  rnam pa gcig kyang ma spangs pa'o // / +gang gi phyir thob pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par thob pa la khyad par med pa de'i phyir 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen po skye ba khyad par du mi 'gyur te / /
column61: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1835568#1835569#TD4054E.TXT.r_3413;TD4054E.TXT.r_3414# phung po dang  khams    dang ; / +skye mched rnams las dge ba'am / /
column62: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2394691#2394691#TD4037E.TXT.r_883# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chos bdag med pa la 'jug pa dang  zhugs par gyur pa shin tu rnam par dag pa 'dogs pa'i tshig gi  ngo bo nyid rnam par mi rtog pa dang  mtshungs pas spyod yul gyi yul du bya ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid mchog bla na med pa / /
column63: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2395278#2395278#TD4037E.TXT.r_942# mya ngan las 'das pas skrag par yang mi 'gyur la // /
column64: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1842325#1842325#TD4054E.TXT.r_4036;TD4054E.TXT.r_4037# khro ba la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni phan tshun mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no // / +mi mthun pa dag mi mthun pa     // /
column65: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#1193750#1193750#TD4069E.TXT.r_5874# mig gi skye mched la sogs pa dag  gis ma bsdus pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin na // /
column66: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2966653#2966653#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6473;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6474# nyon mongs pa'i thob pa'i shun pa dang bcas pa'i  las skye ba gzhan du skye bar nus kyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no // / +de ltar na re zhig nyon mongs pa sa bon la sogs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: de la 'dod pa dang   gzugs kyi khams na ni gnyi ga len to zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45068#45083#TD4036E.TXT.r_3728;TD4036E.TXT.r_3729;TD4036E.TXT.r_3730;TD4036E.TXT.r_3731# yon tan dang skyon nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni / / +rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o // /
column5: 1.192#TD4069E.TXT.r#1195871#1195871#TD4069E.TXT.r_6039;TD4069E.TXT.r_6040# mig ni ma skyes pa las skye zhing zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro // / +de bzhin du gzugs 'das pa yod do zhes gsungs na / /
column6: 0.005#TD4036E.TXT.r#12513#12514#TD4036E.TXT.r_894# gnyid kyi bde ba dang  nyal ba'i bde ba dang  glos 'bebs  pa'i bde ba bdag gir byed pa dang  mi mkhas pa dang le lo can dang  sgrub mi phyod pa yin zhing / /
column7: 0.005#TD4036E.TXT.r#33549#33549#TD4036E.TXT.r_2671# shes  nas dad pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gsungs pa gang yin pa dag yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung nas / /
column8: 0.008#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349633#2349633#TD4086E.TXT.r_1997# dus ni gnyis su byas pa dang / /
column9: 0.008#TD4054E.TXT.r#1819617#1819617#TD4054E.TXT.r_1910;TD4054E.TXT.r_1911# bdag ther zug tu mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro // / +yang byung ba las bzlog pa ni ma byung bar blta bar bya'o // /
column10: 0.008#TD4061E.TXT.r#2780592#2780593#TD4061E.TXT.r_3006# nang na yod pa'i mun pa bsal // /
column11: 0.008#TD4087E.TXT.r#2869507#2869507#TD4087E.TXT.r_3888;TD4087E.TXT.r_3889# smras pa / / +dper na bskal pa dang po pa thams cad rdzus te skyes pa lta bu dang  dper na dge slong ma dgon pa ma skra bregs shing gos dur smrig gon bzhin du dgon pa nas  byung ba lta bu'o // /
column12: 0.008#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1556974#1556974#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14400# skyes nas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i zhes bya ba 'byung ste / /
column13: 0.009#TD4027E.TXT.r#1007637#1007637#TD4027E.TXT.r_1384# brgal ba dang  lan ni lhag ma rnams SO ZHES BYA BA DE la brgal  ba ni 'di yin te / /
column14: 0.009#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1788491#1788491#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12211# de ni yid la byed pa rnam pa bcu gcig yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa mos pa spyod pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems gnas pa dgu yid la bya ste / /
column15: 0.009#TD4054E.TXT.r#1881554#1881554#TD4054E.TXT.r_7383# zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang  bde ba dang  gtsang ba dang  bdag las bzlog ste mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyir phyin ci log la shin tu gnas pa yongs su mi nyams  pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.009#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2973668#2973668#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7067# nyi ma'i 'gros kyi bye brag las 'di na nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams ring thung  du 'gyur te / /
column17: 0.009#TD4036E.TXT.r#14223#14223#TD4036E.TXT.r_1038# me tog gi spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis bskyod pa las phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su spos kyi ngad yid du 'ong ba dag ldang ba bzhin du / /
column18: 0.009#TD4047E.TXT.r#2196245#2196245#TD4047E.TXT.r_12787# mdo'i tshig 'di dag gis bsdus pa'i don bstan pa yin no // /
column19: 0.009#TD4036E.TXT.r#42902#42902#TD4036E.TXT.r_3558# DE LA GDU BA DANG  yid bde ba mang ba dang  kun dga' ba mang ba dang  khro gnyer med pa dang  bzhin gyi mdog gsal ba dang  'dzum pa sngar gtong ba yin te / /
column20: 0.010#TD4024E.TXT.r#804576#804576#TD4024E.TXT.r_124;TD4024E.TXT.r_125# don dam dbyings kyi dgongs don yin zhes bya // / +rin chen nam mkha' chu dag bzhin // /
column21: 0.010#TD4003E.TXT.r#776139#776139#TD4003E.TXT.r_186;TD4003E.TXT.r_187# sangs rgyas mtshan ni ye shes te // / +lta ba'i nyes pa rnam spangs pa // /
column22: 0.010#TD4091E.TXT.r#1319434#1319434#TD4091E.TXT.r_6761# nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gis bsams bzhin du srog gcod par byed pa nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya'o // /
column23: 0.010#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11082# au ta gong na yod pa'i ba da ni 'byung ba'i DON TE ZHES BYA BA NI skad  kyi dbyings bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.010#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1933072#1933072#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2069# de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa  bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so // /
column25: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#396806#396806#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_22;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_23# 'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba de brtags na skyon rnam gsum yod de / / +dang po ni rgya gar gyi  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa'i dpe nyid la de ltar rnam par phye ba med pas so // /
column26: 0.011#TD4087E.TXT.r#2837029#2837029#TD4087E.TXT.r_1134;TD4087E.TXT.r_1135# bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par dag pa yang dag par blangs te gnas la / / +gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam  yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas / /
column27: 0.012#TD4061E.TXT.r#2751526#2751526#TD4061E.TXT.r_756# slob dpon  gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba'i phyir tshur shog ltos shig pa yang yin te / /
column28: 0.014#TD4069E.TXT.r#1133377#1133378#TD4069E.TXT.r_1306;TD4069E.TXT.r_1307# brtas pa de'i phyir zhing mngon sum du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ni sa bon brtas pa de'i phyir zhing ste / / +yang dang yang du mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir kun du  bsten pa la sogs pa gsum yin te / /
column29: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1668374#1668379#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3230;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3231# ngan pa'i sgras ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la snyegs te / /
column30: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#89466#89469#TD4036E.TXT.r_7452;TD4036E.TXT.r_7453# nad med pas rgud pa dang  nye dus rgud pa dang  longs spyod kyis rgud pa dang  nad dang na ba'i chos can nyid dang  'chi ba dang  'chi ba'i chos can nyid de / /
column31: 0.017#TD4071E.TXT.r#732020#732022#TD4071E.TXT.r_448;TD4071E.TXT.r_449# de ni ma yin te / / +'di  ltar gang gi tshe skye ba bzhin du de yang blo gros rnam par rmongs pa gzhan dag gis rgyu dang bcas par dam bcas pa na / /

column17: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1756792#1756793#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9870# skad cig ma gcig pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya gyo bar nus pa ni mthu la 'dod pa dang  'jig rten las  'das pa'i longs spyod chen po thob par 'dod pas na yi shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang sa bcu thob nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i bye ma'i klung snyed gyo bar byed nus pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'dod pas na rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas par 'dod pa'o // /

column7: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#43135#43141#TD4036E.TXT.r_3568# bzod pa med pa dang  spro thung ba dang  mi mthun pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang  mthun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang  khro ba mang ba dang  bzlog dka' ba'i rang bzhin can dang  'khrug pa mang ba dang  bsam pa khro zhing gtum pa dang  'tshig cing  brlang por smra ba dang  de chung zad tsam zhig smras na yang nong zhing 'khrug la gnod sems skyed pa dang  gnod bzhin du gnas pa dang  'khrug pa skyed pa dang  khro gnyer dang ldan pa dang  bzhin gyi mdog mi gsal ba dang  gzhan gyi 'byor pa la zhe sdang zhing phrag dog mang ba yin  te ; /

column3: dbang po la sogs pa gsum po de rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du snyam par gnas par gang yin pa de ni gsum 'dus pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45815#45830#TD4036E.TXT.r_3794;TD4036E.TXT.r_3795;TD4036E.TXT.r_3796# de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1564803#1564804#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15018# 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus zhes bya ba ni gong du smras pa khyad du bsad nas skyon gzhan smras pa'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#80826#80826#TD4036E.TXT.r_6715;TD4036E.TXT.r_6716# de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur la / / +'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyang spang par bya ba yin no snyam du sems te / /
column7: 0.022#TD4051E.TXT.r#2253335#2253336#TD4051E.TXT.r_1464;TD4051E.TXT.r_1465# chur snang ba la dngos por byed pa ni kun brtags pa'o // / +de dang gtan du bral ba ni yongs su grub pa lta bu'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1412320#1412320#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_2197# mngon par ma shes zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyis so // /
column9: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1560376#1560377#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14657# de ltar na the tshom dang mtshungs  bar ldan pa dang  nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems ni nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir rnam pa gnyis las dge ba'i sems rnyed do // /
column10: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1562230#1562231#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14818# 'di dag gi khang khyim nam mkha' la yod pa'am / /
column11: 0.027#TD4065E.TXT.r#781301#781301#TD4065E.TXT.r_371# gal te 'gro ba  gzhan gyis bsdus pa dag 'gro ba gzhan du mi 'byung na mtho ris su glang po ches srung gi bu dang  ngang mo dang khrung khrung dang ne tsho dang ri skegs la sogs pa ji ltar 'byung ste / /
column12: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1559607#1559607#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14599# sa gsum ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang  bsam gtan dang bo dang bsam gtan khyad par can no // /
column13: 0.029#TD4043E.TXT.r#678441#678441#TD4043E.TXT.r_2347;TD4043E.TXT.r_2348# tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don par gyur pas na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams zhes bya'o // / +tshangs chen pa rnams zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa phal dag las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir tshangs pa chen po rnams zhes bya'o // /

column3: reg pa ji ltar 'byung ba de bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45831#45839#TD4036E.TXT.r_3795;TD4036E.TXT.r_3796;TD4036E.TXT.r_3797# nam gru 'di la dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa spyad pa rnam par byang bar 'dod pa'am / / +mkhas par bya bar 'dod pa'am / / +zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba 'dod pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i dmigs pa dang  gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed cing yang dag pa nyid du yang nye bar gtod par byed na / /

column3: de yod na zhes bya ba la sogs  pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45838#45849#TD4036E.TXT.r_3797# zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba 'dod pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i dmigs pa dang  gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed cing yang dag pa nyid du yang nye bar gtod par byed na / /

column3: gsum 'dus pa de yod na / / +de dang dus mtshungs pa nyid na bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba dang mthun pa dbang po'i 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dang 'dra ba bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i yul gyi 'gyur ba bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de yongs su  gcod pa gang yin pa de reg pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45848#45858#TD4036E.TXT.r_3797;TD4036E.TXT.r_3798# zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba 'dod pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i dmigs pa dang  gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed cing yang dag pa nyid du yang nye bar gtod par byed na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45859#45876#TD4036E.TXT.r_3798;TD4036E.TXT.r_3799;TD4036E.TXT.r_3800# de la rtag 'grus pa'i bsam gtan pa yin no // /
column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#45877#45889#TD4036E.TXT.r_3799;TD4036E.TXT.r_3800# de la ji ltar na rjes su  mthun pa'i dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin zhe na / / +nam gru gal te dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de 'dod chags spyad pa kho na zhig yin na ni / /
column7: 0.013#TD4095E.TXT.r#148503#148506#TD4095E.TXT.r_3424;TD4095E.TXT.r_3425# lus kyi 'byung ba chen po da ltar byung ba rnams ni rten du 'gyur te / / +'khor lo sa la 'dril ba lag pas 'phul ba dang  sa'i phyogs bzhin no // /
column8: 0.015#TD4091E.TXT.r#1319434#1319435#TD4091E.TXT.r_6761# nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gis bsams bzhin du srog gcod par byed pa nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya'o // /
column9: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#60507#60507#TD4036E.TXT.r_5047# gzhi de dag mi dga' bar 'gyur zhing mi dga' ba'i tshig gis bdag la bskul  bar 'gyur zhing rtsod pa skyed par 'gyur te / /
column10: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#2198847#2198847#TD4047E.TXT.r_12989# sems can gyi khams kyi las las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba la rnam par blta ba nyid dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa nyid dang  skye ba nyid dang  mthu dbye ba nyid do // /
column11: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1172602#1172602#TD4069E.TXT.r_4292;TD4069E.TXT.r_4293# rgyags pa'i phyir ni ma yin / / +cha ba'i phyir ni ma yin / /
column12: 0.017#TD4095E.TXT.r#148485#148488#TD4095E.TXT.r_3422;TD4095E.TXT.r_3423# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni skad cig ma dang  po phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung ba rgyur byas nas skye'o // / +de dag ni 'di'i bzhi'i don du 'gyur la / /
column13: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#2454415#2454415#TD4037E.TXT.r_5346# thos pa dang bsam pa'i mthar thug pa des chos dang don de la dus gzhan na yongs su smin par byas pa'i dad  pa thob pa yang yin te / /
column14: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3087960#3087961#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_236# gzugs gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba dang  ji srid du tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba la rjes su  chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba 'di ni zag pa med pa zhes bya'o // /
column15: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#520789#520792#TD4026E.TXT.r_1967;TD4026E.TXT.r_1968# sangs rgyas gcig min dri med gnas // / +tha  dad min phyir mang po'ang min // /
column16: 0.021#TD4061E.TXT.r#2767557#2767561#TD4061E.TXT.r_2049;TD4061E.TXT.r_2050# tshul khrims de'i rgyus mi thub dang  de'i gnyen po la brten pa ste / / +tshig gsum  dag gis dang lhag ma rnams kyis ni re re dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column17: 0.021#TD4091E.TXT.r#1346895#1346895#TD4091E.TXT.r_9273;TD4091E.TXT.r_9274# de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +grangs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad par go rims grub bo // /
column18: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#1068354#1068356#TD4068E.TXT.r_2853# gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa so so'i rang bzhin yin pa dang  gzugs la sogs pa'i yul yang ser po dang  dkar po la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin yin la / /
column19: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1867272#1867272#TD4054E.TXT.r_6210# sems phyi rol du mi 'phro bar bya ba'i phyir thog ma nyid du dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni nye bar 'jog pa'o // /
column20: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#1129677#1129677#TD4069E.TXT.r_1017;TD4069E.TXT.r_1018# sgrub pa'i chos kyang de dag gis 'jig rten pa'i lam yin te  nges so // / +nyan pa po rnams la blo du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi skyon ni 'dus pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis yongs su bstan pa yin te / /
column21: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708367#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11082# au ta gong na yod pa'i ba da ni 'byung ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni skad  kyi dbyings bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column23: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2482048#2482048#TD4037E.TXT.r_7407;TD4037E.TXT.r_7408# yongs su smin par byed do // / +de lta bas na sa de chos kyi sprin ces bya ste / /
column24: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#553092#553092#TD4026E.TXT.r_5156# mngon par dga' ba'i bsam pa dag dang  ngoms mi shes pa dang  rgya chen po dang  dga' ba dang  phan pa dang  ma gos pa dang  dge ba'i bsam pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa las bstan pa rnams dang  dbang 'byor ba nyid de / /
column25: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#1206721#1206721#TD4069E.TXT.r_6879# dge slong dag 'di na dge slong gi mdun du gang zag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug la / /
column26: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#1331301#1331301#TD4091E.TXT.r_7832# gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug  bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar na 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal zhes brjod ce na / /
column27: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2467586#2467586#TD4037E.TXT.r_6416# de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o // /
column28: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#1150874#1150874#TD4069E.TXT.r_2620# dge slong dag ngas khyed la skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun dang  len pa med par mya ngan las 'das ba bshad par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la / /
column29: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#520837#520839#TD4026E.TXT.r_1973# de lta bas na don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir yang  rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bya ba 'di ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir / /
column30: 0.025#TD4033E.TXT.r#2508626#2508626#TD4033E.TXT.r_818;TD4033E.TXT.r_819# gnas kyi don so so yang dag par rig par byed pa'i tshad med pa'i mtshan MA GANG YIN PA DE NI chen po stong pa nyid kyis rnam par sel to zhes bya  ba la 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa ni nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra bar chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar gzugs med pa la brten te / /

column33: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1683459#1683459#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4348;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4349# tshe 'dir tshul khrims  bsrungs pas tshe rabs gzhan du lha dang mi'i bde 'gro thob pa ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +lha dang mi'i gnas su skye ba na tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' bar gyur pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o // /

column10: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1879762#1879762#TD4054E.TXT.r_7240# de la theg pa chen po la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa la sogs pa'i sgra dmigs nas dgongs pa de la mi mkhas pa dag 'di'i don     // /
column11: 0.025#TD4068E.TXT.r#1051142#1051142#TD4068E.TXT.r_1697# gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir dam pa'o zhes bshad par bya'o // /

column15: 0.026#TD4050E.TXT.r#2017971#2017971#TD4050E.TXT.r_1830;TD4050E.TXT.r_1831# gang zag gi     // / +ming ni bdag dang sems can la sogs pa'o // /

column18: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1136803#1136803#TD4069E.TXT.r_1549# dge legs spyod pa med do zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i  dum bu yin no // /
column19: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1458372#1458372#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6164# gzhan nyid yin na ni mig la sogs pa bzhin du reg bya'i yul can du mi 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.028#TD4042E.TXT.r#3049915#3049915#TD4042E.TXT.r_219;TD4042E.TXT.r_220# ne tso'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du de las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste / /
column21: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#33492#33492#TD4036E.TXT.r_2669# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de dag tu gdul ba de dang de dag dang gdul ba'i spyod pa rnams las brtsams  nas phung po dang ldan pa'i gtam dang  skye mched dang ldan pa dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang      // /
column22: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3090934#3090934#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_466# gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o // /

column7: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#2828758#2828759#TD4087E.TXT.r_488;TD4087E.TXT.r_489# gus pas chos blangs pa dang  gzung ba dang  'dzin du bcug pa dang  bklags pa dang  gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi skye ba spong ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang  sems can rga ba'i  chos can rnams dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyi 'khrug pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang  gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas pha ma dang   nye du dang  rgan rabs dang  bla ma lta bu rnams dang  gzhan yang dge sbyong dang  bram ze gnod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  gnod par bya ba la mi dga' ba gang yin pa de dag gi chos dang mthun pa'i phrin rnams dus bzhin du bskyal te / / +de las de dang yang dag  par blangs pa de lta bu dang  yang dag par bzung ba de lta bus lus zhig nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // /

column28: 0.013#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2549436#2549436#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1027# gang zag ni rnam par rig byed kyi sems dang mi 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan  pa dang rnam par rig byed kyi sems dang 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang  sems med pa dang gsum kho na yin no // /
column29: 0.013#TD4050E.TXT.r#1994381#1994381#TD4050E.TXT.r_11# nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bcom pa'i dri med yang dag byang chub mchog  rtogs pa // /
column30: 0.013#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1926427#1926427#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1517# dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams yin no / /
column31: 0.013#TD4095E.TXT.r#155443#155443#TD4095E.TXT.r_4100# lus ngag yid kyi las gyo las skyes pa ni lus la sogs pa  yon por bshad de / /
column32: 0.014#TD4067E.TXT.r#1986955#1986955#TD4067E.TXT.r_1138;TD4067E.TXT.r_1139# de dag gis zil gyis non na nyon mongs pa rnams las sems 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed pa'o // / +de dag la gnas  pa ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sgom par mi byed pa'o // /
column33: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2718095#2718096#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11701;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11702# lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs // / +zhes 'byung bas gzugs kyi khams de ni dri dang ro de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro // /
column34: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1149318#1149318#TD4069E.TXT.r_2504# gzhan yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzhan yang phan pa'i phyir ni lhag pa'i sems mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa rnams ma gtogs pa mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas nyon mongs pa zad pa'i lam mo // /
column35: 0.016#TD4079E.TXT.r#1372740#1372740#TD4079E.TXT.r_458# rnam par grol ba'i sku zhes bya bar yang brjod do // /
column36: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#1328932#1328932#TD4091E.TXT.r_7603# nyon mongs pa ni spang byar 'dod // /
column37: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1199415#1199415#TD4069E.TXT.r_6300;TD4069E.TXT.r_6301# mdo las rab tu dga' ba las dga' ba skye  ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +rgyu gang gis ni btang snyoms chen po yin zhe na / /
column38: 0.018#TD4095E.TXT.r#158417#158420#TD4095E.TXT.r_4377;TD4095E.TXT.r_4378# lnga dang drug dang bdun dang yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // /
column39: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#2828740#2828740#TD4087E.TXT.r_488# gus pas chos blangs pa dang  gzung ba dang  'dzin du bcug pa dang  bklags pa dang  gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi skye ba spong ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang  sems can rga ba'i  chos can rnams dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyi 'khrug pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang  gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas pha ma dang   nye du dang  rgan rabs dang  bla ma lta bu rnams dang  gzhan yang dge sbyong dang  bram ze gnod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  gnod par bya ba la mi dga' ba gang yin pa de dag gi chos dang mthun pa'i phrin rnams dus bzhin du bskyal te / /
column40: 0.018#TD4069E.TXT.r#1160083#1160083#TD4069E.TXT.r_3334;TD4069E.TXT.r_3335# sdig pa'i las can la ni spro ba bskyed par  'os pa ma yin la / / +smad na yang mchod par mi 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur bas so // /
column41: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#11807#11809#TD4036E.TXT.r_830# khan ma thob ba phra rab tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang  bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs shing slob par byed pa zhes gang gsungs pa des ni / /
column42: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#1141653#1141654#TD4069E.TXT.r_1913# res 'ga' tshig gnyis ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung bas 'di bye brag tu sgrub par byed de / /
column43: 0.019#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2730902#2730902#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12563;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12564# tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi bar sreg    par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +me lce de yang de'i sa pa kho na zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'o // /
column44: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#2807228#2807228#TD4061E.TXT.r_5012;TD4061E.TXT.r_5013# dka' ba ni mang po kun du tshol bas dub  pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // / +sdug bsngal ba ni lus dang sems la gnod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te / /
column45: 0.021#TD4013E.TXT.r#1107705#1107705#TD4013E.TXT.r_951# kun du myur pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /
column46: 0.021#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1933966#1933966#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2146;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2147# bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu // / +rnam grol ma bshad / /
column47: 0.021#TD4087E.TXT.r#2846044#2846044#TD4087E.TXT.r_1912# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang sras mang po mnga' ste / /
column48: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#825466#825466#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_605# kyi zhing la la na ni mig rig rig byas pa la chos bshad pa zhes brjod do // /
column49: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#157423#157423#TD4095E.TXT.r_4295# mig rna yid kyi  rnam shes dang  gsum gyis nyams su myong gang de // /
column50: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#157469#157469#TD4095E.TXT.r_4298# mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba de ni mthong ba dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pas myong ba de ni thos pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pas  myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pas myong ba ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do // /
column51: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349379#2349380#TD4086E.TXT.r_1975# skad yid du 'ong ba dang  skad snyan pa dang  'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to // /
column52: 0.023#TD4095E.TXT.r#158503#158504#TD4095E.TXT.r_4385# bzhi dang ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge bsnyen dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o // /
column53: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#1346605#1346605#TD4091E.TXT.r_9250# dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms yang dag  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dag dang  tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams dang  rdzas de lnga ste / /
column54: 0.024#TD4095E.TXT.r#158488#158494#TD4095E.TXT.r_4384# gsum dang ni yang  dag pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa na'o // /
column55: 0.024#TD4095E.TXT.r#158581#158581#TD4095E.TXT.r_4390;TD4095E.TXT.r_4391# bcu dang ni dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas  pas de kho na yang dag par len na'o // / +'gro ba gang na dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du zhig mngon sum du gyur pa'am ldan pa'i sgo nas yod ce na / /
column56: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#2289758#2289758#TD4051E.TXT.r_4497# phal cher zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mos pas spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i phyir ro // /
column57: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2418139#2418139#TD4037E.TXT.r_2660;TD4037E.TXT.r_2661# snying brtse ba'i sems kho na nye bar gzhag ste / / +sbyin pa sbyin par byed do // /
column58: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#596760#596761#TD4009E.TXT.r_991;TD4009E.TXT.r_992# kun du gti mug pas las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur ro // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od srungs gang zag tu lta ba la gnas pa'i rab tsam bla'i / /
column59: 0.027#TD4060E.TXT.r#1223928#1223928#TD4060E.TXT.r_118# dpyod  pa pa dang  rtog ge la zhugs pa dang  rang gi spobs pa dang ldan pa dang  so so'i skye bo dang ldan pa dang  dpyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sa la gnas pa yin zhes bya ba dang  'chi ba ni bzang po ma yin / /
column60: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1190508#1190508#TD4069E.TXT.r_5638;TD4069E.TXT.r_5639# de ltar re zhig dngos po tsam la las dang bcas pa'i byed pa'i por bshad pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de 'khrul pa yod par rgya cher bkag go // / +yul gzhan du grib ma 'grol bar byed do // /
column61: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#10254#10254#TD4036E.TXT.r_714;TD4036E.TXT.r_715# sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal ba dang  kun 'byung ba kun 'byung ba dang  'gog pa la 'gog  pa dang  lam la lam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing slob pa'i ye shes dang mthong ba dang ldan par gyur na / / +de'i gong du lam sgom par byed pa na / /
column62: 0.029#TD4095E.TXT.r#170818#170818#TD4095E.TXT.r_5610;TD4095E.TXT.r_5611# de las ngo tsha med pa dang / / +khrel med rmugs gnyid rgod rnam gnyis // /

column3: des reg pa nyid kyi phyir / / +yul gyi 'gyur ba yongs su gcod pa'i ngo bo nyid     // /

column5: 0.013#TD4051E.TXT.r#2271775#2271776#TD4051E.TXT.r_2981# de su zhe na byang chub sems dpa' zhes sbyar bar bya'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#2756324#2756324#TD4061E.TXT.r_1154# gnas skabs mi 'dod pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#1245800#1245805#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1465058#1465058#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6743# 'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag deng sang ni mi rnams tshe lo brgya pa'o zhes gsungs she na / /
column9: 0.024#TD4087E.TXT.r#2837212#2837212#TD4087E.TXT.r_1144# de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stan  las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo gyas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te / /
column10: 0.025#TD4089E.TXT.r#1025820#1025823#TD4089E.TXT.r_2093;TD4089E.TXT.r_2094;TD4089E.TXT.r_2095# khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan // / +'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa // /
column11: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#33657#33657#TD4036E.TXT.r_2680;TD4036E.TXT.r_2681# gang las nyan thos shi 'phos pa dang  dus byas pa dang  skye ba lung ston pa dang  nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang yin pa de ni lung bstan pa'i sde zhes bya'o // / +tshigs su  bcad pa'i sde gang zhe na / /
column12: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#1245971#1245971#TD4083E.TXT.r_1148# na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / /
column13: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1134209#1134209#TD4069E.TXT.r_1372# rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang  rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu yin par ston te zhes bya ba ni las kyi gzhi dag ces bya ba 'dis ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu ston to // /
column14: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1816323#1816323#TD4054E.TXT.r_1586;TD4054E.TXT.r_1587# nyid  mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par rig pa ni / / +ji ltar lus rnams du mar 'grub pa'i las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa yod pa dang  de bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus na shin tu mi gsal ba'i tshe / /
column15: 0.029#TD4059E.TXT.r#754435#754435#TD4059E.TXT.r_300;TD4059E.TXT.r_301# 'dus ma byas gang zhe na / / +nam mkha' dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang  so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang  de bzhin nyid do // /
column16: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2549436#2549436#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1027# gang zag ni rnam par rig byed kyi sems dang mi 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan  pa dang rnam par rig byed kyi sems dang 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang  sems med pa dang gsum kho na yin no // /
column17: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#1251027#1251027#TD4091E.TXT.r_305# de'i ngo bo dang mi ldan pa'i phyir phung po la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no // /

column3: yin du zin kyang / / +de dbang po'i 'gyur ba yongs su gcod pa zhes bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46132#46139#TD4036E.TXT.r_3822# gzugs rnams kyi rags pa nyid dang  gzugs med pa rnams kyi zhi ba nyid la sems nye bar gtod par byed do // /

column3: de ltar reg pa'i rang gi ngo bo brjod nas / /
column4: 5.960#TD4036E.TXT.r#46063#46066#TD4036E.TXT.r_3816;TD4036E.TXT.r_3817# skye mched la mkhas pa la'o / / +mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  bdag med pa la kun tu rmongs pa zhig yin na ni / /
column5: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#30288#30288#TD4036E.TXT.r_2434# lag pa mi bldags pa dang  lhung bzed mi byog  pa dang  lag pa mi sbrug pa dang  lhung bzed mi bskyam pa dang  kham 'phro mi bcad par bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyad par bya'o snyam pa dang  bdag khyim de dag nas ldog  cing phyir 'ongs te / /

column3: byed pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +'di'i las ni tshor ba'i rten te zhes bya ba smras te / /
column4: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#46081#46082#TD4036E.TXT.r_3818# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang  gnas  dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed do // /

column3: don de ni brda phrad par zad do // /
column4: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#46086#46095#TD4036E.TXT.r_3818;TD4036E.TXT.r_3819# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang  gnas  dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed do // /

column3: las de yang lung  gis bstan pa'i phyir / /
de skad du mdo las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46180#46191#TD4036E.TXT.r_3825;TD4036E.TXT.r_3826# bden pa sdug bsngal dang  bden pa kun 'byung  pa dang  bden pa 'gog pa dang  bden pa lam la sems nye bar gtod par byed do / / +nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa ba rnal 'byor spyod pa rjes su mthun pa'i dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // /

column3: mdo las bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa ni bde ba'i tshor ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'o zhes gsungs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46192#46207#TD4036E.TXT.r_3826;TD4036E.TXT.r_3827# nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa ba rnal 'byor spyod pa rjes su mthun pa'i dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // /
column5: 0.008#TD4036E.TXT.r#17655#17657#TD4036E.TXT.r_1327;TD4036E.TXT.r_1328;TD4036E.TXT.r_1329# de ni re zhig dbang po sdom pa'i rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa yin par shes par bya'o // / +don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na / /

column3: de bas na 'di'i las ni tshor ba'i rten nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46204#46215#TD4036E.TXT.r_3827;TD4036E.TXT.r_3828# nam gru ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnam 'byor spyod  pa gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin zhe na / /

column3: khong du chud sla bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46216#46223#TD4036E.TXT.r_3827;TD4036E.TXT.r_3828# nam gru ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnam 'byor spyod  pa gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin zhe na / / +nam gru 'di la dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de shes bya'i dngos po de dang de kho na dag rnam par 'byed par 'dod / /
column5: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#166757#166757#TD4095E.TXT.r_5191;TD4095E.TXT.r_5192# ji ltar dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ba ni bshad zin  to ; / / +gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa // /

column3: sems las byung ba  rnams kyi las 'di brjod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46224#46234#TD4036E.TXT.r_3828;TD4036E.TXT.r_3829;TD4036E.TXT.r_3830# nam gru 'di la dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de shes bya'i dngos po de dang de kho na dag rnam par 'byed par 'dod / /
column5: 0.014#TD4026E.TXT.r#557557#557558#TD4026E.TXT.r_5605;TD4026E.TXT.r_5606# bdag ni longs spyod dag de ltar nye bar gnas pa'i bde ba gang yin pa de ni mi 'dod de / /
column6: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#1348754#1348756#TD4091E.TXT.r_9455;TD4091E.TXT.r_9456# zag med rnams ni gnyis chos dang  rjes su shes pa nyid yin no // / +zag pa med pa'i shes pa ni chos shes pa dang  rjes su shes pa rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#1349159#1349161#TD4091E.TXT.r_9492# de gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang  khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyab kyis bltas pa yin no // /
column8: 0.026#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2905780#2905783#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1504;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1505# thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa bskyed na ni lus zhig par 'gyur ro lo // / +dbang po'i rdul phra rab  bam yul gyi rdul phra rab gcig gis rnam par shes bskyed pa ni med de / /
column9: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#2149234#2149234#TD4047E.TXT.r_9028# bsam gtan la brten nas de'i stobs kyis sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don bdag gi lus sprul pa dus gcig tu spros pas sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang  phan pa byas pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i phyir du byed pa dang  'jigs pa  rnams las srung ba dang  sdug bsngal bar gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan sel ba dang  skrag par byed pa'i bar du'o // /
column10: 0.028#TD4079E.TXT.r#1372022#1372022#TD4079E.TXT.r_394# dngos po rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na chos nyid do // /

column3: 'di ltar 'di dag gi las brjod na so sor nges pa'i ngo bo bde blag tu rtogs par nus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46244#46252#TD4036E.TXT.r_3831;TD4036E.TXT.r_3832;TD4036E.TXT.r_3833# yongs su  dpyod par 'dod la / / +des de dag dang po nyid nas mthong ba'am / /
column5: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#46033#46033#TD4036E.TXT.r_3812;TD4036E.TXT.r_3813# bdag dang sems can dang  srog dang  skye ba po dang  gso ba bo dang  gang zag gi dngos po la kun tu rmongs pa zhig yin na ni / / +phung po la mkhas pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed do // /

column3: sems las byung ba gnyis pa dgrol ba'i phyir / / +yid la byed pa ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba smras so // /

column5: 0.021#TD4091E.TXT.r#1356028#1356029#TD4091E.TXT.r_10090# gzhan  dag ni res 'ga' bdag gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa yongs su spong bar mi nus so // /
column6: 0.025#TD4095E.TXT.r#184718#184718#TD4095E.TXT.r_7002# sangs rgyas kyis ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to // /
column7: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1347694#1347694#TD4091E.TXT.r_9351# rnam bar ma grol bas ji ltar na rnam par grol ba'i ye shes su rnam  par gzhag / /
column8: 0.027#TD4079E.TXT.r#1372740#1372740#TD4079E.TXT.r_458# rnam par grol ba'i sku zhes bya bar yang brjod do // /
column9: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1328932#1328932#TD4091E.TXT.r_7603# nyon mongs pa ni spang byar 'dod // /
column10: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#1346605#1346605#TD4091E.TXT.r_9250# dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms yang dag  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dag dang  tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams dang  rdzas de lnga ste / /
column11: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#1337207#1337207#TD4091E.TXT.r_8393# de'i phyir gdon mi za bar gnyi gar yang 'gyur ro // /

column3: de nyid dgrol ba'i phyir 'jug par byed pas 'jug pa  ste zhes bya ba smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46266#46278#TD4036E.TXT.r_3835;TD4036E.TXT.r_3836;TD4036E.TXT.r_3837;TD4036E.TXT.r_3838# rnam par rig par yang gyur na / / +de mthong ba de nyid kyi dbang du byas sam / /

column3: 'jug par byed pas na 'jug pa ste zhes bya ba 'dis ni nges pa'i tshig bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46279#46290#TD4036E.TXT.r_3837;TD4036E.TXT.r_3838;TD4036E.TXT.r_3839;TD4036E.TXT.r_3840# thos pa'am bye bag phyed pa'am / / +rnam par reg pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas / /

column3: dmigs pa la gang gis sems mngon du phyogs par byed pa de yid la byed pa zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46291#46303#TD4036E.TXT.r_3839;TD4036E.TXT.r_3840;TD4036E.TXT.r_3841;TD4036E.TXT.r_3842# mnyam par gzhag     // / +pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46355#46359#TD4036E.TXT.r_3848;TD4036E.TXT.r_3846;TD4036E.TXT.r_3847# dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dus dus su dmigs pa de dang ldan pa'i sems yang dag par zhi bar byed cing / /

column3: 'dzin 'dod pa'i yul la gang gis sems gtod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46304#46316#TD4036E.TXT.r_3841;TD4036E.TXT.r_3842;TD4036E.TXT.r_3843;TD4036E.TXT.r_3844# rnam par rtog pa byed / / +mos par byed do // /

column3: de'i byed pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +de ni dmigs pa la sems 'dzin pa'i las can te zhes bya ba smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46317#46325#TD4036E.TXT.r_3843;TD4036E.TXT.r_3844;TD4036E.TXT.r_3845# des shes bya'i dngos po nye bar gyur cing / / +mngon du gyur pa de nyid mi mthong mod kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46325#46336#TD4036E.TXT.r_3844;TD4036E.TXT.r_3845# mngon du gyur pa de nyid mi mthong mod kyi / / +'on kyang de la de'i gzugs brnyan dang  de'i snang brnyan ye shes tsam mam / /

column3: 'di'i las ni dmigs pa la sems 'dzin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46337#46345#TD4036E.TXT.r_3845;TD4036E.TXT.r_3846;TD4036E.TXT.r_3847# 'on kyang de la de'i gzugs brnyan dang  de'i snang brnyan ye shes tsam mam / / +mthong ba tsam mam / /
column5: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#2766441#2766441#TD4061E.TXT.r_1948;TD4061E.TXT.r_1949# sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni / / +brtson 'grus ldan dang thabs shes dang / /

column3: ji ltar 'dzin snyam pa la sems 'dzin pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#46300#46300#TD4036E.TXT.r_3840;TD4036E.TXT.r_3841# pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed cing / / +rnam par rtog pa byed / /

column3: mngon par 'dod pa'i dmigs pa de nyid la  sems yang dang yang gtod pa ni 'dzin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46360#46377#TD4036E.TXT.r_3848;TD4036E.TXT.r_3849;TD4036E.TXT.r_3850# dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dus dus su dmigs pa de dang ldan pa'i sems yang dag par zhi bar byed cing / /

column3: de ci yid la byed pa thams cad kyi las sam / /
'on te 'ga' zhig gi las yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46378#46388#TD4036E.TXT.r_3849;TD4036E.TXT.r_3850;TD4036E.TXT.r_3851;TD4036E.TXT.r_3852# dus dus su lhag pa'i shes rab chos rnam par 'byed pa la yang rnal 'byor du byed de / / +nam grub de ltar na  dge slong rnal 'byor pa / /

column3: de'i phyir las de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46389#46398#TD4036E.TXT.r_3851;TD4036E.TXT.r_3852;TD4036E.TXT.r_3853# rnal 'byor spyod pa / / +gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // /

column3: dmigs pa gcig la sems kyi rgyun nges pa'i mtshan nyid de ni las su bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46396#46411#TD4036E.TXT.r_3852;TD4036E.TXT.r_3853# gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // / +nam gru ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa la sems yang dag pa nyid du nye bar gtod par byed pa yin zhe na / /

column3: de ni yid la byed pa bye brag can gyi dbang du byas te bshad kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46412#46423#TD4036E.TXT.r_3853;TD4036E.TXT.r_3854# nam gru ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa la sems yang dag pa nyid du nye bar gtod par byed pa yin zhe na / / +nam gru gal te dge slong rnal  'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa na / /

column3: de sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jug pa ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46422#46433#TD4036E.TXT.r_3854;TD4036E.TXT.r_3855# nam gru gal te dge slong rnal  'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa na / /

column3: 'di ltar de ni sems kyi skad cig gcig nyid la las byed pa yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46434#46445#TD4036E.TXT.r_3855;TD4036E.TXT.r_3856# des shes bya ji snyed shes par bya ba de snyed shes shing de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci log par gyur na / /

column3: skad cig gzhan la ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46446#46454#TD4036E.TXT.r_3855;TD4036E.TXT.r_3856# des shes bya ji snyed shes par bya ba de snyed shes shing de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci log par gyur na / / +nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dmigs pa la sems yang  dag pa nyid du nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // /

column3: yid la byed pa bye brag can gyi dbang du byas zhes bya ba ni    bsam gtan pa rnams kyi yid la byed pa gang yin pa de'i dbang du byas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46455#46465#TD4036E.TXT.r_3856;TD4036E.TXT.r_3857# nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dmigs pa la sems yang  dag pa nyid du nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46465#46473#TD4036E.TXT.r_3856;TD4036E.TXT.r_3857# nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de dmigs pa la sems yang  dag pa nyid du nye bar gtod par byed pa yin no // / +nam gru ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa rtag 'grus pa'i bsam gtan pa yin zhe na / /

column3: sems las byung ba gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +tshor ba ni myong ba'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46474#46489#TD4036E.TXT.r_3857;TD4036E.TXT.r_3858# nam gru ji ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa rtag 'grus pa'i bsam gtan pa yin zhe na / /

column3: yul yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'i rang gi myong ba'i ngo bo nyid ni tshor ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46490#46505#TD4036E.TXT.r_3858;TD4036E.TXT.r_3859;TD4036E.TXT.r_3860;TD4036E.TXT.r_3861# nam gru gal te dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de de ltar dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa na / /

column3: gang gis  yul yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa myong bar byed pa de tshor ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46501#46512#TD4036E.TXT.r_3859;TD4036E.TXT.r_3860;TD4036E.TXT.r_3861# rtag tu sbyor ba dang  gus par byas te / / +sbyor bar byed cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46596#46597#TD4036E.TXT.r_3869# dmigs pa  la de ltar sems nye bar gtod par byed na / /

column3: 'di'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir / / +de yang yul sim par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46513#46521#TD4036E.TXT.r_3861# dus dus su zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma sgom par byed pa dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma kun du bstan cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus gnas ngan len thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46521#46529#TD4036E.TXT.r_3861;TD4036E.TXT.r_3862# dus dus su zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma sgom par byed pa dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma kun du bstan cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus gnas ngan len thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i phyir / /

column3: 'di ltar des yul sim par byed pa dang  gdung bar byed pa dang gnyis ka'i rnam pa las dben  pa'i rang gi ngo bo mngon du byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46527#46537#TD4036E.TXT.r_3861;TD4036E.TXT.r_3862;TD4036E.TXT.r_3863# dus dus su zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma SGOM PAR BYED PA DANG  rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma kun du bstan cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus gnas ngan len thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i phyir / / +gnas  yongs su dag pa rjes su thob par reg par byed / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46538#46548#TD4036E.TXT.r_3863;TD4036E.TXT.r_3864;TD4036E.TXT.r_3865# mngon sum du byed cing / / +shes bya'i dngos po mngon sum du gyur pas / /

column3: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46549#46560#TD4036E.TXT.r_3865# dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang  'dod chags dang bral bas sems yongs su dag pa dang  ma rig pa dang bral bas ye shes yongs su dag pa rtog    par byed reg par byed / /

column3: 'di nyid la bshad pa gzhan bya ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46559#46569#TD4036E.TXT.r_3865;TD4036E.TXT.r_3866;TD4036E.TXT.r_3867# dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang  'dod chags dang bral bas sems yongs su dag pa dang  ma rig pa dang bral bas ye shes yongs su dag pa rtog    par byed reg par byed / /

column3: 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46568#46577#TD4036E.TXT.r_3866;TD4036E.TXT.r_3867# mngon sum du byed na / / +nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa rtag 'grus pa'i bsam gtan pa yin no // /

column3: kha cig ni 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par  smin pa 'dis myong bar byed pas de bas na myong ba'o snyam du sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46576#46587#TD4036E.TXT.r_3867;TD4036E.TXT.r_3868# nam gru de ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa rtag 'grus pa'i bsam gtan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46587#46595#TD4036E.TXT.r_3868;TD4036E.TXT.r_3869# nam gru gang gi phyir dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa de nyid la sems nye bar gtod par byed cing / /

column3: las gang gis na 'bras bu gang yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46596#46605#TD4036E.TXT.r_3869;TD4036E.TXT.r_3870# dmigs pa  la de ltar sems nye bar gtod par byed na / /

column3: de la bde ba myong ba ni las dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46606#46620#TD4036E.TXT.r_3870;TD4036E.TXT.r_3871;TD4036E.TXT.r_3872# de ltar na de'i sems de dmigs pa la legs par nye bar gtod pa yin zhes gsungs so zhes grag go // /

column3: las dge mi dge gnyi ga'i  zhes bya ba ni 'dir chung ba la ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46620#46634#TD4036E.TXT.r_3870;TD4036E.TXT.r_3871;TD4036E.TXT.r_3872;TD4036E.TXT.r_3873;TD4036E.TXT.r_3874# de ltar na de'i sems de dmigs pa la legs par nye bar gtod pa yin zhes gsungs so zhes grag go // / +de la // / +mtshan ma spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa // /

column3: gang dag las dge ba nyid kyi chung ba na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal yang ma yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46633#46656#TD4036E.TXT.r_3873;TD4036E.TXT.r_3874;TD4036E.TXT.r_3875;TD4036E.TXT.r_3876;TD4036E.TXT.r_3877# kun tu yang dag don rtogs shing // / +rtag 'grus gzugs brnyan bsam gtan pa / /

column3: bde ba yang ma yin par 'dod pa de dag gi gzhung ltar na gnyis ka'i zhes ni brjod par mi bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46657#46666#TD4036E.TXT.r_3877;TD4036E.TXT.r_3878# de la re zhig mtshan ma spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes gsungs pa des ni / /

column3: lhag ma ni go sla bas ma bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46665#46674#TD4036E.TXT.r_3877;TD4036E.TXT.r_3878# de la re zhig mtshan ma spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes gsungs pa des ni / / +zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma dang  rtag tu byed pa nyid dang  gus  par byas te byed pa nyid bstan to // /

column3: de ltar tshor ba gsum po de dag  gi las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46673#46687#TD4036E.TXT.r_3878;TD4036E.TXT.r_3879# zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma dang  rtag tu byed pa nyid dang  gus  par byas te byed PA NYID BSTAN TO // /

column3: da ni bye brag tu bstan pa'i phyir / / +'di ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46688#46697#TD4036E.TXT.r_3879;TD4036E.TXT.r_3880# kun dang yang dag don rtogs shing // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46698#46707#TD4036E.TXT.r_3880;TD4036E.TXT.r_3881;TD4036E.TXT.r_3882# zhes gang gsungs pa des ni / / +dngos po'i mtha' bstan to // /

column3: 'di ltar kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46706#46720#TD4036E.TXT.r_3881;TD4036E.TXT.r_3882;TD4036E.TXT.r_3883# dngos po'i mtha' bstan to // / +rtag 'grus gzugs brnyan bsam gtan pa // /

column3: de'i phyir yang dag pa'i don du / / +kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i btang snyoms nyid las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46721#46743#TD4036E.TXT.r_3883;TD4036E.TXT.r_3884;TD4036E.TXT.r_3885;TD4036E.TXT.r_3886# zhes gang gsungs pa des ni RNAM PAR RTOG PA DANG bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan dang  rnam par rtog pa  med pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan to // /

column3: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46739#46753#TD4036E.TXT.r_3885;TD4036E.TXT.r_3886;TD4036E.TXT.r_3887;TD4036E.TXT.r_3888# ces gang gsungs pa des ni dgos pa yongs su grub pa bstan to // /

column3: rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba nye bar 'dogs par     // / +byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46754#46763#TD4036E.TXT.r_3887;TD4036E.TXT.r_3888;TD4036E.TXT.r_3889;TD4036E.TXT.r_3890# sems kyi mtshan ma mkhas pa dang / / +rab tu dben pa'i nyams thob dang / /
column5: 5.960#TD4036E.TXT.r#46776#46781#TD4036E.TXT.r_3891;TD4036E.TXT.r_3892;TD4036E.TXT.r_3893# ces kyang gsungs te / / +de la re zhig / /

column3: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: de la bde ba myong ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /

column5: 5.960#TD4036E.TXT.r#46757#46761#TD4036E.TXT.r_3888;TD4036E.TXT.r_3889# rab tu dben pa'i nyams thob dang / / +rtag 'grus dran ldan bsam  gtan pa // /

column3: tshor ba gang byung na bral bar mngon du 'dod par mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#46780#46793#TD4036E.TXT.r_3892;TD4036E.TXT.r_3893;TD4036E.TXT.r_3894# de la re zhig / / +sems kyi mtshan ma mkhas pa dang / /
column5: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#46761#46761#TD4036E.TXT.r_3888;TD4036E.TXT.r_3889# rab tu dben pa'i nyams thob dang / / +rtag 'grus dran ldan bsam  gtan pa // /
column6: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#262239#262239#TD4035E.TXT.r_2662;TD4035E.TXT.r_2663# lus de la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na / / +dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba de nyid la bsil ba dang  sman 'gyur byed kyi reg pa ma yin pa / /

column3: bdag 'di dang nam yang bral bar ma gyur cig snyam pa dang  gang 'gags  na 'phrad par mngon du 'dod pa skye ste / /

column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#1221695#1221696#TD4078E.TXT.r_72# shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul de nyid so sor sna tshogs yang dang yang du rnam par dpyad par bya ste / /

column13: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1867861#1867861#TD4054E.TXT.r_6259# dbang po rnam pa bcu po de dag nyid mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bcu drug pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du slob pa'i lam de la kun zhes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste / /
column14: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772760#2772760#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /

column6: 0.022#TD4085E.TXT.r#2741508#2741509#TD4085E.TXT.r_412# 'di ltar med pa'i mtshan ma'i lta ba dang  brtags pa la skur ba 'debs pa'i lta ba dang  kun tu rtog pa la skur ba 'debs pa'i lta ba dang  de kho na nyid la skur ba 'debs pa'i lta  ba dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang  yongs su bsgyur ba'i lta ba dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lta ba dang  nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba dang  brnyas pa'i lta ba dang  rab tu khro ba'i lta ba dang  phyin ci log gi lta ba dang  bskyed pa'i lta ba dang  khas mi len pa'i lta ba dang  ngan gyo'i lta ba dang  bkur  sti byed pa'i lta ba dang  rmongs pa bstan pa'i lta ba dang  rtsa ba'i lta ba dang  lta ba med pa'i lta ba dang  rab tu sbyor ba 'gegs pa'i lta ba dang  nges par 'byung ba med pa'i lta ba dang  sgrib pa sogs pa'i lta ba dang  bsod nams ma yin pa skyed pa'i lta ba dang  'bras bu med pa'i lta ba dang  nges par 'dzin pa'i    lta ba dang  mi bden pa'i lta ba dang  mi smra ba'i lta ba dang  lta ba chen po dang  mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi lta ba'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so // /

column3: gsung rab las ni tshor ba rnam pa gsum 'byung na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#47111#47119#TD4036E.TXT.r_3921# mchin pa dang  glo ba dang  rgyu ma dang  gnye ma dang  pho ba dang  long ka dang  mcher ba dang  phyi sa dang  mchi ma dang  rdul dang  mchil ma dang  snabs dang  zhag dang  chu sar dang  rkang dang tshil dang mkhris pa dang  bad kan dang  rnag dang   khrag dang  glad spri dang  glad rgyas dang  gcin dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni nang la brten pa'i mi gtsang ba'i mi sdug pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o / /

column3: kun gzhi'i rnam  par shes pa la ci'i phyir spyir bshad / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#47120#47129#TD4036E.TXT.r_3921;TD4036E.TXT.r_3922# mchin pa dang  glo ba dang  rgyu ma dang  gnye ma dang  pho ba dang  long ka dang  mcher ba dang  phyi sa dang  mchi ma dang  rdul dang  mchil ma dang  snabs dang  zhag dang  chu sar dang  rkang dang tshil dang mkhris pa dang  bad kan dang  rnag dang   khrag dang  glad spri dang  glad rgyas dang  gcin dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni nang la brten pa'i mi gtsang ba'i mi sdug pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o / /

column3: de bas na de la tshor ba gang yin pa yang mi shes / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#47130#47138#TD4036E.TXT.r_3922;TD4036E.TXT.r_3923# de la phyi rol la brten pa'i mi gtsang ba'i mi sdig pa nyid gang zhe na / /

column3: de bzhin du gsungs rab las dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gi chos rnam pa bzhi 'byung na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#47139#47152#TD4036E.TXT.r_3922;TD4036E.TXT.r_3923;TD4036E.TXT.r_3924# de la phyi rol la brten pa'i mi gtsang ba'i mi sdig pa nyid gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la gang 'du par 'gyur ba yang mi shes pas de'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#47153#47164#TD4036E.TXT.r_3924# rnam par bsdos pa dang  rnam par rnags    pa dang  rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang  rnam par bam pa dang  rnam par zos pa dang  rnam par dmar ba dang  rnam par 'thor ba dang  rus gong dang  keng rus dang  rus pa'i keng rus dang  bshang bas gos pa dang  gcings  gos pa dang  mchil mas gos pa  dang ; /

column3: de la tshor ba btang  snyoms te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#47165#47175#TD4036E.TXT.r_3924;TD4036E.TXT.r_3925# rnam par bsdos pa dang  rnam par rnags    pa dang  rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang  rnam par bam pa dang  rnam par zos pa dang  rnam par dmar ba dang  rnam par 'thor ba dang  rus gong dang  keng rus dang  rus pa'i keng rus dang  bshang bas gos pa dang  gcings  gos pa dang  mchil mas gos pa  dang ; /

column3: de la zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te de ni go sla bas ma bshad do // /
