column23: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3115175#3115175#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2414;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2415# rgyu med par ni ma yin te / / +dge slong dag srid pa'i rgyu gang zhe na / /
column24: 0.015#TD4079E.TXT.r#1385732#1385732#TD4079E.TXT.r_1640;TD4079E.TXT.r_1641# nyams pa med pas na mi gyo ba'o // / +de las gzhan pa'i bde ba las khyad par du 'phags pas na  dam pa'o // /
column25: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2902718#2902718#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1248;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1249# gzugs ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir  rgyud ma'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag go / / +gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams dag la yang rig par bya'o // /

column6: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#707776#707778#TD4044E.TXT.r_1358;TD4044E.TXT.r_1359;TD4044E.TXT.r_1360# gang du bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i de lta bu byung ba dag kyang ltar bzhed ce na / / +cha phra ba'am / / +bar chad med pa'i tshul gyis so // /

column15: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1876303#1876304#TD4054E.TXT.r_6980# dbang po zhi  ba thob pa dang  'gro ba bzang po thob pa dang  bsil ba'i gnas yin pas tshul khrims te go rims bzhin du dbang po rnams sdom par byed pa dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang  'gyod pa med pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57231#57235#TD4036E.TXT.r_4775;TD4036E.TXT.r_4776# klog tu 'jug la de'i 'og tu zab mo dag 'dzin du 'jug cing klog tu 'jug pa dang  dang po kho nar bden pa sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'doms par byed la / / +de'i 'og tu bden pa kun 'byung ba dang  'gog pa dang lam mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'doms par byed  ba dang  dang po kho nar bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa 'doms par byed la / /
column5: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1707593#1707594#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6260# ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa mang po de dag nye bar mi phrad cing mi brjod pa'i chos kyi phyir ldan pa yang ma yin / /
column6: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1724493#1724494#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7471;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7472# 'khor ba'i dus na ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon  mongs pa'i chos dang ldan par zad / / +mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus na ni dad pa la sogs ba rnam par byang ba'i chos dang ldan par zad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i bdag rtag pa gang yang med do zhes bsgom pa ni bdag med pa'i rnam pa la bsgom pa zhes bya ste / /
column7: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1724566#1724567#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7476# lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par bya ba'i phyir / /

column19: 0.015#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1910366#1910366#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_197;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_198# rang gi ngo bos yid du 'ong ba'i phyir ni bde ba nyid yin la rnam par 'gyur ba dang mi rtag pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rnam grangs kyis ni sdug bsngal nyid yin no // / +de la    bde bar mthong na ni 'dod chags can rnams de'i ro myong bar byed pa'i phyir 'ching bar 'gyur la / /
column20: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#56140#56140#TD4036E.TXT.r_4693;TD4036E.TXT.r_4694# de ni reg bar bya ba dang  mngon sum du BYA BA YIN NO // / +bden pa lam ni sman gyi gnas lta bu ste / /

column30: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1876290#1876292#TD4054E.TXT.r_6979# so so'i nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin bdag gi dbul ba sel ba dang  len pa po rnams kyi gdung ba sel ba'i phyir sbyin pa'o // /

column5: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#28217#28218#TD4036E.TXT.r_2294# 'o ma dang  zho dang  mar dang  zhun mar dang  'bru mar dang  sbrang rtsi dang  bu ram gyi dbu ba dang  sha dang  nya sha dang  sha skam dang  lan  tshva dang ; /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57719#57737#TD4036E.TXT.r_4824;TD4036E.TXT.r_4825;TD4036E.TXT.r_4826# bden pa bzhi po dag la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa gang yin pa ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57738#57748#TD4036E.TXT.r_4826;TD4036E.TXT.r_4827;TD4036E.TXT.r_4828# ci'i phyir bslab pa gsum po kho nar zad la / /

column3: 'di ltar sdig pa mkhyud ba'i mi la 'gyod pa skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57759#57768#TD4036E.TXT.r_4829;TD4036E.TXT.r_4830# ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don dang  ye shes kyi rten gyi don dang  bya ba byas pa'i don gyi phyir te / /
column5: 0.015#TD4069E.TXT.r#1138984#1138986#TD4069E.TXT.r_1714# bu med pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyid log pa na srog gcod pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa na che gzhan gyi las dang  de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal ba la sogs par 'grub bar 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3121442#3121447#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2926;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2927# mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su spong bar sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus kyang yod / /
column7: 0.018#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2942218#2942219#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4475;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4476# skyed pa'i rgyu ni de dag las skye  pa'i phyir ro // / +brten pa'i rgyu ni skyes pa 'byung ba'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i phyir te / /
column8: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100645#3100648#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1253;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1254# ji ltar rtogs pa dang  ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du yang mi byed la / / +ji ltar thos pa dang  ji ltar rtogs pa dang  ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gcig tu dben par song ste / /
column9: 0.018#TD4068E.TXT.r#1090204#1090204#TD4068E.TXT.r_4182# drug dang yid kyi khams te bdun dang  chos kyi khams kyis bsnan nas brgyad de / /
column10: 0.018#TD4011E.TXT.r#641803#641806#TD4011E.TXT.r_519# 'gro ba thams cad na sems can gang su dag bdag dang 'dra bar ma la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du spyi bor 'khor los dral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po mtha' yas pa sdug pa dag kho nas 'khor ba ji srid du rgyun ma chad par myong bar 'gyur te / /
column11: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100637#3100637#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1253# ji ltar rtogs pa dang  ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du yang mi byed la / /
column12: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#577226#577227#TD4026E.TXT.r_7607# de la mtshan ma la spyod pa ni sa gnyis pa nas bzung ste sa drug pa'i bar du'o // /
column13: 0.020#TD4048E.TXT.r#3073110#3073110#TD4048E.TXT.r_1051# 'bral du 'dod pa bzhin du lus thams cad phun sum tshogs par skye na / /
column14: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#457160#457160#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4486# bdag gis bram ze'i smrang brtags pa las / / +de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' yul gyi lhums su 'jug pa ni glang po che'i gzugs mchog go zhes bsngags te / /
column15: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3121360#3121362#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2919;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2920# de la dge ba'i chos rnams  la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag ste / /
column16: 0.024#TD4067E.TXT.r#1978206#1978206#TD4067E.TXT.r_295# 'jig rten gyi grags pa ni 'jig rten pa'i brjod pa ste / /
column17: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1251209#1251209#TD4091E.TXT.r_320# phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dag bshad zin to // /
column18: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#254591#254591#TD4035E.TXT.r_2028;TD4035E.TXT.r_2029# sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams so // / +'du shes med pa ni 'bras bu che ba'i nang     // /
column19: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1138858#1138859#TD4069E.TXT.r_1706# sems drag shul can nyid ni gsod pa dang  rab tu gsod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba 'dis so // /
column20: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#1275586#1275587#TD4091E.TXT.r_2658# yul gzhan du skye ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i bar ma yin pas / /
column21: 0.029#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1927658#1927658#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1629;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1630# der mthar phyin zhes 'byung phyir ro // / +gzugs na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la chags pa'i phyir dang  sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir kun du skyo bar mi 'gyur la / /

column3: 'gyod pa ni gdon mi za bar yid mi bde ba  dang mtshungs par ldan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57769#57778#TD4036E.TXT.r_4829;TD4036E.TXT.r_4830# ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don dang  ye shes kyi rten gyi don dang  bya ba byas pa'i don gyi phyir te / / +de la ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yin te / /

column5: 0.007#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1703658#1703670#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5975;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5976;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5977# sangs rgyas kyi sa'i stong pa nyid dus kyi stong pa nyid de bzhin nyid de'i mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin ci 'dra zhe  na / / +sgrib pa gnyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid de zhes bya ba smos te / /
column6: 0.011#TD4069E.TXT.r#1161898#1161898#TD4069E.TXT.r_3462# de'i gnyen por sems kun du btung pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa yin no // /
column7: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#12511#12513#TD4036E.TXT.r_894# GNYID KYI BDE BA DANG  nyal ba'i bde ba dang  glos 'bebs  pa'i bde ba bdag gir byed pa dang  mi mkhas pa dang le lo can dang  sgrub mi phyod pa yin zhing / /
column8: 0.012#TD4095E.TXT.r#129571#129572#TD4095E.TXT.r_1464;TD4095E.TXT.r_1465# mngon par shes pa dang lung du ma bstan pa gnyis dang sprul pa'i sems ma gtogs pa'o // /
column9: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#33549#33549#TD4036E.TXT.r_2671# shes  nas dad pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gsungs pa gang yin pa dag yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung nas / /
column10: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#45061#45061#TD4036E.TXT.r_3727;TD4036E.TXT.r_3728# rnal 'byor ba de brtag par bya ba shes  bya'i dngos po'i rang bzhin de la yang dag par rtog par byed pa na / / +yon tan dang skyon nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni / /
column11: 0.014#TD4095E.TXT.r#170331#170331#TD4095E.TXT.r_5555# de la re zhig gang dag nyon  mongs pa yin pa de dag ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang yin te / /
column12: 0.014#TD4085E.TXT.r#2738473#2738473#TD4085E.TXT.r_169# ltar gyur bas de myong ba yang 'khrul pa dang gzhan myong ba lta bur myong ba'o // /
column13: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1660211#1660211#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2619# chos la bdag med pa mthong ba las byang chub sems dpa' rnams bde ba skye ste / /
column14: 0.015#TD4071E.TXT.r#728626#728628#TD4071E.TXT.r_182# ri dags dang  phag  la sogs pa'i gzugs tha dad par ro // /
column15: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1127959#1127959#TD4069E.TXT.r_884# 'gro  ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin du gnas pa yin / /
column16: 0.016#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772759#2772759#TD4061E.TXT.r_2426;TD4061E.TXT.r_2427# tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs pa can yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas  pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa can tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column17: 0.016#TD4061E.TXT.r#2779282#2779282#TD4061E.TXT.r_2899# de bas na 'di ni mi 'dra'o zhe na / /
column18: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1195870#1195870#TD4069E.TXT.r_6039;TD4069E.TXT.r_6040# mig ni ma skyes pa las skye zhing zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro // / +de bzhin du gzugs 'das pa yod do zhes gsungs na / /
column19: 0.023#TD4043E.TXT.r#672087#672087#TD4043E.TXT.r_1872# gro bzhin skyes kyi mdo las kyang nges pa kho na yin par gsungs kyi 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bkag go // /
column20: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2582725#2582725#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3103;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3104# phreng ba bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba ni phreng ba ma 'grus par kor kor por gnas pa yin no // / +skra'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam zhig lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab dag gis ma khebs  so zhes grag go zhes bya ba la / /
column21: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1905403#1905403#TD4054E.TXT.r_9373# de la cal col ni gang skabs bor te gtam sna tshogs rgyas par byed pa'o // /
column22: 0.024#TD4068E.TXT.r#1065989#1065989#TD4068E.TXT.r_2677# tshig de'ang gang zhe na 'di lta ste / /
column23: 0.024#TD4071E.TXT.r#746768#746768#TD4071E.TXT.r_1774;TD4071E.TXT.r_1775# yongs su bsgo bar byed pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +'ga' zhig la  sa bon dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan yang mi srid par ston to // /
column24: 0.024#TD4095E.TXT.r#169330#169330#TD4095E.TXT.r_5450# lta ba 'ba' zhig ni  gsal ba'i phyir 'jog pa'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas bsres nas gzhag go // /
column25: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1768904#1768904#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10730# chos 'chad pa'i dus na mu stegs pas brgal na mi thub pa'o snyam pa'i 'jigs pa mi mnga' bas na mi zhum pa zhes bya'o // /
column26: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1812423#1812423#TD4054E.TXT.r_1223# rnam par rtog pa gsum ni rang  bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa dang  rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mngon par dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // /
column27: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1811958#1811958#TD4054E.TXT.r_1178# gzugs can gyi khams bcu po gang de nyid skye mched bcu'o // /
column28: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1812069#1812069#TD4054E.TXT.r_1192# mig dang  rna ba dang  sna rnams so so la yang gnyis gnyis yod na / /
column29: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1812151#1812151#TD4054E.TXT.r_1198# de ltar ngos gnyis shin du rnam par mdzes na gnas mdzes kyi gzhan du ma yin no // /
column30: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1812207#1812207#TD4054E.TXT.r_1202# dper na mig gnyi ga phye na gzugs 'dzin pa la gsal bar 'gyur gyi gcig gis ni de ltar ma yin no // /
column31: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1344555#1344555#TD4091E.TXT.r_9043;TD4091E.TXT.r_9044# mdo las ji skad du gang zhig gis lhag pa'i sems bzhi la mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa thob pa de ni / / +de gang  yang rung ba zhig las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar nga smra'i / /
column32: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1344669#1344669#TD4091E.TXT.r_9052;TD4091E.TXT.r_9053# yongs su nyams pa de dag las // / +ston la tha ma mi gyo ba // /
column33: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1344751#1344751#TD4091E.TXT.r_9060;TD4091E.TXT.r_9061# de'i phyir mi gyo ba'i chos can longs spyod las yongs su nyams par 'byung ba'i phyir mdo dang mi 'gal lo // / +yang dgra bcom pa gang zhig 'bras bu las yongs su nyams na ci de yang skye zhe na / /
column34: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1344802#1344802#TD4091E.TXT.r_9066# de lta ma yin na tshangs par spyod pa yid brtan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro // /
column35: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#32545#32545#TD4036E.TXT.r_2585;TD4036E.TXT.r_2586# de ltar na skul bar byed pa yin no // / +ji ltar na dran par byed pa yin zhe na / /
column36: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#45967#45968#TD4036E.TXT.r_3808# rnam par rtog pa spyad pa kho na zhig yin na ni / /
column37: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2716993#2716993#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11634# de yid bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum tha dad pa'i sgo nas ni rnam pa gsum  du dbye'o // /
column38: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1674088#1674088#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3655# las de gnyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs sa bcad pa rtsom mo    zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column39: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1208475#1208475#TD4069E.TXT.r_7004# gsod pa dang  'ching ba dang  gcod pa dang  rdeg pa las slar ldog par byed do // /
column40: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#1063360#1063361#TD4068E.TXT.r_2502;TD4068E.TXT.r_2503# ris 'dra ba'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // / +de'i lan du gang sems can rnams kyi lus 'dra ba'o  zhes bya ba smos te / /
column41: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1140088#1140088#TD4069E.TXT.r_1792# rnam pa snga ma mi srid na phyi ma 'dri ba yin pa ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnam pa snga ma mi srid na brtan pa la sogs pa phyi ma 'dri ba yin no // /
column42: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#92525#92525#TD4036E.TXT.r_7676;TD4036E.TXT.r_7677# cha gsum po zhi gnas kyi phyogs dang  rnam par gyeng ba'i phyogs dang  lhag  mthong gi phyogs rnams su mos bar gyis shig / / +de la zhi gnas kyi phyogs la ni gang gi tshe sems nang du mngon par sdud par byed pa na de la mtshan ma med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa dang  gyeng ba med pa dang  spro ba med pa dang  kun du 'khrug pa  med pa dang  yongs su gdung ba med pa dang  yid brtan du mi rung ba dang  sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang  rnam par gyeng ba med pa la dmigs pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gzugs can ma yin pa bzhi ni / /
column43: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1670915#1670915#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3407# ba'i lam la chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du gyur pa dang  de nas gzung ba'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral te / /
column44: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#976935#976935#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12139# de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam yang dag 'phags  kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni mdo'i tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa ston te // /

column3: 'tshig pa gang yin snyam pa la / /

column3: 'tshig pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
tshig brlang po zher 'debs pa ni 'tshig pa'o // / +tshig brlang po bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57807#57817#TD4036E.TXT.r_4832;TD4036E.TXT.r_4833;TD4036E.TXT.r_4834# de la ye shes kyi rten gyi don ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa yin te / /

column3: tshig brlang po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57818#57825#TD4036E.TXT.r_4833;TD4036E.TXT.r_4834# 'di ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa'i dran pa rtse gcig pas / / +shes bya'i dngos po la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes dang mthong  ba 'jug par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: mtshang 'bru ba'i tshul gyis zhe gcod ba dang drag pa gang yin pa de tshig brlang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57826#57840#TD4036E.TXT.r_4834;TD4036E.TXT.r_4835;TD4036E.TXT.r_4836# shes bya'i dngos po la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes dang mthong  ba 'jug par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.016#TD4068E.TXT.r#1046796#1046797#TD4068E.TXT.r_1390# nga rgyal gyi rang  bzhin bstan pa'i phyir nga rgyal gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column6: 0.029#TD4041E.TXT.r#2309827#2309827#TD4041E.TXT.r_812;TD4041E.TXT.r_813# bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni dang por mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren    par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas lha dang mi'i bar la yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o // /

column3: drag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jebs pa'o // / +zher 'debs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57838#57851#TD4036E.TXT.r_4835;TD4036E.TXT.r_4836;TD4036E.TXT.r_4837# de la bya ba byas pa'i don ni // / +lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yin te / /

column3: zher 'debs par byed pa'i dang tshul ni zhes bya ba la  sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#57852#57863#TD4036E.TXT.r_4837;TD4036E.TXT.r_4838# 'di ltar ye shes dang mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa spong pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#59181#59182#TD4036E.TXT.r_4942# mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang  mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang  sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang  zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang  'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes     // /

column3: sems las byung ba 'di ni zher 'debs pa'i rang bzhin te / /

column9: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#59106#59108#TD4036E.TXT.r_4937# chos sems shing rnam 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon yin par rig par rig par bya ba de dag dang  bsam  gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'i ro myong bar byed pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i rje sus 'brangs pa dang  lus kyi reg pa sdug bsngal ba dag dang  srog 'phrog par byed pa'i bar dag gis reg par 'gyur pa srog la  'chums shing srog la re la / /
column10: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#58720#58727#TD4036E.TXT.r_4921# med cing yod pa ma yin pa de la smon pa yang mad smon pa med pa yang med do zhes ji lta bu kho nar med pa de lta bu kho nar med pa yin no zhes shes shing mthong ba'i sgo nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid rnam par gzhag ste / /

column14: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#58871#58874#TD4036E.TXT.r_4931# snyom las byed pa dang  'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang  khams kyi zas la brten te to chags ba dang  'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud kyi gtam pa du ma rnam pa mang po sna tshogs bkram pa dag la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi rje su chags pa dang  chos sems shing  rnal 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon te / /
column15: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#58966#58966#TD4036E.TXT.r_4934# dkon mchog dang  bden pa dang  phung po dang  las dang 'bras bu dag la ni ma nur dang  yid gnyis dang  the tshom za ba dang  spong pa la brtson pa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len pa dang  lhod pa'i    zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi skyon yid la byed pa dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid kyis sems zil gyis non cing sems mngon par bsdus pa dang  ha cang brtsal drags pas lus ngal zhing sems 'khrugs pa dang  brtson 'grus ha cang zhan pas khyad par mi 'thob cing  dag pa'i phyogs gtugs pa dang  rnyed pa dang  grags pa dang  bsngags pa dang  bde ba gang yang rung ba chung zad ma gyis dga' zhing / /
column16: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#58473#58474#TD4036E.TXT.r_4895;TD4036E.TXT.r_4896# bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs ma thag tu phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro // / +de la dbang po ni gsum ste / /

column7: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#59209#59210#TD4036E.TXT.r_4944;TD4036E.TXT.r_4945# snang ba'i 'du shes dang  'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang  'gog pa'i 'du shes dang  'chi ba'i 'du shes te / / +'du shes bcu po de dag kun du bsten cing goms par byas // /

column10: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#58237#58240#TD4036E.TXT.r_4874;TD4036E.TXT.r_4875# 'phags pa nyan thos slob pa bzhi mthong ba / / +bsam gtan rnams kyi dngos gzhi ma thob pa de'i 'og tu bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam spangs pa'i phyir brtson par byed pa na / /

column13: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#59145#59146#TD4036E.TXT.r_4939# bcu po de dang ni bslab pa dang mi mthun pa'i chos rnams yin no // /
column14: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#59014#59014#TD4036E.TXT.r_4935# yid bde ba dang  rgod cing nye bar ma zhi ba dang  'phyar zhing gyeng bar byed pa dang  'jig tshogs 'gog pa'i mya ngan las  'das pa la skrag cing dngang bar byed pa dang  drod mi 'dzin par smra ba la brtson zhing ha cang mang du smra la / /

column12: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#58764#58773#TD4036E.TXT.r_4922;TD4036E.TXT.r_4923;TD4036E.TXT.r_4924# de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum  po de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yin no // / +de la bslab pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / /
column13: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#58939#58947#TD4036E.TXT.r_4934# dkon mchog dang  bden pa dang  phung po dang  las dang 'bras bu dag la ni ma nur dang  yid gnyis dang  the tshom za ba dang  spong pa la brtson pa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len pa dang  lhod pa'i    zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi skyon yid la byed pa dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid kyis sems zil gyis non cing sems mngon par bsdus pa dang  ha cang brtsal drags pas lus ngal zhing sems 'khrugs pa dang  brtson 'grus ha cang zhan pas khyad par mi 'thob cing  dag pa'i phyogs gtugs pa dang  rnyed pa dang  grags pa dang  bsngags pa dang  bde ba gang yang rung ba chung zad ma gyis dga' zhing / /
column14: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59029#59032#TD4036E.TXT.r_4936# chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer na rtsod pa'i gtam dang  nyes rtsom gyi rjes su brtson pa dang  sngon mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  nyams su myong ba dang  rnam par shes  pa rnam pa du ma rnam pa mang po sna tshogs dag la se nas 'phro zhing sems gyeng bar byed pa dang  bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i gnas gzhan dag la des par rtog par byed pa nyid yin te / /
column15: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59091#59099#TD4036E.TXT.r_4937# chos sems shing rnam 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon yin par rig par rig par bya ba de dag dang  bsam  gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'i ro myong bar byed pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i rje sus 'brangs pa dang  lus kyi reg pa sdug bsngal ba dag dang  srog 'phrog par byed pa'i bar dag gis reg par 'gyur pa srog la  'chums shing srog la re la / /
column16: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59154#59163#TD4036E.TXT.r_4939;TD4036E.TXT.r_4940# bcu po de dang ni bslab pa dang mi mthun pa'i chos rnams yin no // / +bslab pa dang mi mthun pa de dag gi gnyen po bslab pa dang rjes su mthun pa bcu gang zhe na / /
column17: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59331#59336#TD4036E.TXT.r_4952# sngon gyis rgyud dang  rje sus mthun pa'i lung dang  tshul gzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang  rtag  tu gus par byas te byed pa dang  'dun pa drag po dang  rnal 'byor gyi stobs skyed pa dang  lus dang sems kyi gnas nang len shin tu sbyang pa dang  yang dag yang dud so sor rtog pa dang  yongs su gdung med pa dang  mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'o // /
column18: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#59661#59665#TD4036E.TXT.r_4976;TD4036E.TXT.r_4977# rang bzhin gyis shin tu sbyong bar byed pa dang  nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa las nyon mongs pa'i  phyogs kyi lus dang  sems kyi gnas ngan len dang ma bral zhing rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba de dag yang dag pa'i lam bsgoms pas shin tu sbyong bar byed pa'o // / +de la yang dang yang du so sor rtog pa gang zhe na / /

column3: de'i phyir de dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o // / +'di nyid la bshad pa gzhan bya ba'i phyir / /

column7: 5.960#TD4036E.TXT.r#58966#58966#TD4036E.TXT.r_4934# dkon mchog dang  bden pa dang  phung po dang  las dang 'bras bu dag la ni ma nur dang  yid gnyis dang  the tshom za ba dang  spong pa la brtson pa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len pa dang  lhod pa'i    zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi skyon yid la byed pa dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid kyis sems zil gyis non cing sems mngon par bsdus pa dang  ha cang brtsal drags pas lus ngal zhing sems 'khrugs pa dang  brtson 'grus ha cang zhan pas khyad par mi 'thob cing  dag pa'i phyogs gtugs pa dang  rnyed pa dang  grags pa dang  bsngags pa dang  bde ba gang yang rung ba chung zad ma gyis dga' zhing / /

column25: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2712933#2712933#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11379;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11380# de yang ci'i phyir ming nyid yin zhe na zhes bya ba ni ming du 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ming de yang rgyu gang gis ming nyid yin zhe na / / +don de dang de dag la ming de gzhol  bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar don de dag la phung po bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyi ming gzhol bar byed cing 'jug par byed pas de lta bas na 'di ni ming nyid yin te / /

column36: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#2004864#2004864#TD4050E.TXT.r_858;TD4050E.TXT.r_859# sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la brten nas thos pa'i bag chags 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa thos pa'i bag chags de nyid do brten nas zhes bya ba ni gang gi rgud las 'jug pa ste / / +de yang lhan cig  'dug pa'i tshul gyis chu dang 'o ma bzhin du ngo bo gcig par 'jug par 'gyur na yang de de'i ngo bo ma yin pa nyid de / /
column37: 0.026#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1955525#1955525#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4034# gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs nas ni // /
column38: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2470606#2470606#TD4037E.TXT.r_6675;TD4037E.TXT.r_6676# sems can gyi khams la nyi tshe ba ni ma yin te / / +de ltar na mnyes gshin pa rnam pa bdun po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bsam pa can  mchog tu dge ba'i bsam pa can zhes bya'o // /
column39: 0.027#TD4061E.TXT.r#2784489#2784491#TD4061E.TXT.r_3294;TD4061E.TXT.r_3295# kun dga' bo ngas 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid dang  'du byed 'gyur ba nyid la dgongs nas gang ci tshor yang rung ste / / +de ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs pa yin no // /

column42: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2920037#2920037#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2700# mtshungs pa rnam pa lnga po rten dang dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang dus dang rdzas mtshungs pa dag  gis mtshungs par ldan no // /

column44: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#250764#250764#TD4035E.TXT.r_1673# 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang  bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang ldan pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa dang  zag pa med par bsdus pa'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#61347#61350#TD4036E.TXT.r_5112# yid la byed pa thob pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'gro ba na mtshan nyid sos sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa gang yin pa ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#34952#34952#TD4036E.TXT.r_2800# de ltar na rigs pa bzhis phung po bstan pa dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba bstan pa la nges par rtogs par byed pa yin te / /

column3: gyo ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa yang dag pa'i gdams ngag rnyed pa de la bar chad byed do // /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59080#59082#TD4036E.TXT.r_4937# chos sems shing rnam 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon yin par rig par rig par bya ba de dag dang  bsam  gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'i ro myong bar byed pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i rje sus 'brangs pa dang  lus kyi reg pa sdug bsngal ba dag dang  srog 'phrog par byed pa'i bar dag gis reg par 'gyur pa srog la  'chums shing srog la re la / /

column7: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#58159#58159#TD4036E.TXT.r_4867;TD4036E.TXT.r_4868# lhag pa'i don ti lta bu yin zhe na / / +lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gang yin pa dang  lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa gang yin pa dang  lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gang yin pa'i bslab pa de dag ni bstan pa'i 'di kho na la yod  kyi ; /

column10: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#58852#58862#TD4036E.TXT.r_4930;TD4036E.TXT.r_4931# lam 'gog par byed pa chen po yin pa dang  'jig tshogs su gtogs pa'i 'du byed rnams la 'chums par byed pa dang  le le  dang ; / +snyom las byed pa dang  'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang  khams kyi zas la brten te to chags ba dang  'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud kyi gtam pa du ma rnam pa mang po sna tshogs bkram pa dag la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi rje su chags pa dang  chos sems shing  rnal 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon te / /
column11: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#58713#58713#TD4036E.TXT.r_4920;TD4036E.TXT.r_4921# rnam par  thar pa sgo mtshan ma med pa rnam par gzhag go / / +med cing yod pa ma yin pa de la smon pa yang mad smon pa med pa yang med do zhes ji lta bu kho nar med pa de lta bu kho nar med pa yin no zhes shes shing mthong ba'i sgo nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid rnam par gzhag ste / /
column12: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#58132#58132#TD4036E.TXT.r_4865# nyon mongs pa spong pa'i dbang du byas pa'i ye shes dang  mthong ba gang yin pa de ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab  pa yin te / /

column3: rnam par tho 'tshems pa ji lta bu zhig snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#58631#58633#TD4036E.TXT.r_4912;TD4036E.TXT.r_4913# yin pa dang  'dus ma byas gang yin pa de gnyis ni yod pa zhes bya'o // / +bdag dang  sems can dang  srog dang  skye ba po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni med pa zhes bya'o // /

column8: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#58861#58862#TD4036E.TXT.r_4931# snyom las byed pa dang  'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang  khams kyi zas la brten te to chags ba dang  'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud kyi gtam pa du ma rnam pa mang po sna tshogs bkram pa dag la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi rje su chags pa dang  chos sems shing  rnal 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon te / /
column9: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#58956#58957#TD4036E.TXT.r_4934# dkon mchog dang  bden pa dang  phung po dang  las dang 'bras bu dag la ni ma nur dang  yid gnyis dang  the tshom za ba dang  spong pa la brtson pa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len pa dang  lhod pa'i    zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi skyon yid la byed pa dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid kyis sems zil gyis non cing sems mngon par bsdus pa dang  ha cang brtsal drags pas lus ngal zhing sems 'khrugs pa dang  brtson 'grus ha cang zhan pas khyad par mi 'thob cing  dag pa'i phyogs gtugs pa dang  rnyed pa dang  grags pa dang  bsngags pa dang  bde ba gang yang rung ba chung zad ma gyis dga' zhing / /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59328#59341#TD4036E.TXT.r_4952# sngon gyis rgyud dang  rje sus mthun pa'i lung dang  tshul gzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang  rtag  tu gus par byas te byed pa dang  'dun pa drag po dang  rnal 'byor gyi stobs skyed pa dang  lus dang sems kyi gnas nang len shin tu sbyang pa dang  yang dag yang dud so sor rtog pa dang  yongs su gdung med pa dang  mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'o // /

column16: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#58848#58852#TD4036E.TXT.r_4930;TD4036E.TXT.r_4931# lam 'gog par byed pa chen po yin pa dang  'jig tshogs su gtogs pa'i 'du byed rnams la 'chums par byed pa dang  le le  dang ; / +snyom las byed pa dang  'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang  khams kyi zas la brten te to chags ba dang  'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud kyi gtam pa du ma rnam pa mang po sna tshogs bkram pa dag la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi rje su chags pa dang  chos sems shing  rnal 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon te / /
column17: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#58941#58945#TD4036E.TXT.r_4934# dkon mchog dang  bden pa dang  phung po dang  las dang 'bras bu dag la ni ma nur dang  yid gnyis dang  the tshom za ba dang  spong pa la brtson pa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len pa dang  lhod pa'i    zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi skyon yid la byed pa dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid kyis sems zil gyis non cing sems mngon par bsdus pa dang  ha cang brtsal drags pas lus ngal zhing sems 'khrugs pa dang  brtson 'grus ha cang zhan pas khyad par mi 'thob cing  dag pa'i phyogs gtugs pa dang  rnyed pa dang  grags pa dang  bsngags pa dang  bde ba gang yang rung ba chung zad ma gyis dga' zhing / /
column18: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#59093#59097#TD4036E.TXT.r_4937# chos sems shing rnam 'byor yid la byed pa'i skyon yin par rig par rig par bya ba de dag dang  bsam  gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'i ro myong bar byed pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i rje sus 'brangs pa dang  lus kyi reg pa sdug bsngal ba dag dang  srog 'phrog par byed pa'i bar dag gis reg par 'gyur pa srog la  'chums shing srog la re la / /
column19: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#59157#59161#TD4036E.TXT.r_4940# bslab pa dang mi mthun pa de dag gi gnyen po bslab pa dang rjes su mthun pa bcu gang zhe na / /
column20: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#58373#58374#TD4036E.TXT.r_4885;TD4036E.TXT.r_4886# de ni re zhig gang la rnal 'byor ba rnal 'byor la brtson pas / / +bslab par bya ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no // /
column21: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#59029#59030#TD4036E.TXT.r_4936# chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer na rtsod pa'i gtam dang  nyes rtsom gyi rjes su brtson pa dang  sngon mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  nyams su myong ba dang  rnam par shes  pa rnam pa du ma rnam pa mang po sna tshogs dag la se nas 'phro zhing sems gyeng bar byed pa dang  bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i gnas gzhan dag la des par rtog par byed pa nyid yin te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59735#59745#TD4036E.TXT.r_4981;TD4036E.TXT.r_4982;TD4036E.TXT.r_4983;TD4036E.TXT.r_4984# yang dang yang du so sor rtog par byed pa ste / / +de la spangs par shes nas / /

column3: ci'i phyir de dad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59744#59754#TD4036E.TXT.r_4983;TD4036E.TXT.r_4984;TD4036E.TXT.r_4985;TD4036E.TXT.r_4986# yid bde bar 'gyur la / / +ma spangs par shes na yang dang yang du la ma de nyid la     // /

column3: dad  pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59755#59763#TD4036E.TXT.r_4985;TD4036E.TXT.r_4986;TD4036E.TXT.r_4987# sgom par byed pa'o // / +de la yongs su gdung ba med pa gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59888#59892#TD4036E.TXT.r_4996;TD4036E.TXT.r_4997;TD4036E.TXT.r_4998# de la rnal 'byor nyams pa gang zhe na / / +smras pa / /

column3: don de ni brda phrad par zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59764#59771#TD4036E.TXT.r_4986;TD4036E.TXT.r_4987# de la yongs su gdung ba med pa gang zhe na / / +dus gzhan gyis shes par bya ba dang  mthong bar bya ba dang  rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa ste / /

column3: ma dad pa ni de las bzlog pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang go sla bas ma bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59772#59785#TD4036E.TXT.r_4987;TD4036E.TXT.r_4988# dus gzhan gyis shes par bya ba dang  mthong bar bya ba dang  rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa ste / /

column3: las bstan pa'i phyir / / +le lo'i rten byed pa'i las can no zhes bya ba smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59784#59801#TD4036E.TXT.r_4988;TD4036E.TXT.r_4989# ma shes pa dang  ma mthong pa dang  ma rtogs pa'i sgo nas sems ngal ba dang  sems  la gnod pa'i yongs su gdung ba skye ste / /

column3: de dgrol ba'i phyir / / +ma dad pa  ni sbyor ba la 'dun pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59800#59823#TD4036E.TXT.r_4989;TD4036E.TXT.r_4990;TD4036E.TXT.r_4991# de dag skyes pa na dang du mi len cing spong bar byed pa'o // /

column3: 'di ltar ji srid du ngo bo 'ga' zhig la yid ches pa dang  'dod pa ma skyes pa de srid du sbyor ba la 'dun pa nyid mi skye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59824#59831#TD4036E.TXT.r_4991;TD4036E.TXT.r_4992# rtogs pa dang  thob pa dang  reg pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med cing phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59832#59844#TD4036E.TXT.r_4992# thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang   rtogs pa la rtogs par 'du shes pa dang  mngon sum du byas pa la mngon sum du byas par 'du shes pa'o // /

column3: de'i phyir 'di'i las ni le lo'i rgyu nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59843#59854#TD4036E.TXT.r_4992;TD4036E.TXT.r_4993# thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang   rtogs pa la rtogs par 'du shes pa dang  mngon sum du byas pa la mngon sum du byas par 'du shes pa'o // /

column3: le lo gang yin snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59852#59862#TD4036E.TXT.r_4993;TD4036E.TXT.r_4994# chos bcu po de dag ni dang po dang bar pa dang tha ma la brten te / /

column3: le lo ni dge ba     // / +la sems mngon par mi spro ba ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59861#59870#TD4036E.TXT.r_4993;TD4036E.TXT.r_4994;TD4036E.TXT.r_4995# chos bcu po de dag ni dang po dang bar pa dang tha ma la brten te / / +rnal 'byor pa bslab pa 'dod pa'i bslab pa dang rjes su mthun par byed pa yin pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59871#59878#TD4036E.TXT.r_4994;TD4036E.TXT.r_4995# rnal 'byor pa bslab pa 'dod pa'i bslab pa dang rjes su mthun par byed pa yin pas / / +de'i phyir bslab pa dang rjes su  mthun pa rnams zhes bya'o // /

column3: de dgrol ba'i phyir / / +nyal ba dang  snyes pa dang 'phres pa'i bde ba la brten nas gti mug gi char gtogs pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba la sems mngon par spro ba med pa gang  yin pa'o zhes bya ba smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59757#59763#TD4036E.TXT.r_4985;TD4036E.TXT.r_4986;TD4036E.TXT.r_4987# sgom par byed pa'o // / +de la yongs su gdung BA MED PA GANG ZHE na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59879#59889#TD4036E.TXT.r_4995;TD4036E.TXT.r_4996;TD4036E.TXT.r_4997# de'i phyir bslab pa dang rjes su  mthun pa rnams zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59890#59905#TD4036E.TXT.r_4996;TD4036E.TXT.r_4997;TD4036E.TXT.r_4998;TD4036E.TXT.r_4999;TD4036E.TXT.r_5000# de la rnal 'byor nyams pa gang zhe na / / +smras pa / / +rnal 'byor nyams pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59905#59914#TD4036E.TXT.r_4999;TD4036E.TXT.r_5000;TD4036E.TXT.r_5001;TD4036E.TXT.r_5002# bzhi gang zhe na / / +rnal 'byor nyams pa gtan du ba yang yod / /

column3: nyal ba'i bde ba dang  snyes pa dang  'phres pa'i pa'i bde ba la brten nas gti mug gi char gtogs pa lus la sogs pa'i las dge ba la sems mngon par spro ba mi skye ba gang yin pa de le lo'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59913#59923#TD4036E.TXT.r_5001;TD4036E.TXT.r_5002;TD4036E.TXT.r_5003# re zhig pa yang yod / / +thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang  yod // /

column3: dge ba'i phyogs la spro ba gang yin pa de la sgrib par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59950#59968#TD4036E.TXT.r_5005;TD4036E.TXT.r_5006;TD4036E.TXT.r_5007# gang zag rigs med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi yin par rig par bya ste / / +de dag ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir / /

column3: bdag med pa gang yin snyam pa la / /
bag med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59969#59976#TD4036E.TXT.r_5007;TD4036E.TXT.r_5008# rnal 'byor las gtan du nyams pa kho na yin no // /

column3: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa la  sems mi ldog cing 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa dge ba la goms par mi byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59986#59997#TD4036E.TXT.r_5009;TD4036E.TXT.r_5010# 'di lta ste / / +gang zag rigs la gnas pa yongs su myang ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can rkyen dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#59998#60005#TD4036E.TXT.r_5010;TD4036E.TXT.r_5011# gang zag rigs la gnas pa yongs su myang ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can rkyen dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi yin te / /

column3: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang le lo dag la bag med pa btags so // /

column3: mi dge ba 'phel ba  dang dge ba 'grib pa'i rgyu nyid do // /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60042#60049#TD4036E.TXT.r_5014;TD4036E.TXT.r_5015# de'i phyir de ni de dag gi rnal 'byor nyams pa re zhig pa yin no // / +de la thob pa la sa yongs su nyams pa'i rnal 'byor nyams pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la thob pa dang  rtogs pa    dang ; /

column3: nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de brjed ngas pa'o // /

column3: btags pa'i yod par bstan pa'i phyir / / +'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug de dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60147#60156#TD4036E.TXT.r_5024# dgon par gnas pa na khyim pa dang  rab tu byung ba drang po dang  drang po'i rang bzhin can dag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos ston pa dang  tshul 'chos pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i lus dang ngag dang ldan pa'i spyod pas  sems mgu bar byed de / /

column3: 'dod chags la sogs pa gang dag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa las    sems phyi rol du khrid pa de dag la / /

column6: 0.019#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2707491#2707495#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11012# yang skye na ni zhes bya ba ni skyes zin pa zhig yang skye bar rtogs na thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur te / /

column3: nyon mongs pa can gyi shes rab la shes bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o // /

column6: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1816621#1816622#TD4054E.TXT.r_1613# gzugs de'i bdag nyid dang  'byung ba rten du gyur pa dang  dga' ba'i kun 'byung dang  phyogs dang bcas pa dang  yul la khyab  pa dang  yul nye bar bstan du rung ba dang  yul spyod yul du gyur pa dang  gnyi spyod yul du mtshungs pa dang  'brel pa dang  rjes su 'brel pa dang  rab tu rtog pa dang  gnod par byed pa dang  go bar byed pa dang  bsags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  phyi rol tu  bltas pa dang  nang du bltas pa dang  yun ring pa dang  dus yongs su chad pa dang  de'i dus dang  nges par ston pa'i phyir yang gzugs can du blta bar bya'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4009E.TXT.r#621847#621849#TD4009E.TXT.r_2812# chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig nas kun du mi 'khor zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams  cad kyi gnyen po shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: shes rab gang gis 'ong ba dang 'gro ba la sogs pa la / / +lus dang ngag dang sems kyi spyod pa mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa can gyi shes rab ces bya ste / /

column11: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1775874#1775876#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11238;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11239# dper na nyi ma shar na 'jig rten rnams la phan pa dang  dro ba dang snang bar byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa'i nyi mas kyang 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba dang  snang bar byed pas na 'jig rten pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la gus pa mang du bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +phyin ci ma log par smra ba DANG ZHES BYA BA LA / /

column21: 5.960#TD4054E.TXT.r#1888174#1888178#TD4054E.TXT.r_7925# tshad med rnams dang  rnam thar rnams dang  zil gyis non gyi skye mched rnams dang  ma lus pa'i skye mched rnams dang  nyon mongs med pa dang  smon nas    shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang  mngon shes rnams dang  mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams dang  yongs su dag pa rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  mi 'jigs pa rnams dang dran pa nye bar gnas dang  bsrung med rnams dang  bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid dang  bag  chags legs par bcom pa dang  thugs rje chen po dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos thun mong ma yin pa bco brgyad dang  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de / /

column14: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#395325#395325#TD4035E.TXT.r_15064;TD4035E.TXT.r_15065# gang la brten na bdag ces bya ba'am / / +sems can nam / /
column15: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#2040994#2040997#TD4047E.TXT.r_223;TD4047E.TXT.r_224# nyan thos kyi gtso bo rnams kyang rung / / +rang sangs rgyas kyi bse ru lta bu yang rung / /
column16: 0.013#TD4050E.TXT.r#2013393#2013393#TD4050E.TXT.r_1499;TD4050E.TXT.r_1500# gzhan yang sems dang sems las byung ba don med pa rnams dmigs pa med par ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du som nyi za bar 'gyur  bas de'i gnyen por smig rgyu ste / / +de la smig rgyu'i gnas lta bu ni sems dang sems las byung ba'o // /
column17: 0.013#TD4095E.TXT.r#157468#157468#TD4095E.TXT.r_4298# mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba de ni mthong ba dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pas myong ba de ni thos pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pas  myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pas myong ba ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do // /
column18: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#2177429#2177429#TD4047E.TXT.r_11212# de ltar na yongs su ma shes  pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pas bsdus pas blos rtogs par byas pas tshul des brjod du med pa yin na yang 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // /
column19: 0.014#TD4069E.TXT.r#1129677#1129677#TD4069E.TXT.r_1017;TD4069E.TXT.r_1018# sgrub pa'i chos kyang de dag gis 'jig rten pa'i lam yin te  nges so // / +nyan pa po rnams la blo du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi skyon ni 'dus pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis yongs su bstan pa yin te / /
column20: 0.014#TD4069E.TXT.r#1141143#1141143#TD4069E.TXT.r_1867# de la rtag tu bag yod pas bsrung bar bya ba nyid ma yin pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i rgyus rig par bya'o / /
column21: 0.014#TD4091E.TXT.r#1319434#1319435#TD4091E.TXT.r_6761# nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gis bsams bzhin du srog gcod par byed pa nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya'o // /
column22: 0.014#TD4095E.TXT.r#126844#126844#TD4095E.TXT.r_1194# sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni pho'i dbang po dang  yid mi bde ba dang  dad pa  la sogs pa gzung ste / /
column23: 0.015#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2963812#2963814#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6243;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6244# skyed par byed pa'i chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir yang rigs pa ma yin te / /
column24: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1789458#1789458#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12302;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12303# mngon shes phyir ni de sbyangs na // / +las su rung ba'i mchog thob pa'o // /
column25: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1805195#1805195#TD4054E.TXT.r_552# lta  ba dang lta ba'i gnas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la 'dzin pa dang  gtso bo dang khyad par du 'phags pa dang  dam par yang dag par rjes su lta ba gang brjod pa dang  'dod pa dang  blo gros dang  rtog pa dang  lta ba dang  lta ba ngan pa la mngon bar zhen pa 'byung ba'i rten gyi las can no //// /
column26: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2705836#2705837#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10917# phung po gzhan dag ni ma yin pa de'i phyir ma rig pa kho na yan lag yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa'i don yin no zhes  bya bar ston to // /
column27: 0.017#TD4051E.TXT.r#2289245#2289245#TD4051E.TXT.r_4450# mdor bsdu na gsum gyis gnas te zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bya na yon tan tshad med pa rnams kyi gnas so // /
column28: 0.019#TD4098E.TXT.r#2515613#2515613#TD4098E.TXT.r_158;TD4098E.TXT.r_159# de las bzlog pa ni yid mi bde ba'i dbang po'o // / +gang lus dang sems kyi sim pa yang  ma yin mi sim pa yang ma yin pa de ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o // /
column29: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2713101#2713102#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11389;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11390# mig la sogs pa gzugs dang ba // / +rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa // /
column30: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#516938#516938#TD4026E.TXT.r_1602# de rnam par dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag med pa mchog gi bdag nyid dag pa 'thob    po ; / /
column31: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#2436626#2436628#TD4037E.TXT.r_4097# 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'  khyim pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa dang  rab tu byung ba'i phyogs su gtogs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi mdo dang rgyas pa zhes bya'o // /
column32: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#603396#603396#TD4009E.TXT.r_1461# rnam pa  gnyis su dbyer med ces bya ba'i bar du lhag ma rnams kyis chos med pa la chos su 'dzin pa bkag go // /
column33: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#2797170#2797170#TD4061E.TXT.r_4226# yang dag par bslang ba nyid kyis dang  dbang du mdzad pa nyid kyis dang  'jug pa nyid kyis dang  rab tu bstan pa nyid kyis dang  rab tu dbye ba nyid kyis dang  rten nyid kyis dang  go bar mdzad pa nyid kyis dang  gdags  pa nyid kyis dang  dus nyid kyis dang  yon tan yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis so // /
column34: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#2767591#2767591#TD4061E.TXT.r_2052# yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column35: 0.026#TD4041E.TXT.r#2304806#2304806#TD4041E.TXT.r_396# bdag nyid gtod pa ni sgrib pa lnga spangs nas sems nang du rab tu gtod pa dang 'das bla na med pa'i grub pa dang bde ba la sems gtod pa yin no // /
column36: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#1029683#1029683#TD4068E.TXT.r_100# khams gsum ni 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang  gzugs med pa'i khams so // /
column37: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1903626#1903626#TD4054E.TXT.r_9218;TD4054E.TXT.r_9219# rnam par dag pas rnam par nges pa gang zhe na / / +bsgom pa'i lam ste / /
column38: 0.027#TD4061E.TXT.r#2765420#2765420#TD4061E.TXT.r_1871# de la ltos pa dang bcas pa ni de'i dgra bor gyur pa dag la zhe sdang skyed pa'i phyir dang  bdag nyid kyi skyon 'chab par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column39: 0.029#TD4065E.TXT.r#777442#777442#TD4065E.TXT.r_89;TD4065E.TXT.r_90# sems dang  yid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so // / +'di ni phan tshun du don 'brel ba med pa ma yin te / /
column40: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#261442#261442#TD4035E.TXT.r_2595;TD4035E.TXT.r_2596# gzhan  yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni / / +phyis 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor thob par byed pa ma yin la / /
column41: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1393869#1393869#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_605;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_606# dam pa'i sgra ni mchog gi rnam grangs so // / +don gyi sgra ni shes bya'i rnam grangs so // /
column42: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2971064#2971064#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6840# 'phang du dpag tshad sum brgya phyed dang bcu gsum yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du phyed phyed    kyis dbri bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: ste gnyid ces bya'o // / +de nyid la bshad pa gzhan bya ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60506#60519#TD4036E.TXT.r_5047;TD4036E.TXT.r_5048# gzhi de dag mi dga' bar 'gyur zhing mi dga' ba'i tshig gis bdag la bskul  bar 'gyur zhing rtsod pa skyed par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#1346895#1346898#TD4091E.TXT.r_9273;TD4091E.TXT.r_9274# de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +grangs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad par go rims grub bo // /
column6: 0.006#TD4091E.TXT.r#1319434#1319435#TD4091E.TXT.r_6761# nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gis bsams bzhin du srog gcod par byed pa nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya'o // /
column7: 0.007#TD4095E.TXT.r#148503#148506#TD4095E.TXT.r_3424;TD4095E.TXT.r_3425# lus kyi 'byung ba chen po da ltar byung ba rnams ni rten du 'gyur te / / +'khor lo sa la 'dril ba lag pas 'phul ba dang  sa'i phyogs bzhin no // /
column8: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3087960#3087962#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_236# gzugs gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba dang  ji srid du tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba la rjes su  chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba 'di ni zag pa med pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.012#TD4035E.TXT.r#268627#268628#TD4035E.TXT.r_3284;TD4035E.TXT.r_3285# gal     // / +te med du zin na ni sgrib pa'i rgyu med pa zhig gis bsgribs so zhes bya bar yang mi rung ngo // /
column10: 0.013#TD4095E.TXT.r#158490#158490#TD4095E.TXT.r_4384# gsum dang ni yang  dag pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa na'o // /
column11: 0.014#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11082# au ta gong na yod pa'i ba da ni 'byung ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni skad  kyi dbyings bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#2040994#2040997#TD4047E.TXT.r_223;TD4047E.TXT.r_224# nyan thos kyi gtso bo rnams kyang rung / / +rang sangs rgyas kyi bse ru lta bu yang rung / /
column13: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1657376#1657376#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2433# so so'i skye bo'i dus nas brtsams nas te mos pas spyod pa'i sa chos mchog man chad kyi dus na bskyed pa ni sa dang mtshungs par shes par bya ste / /
column14: 0.014#TD4037E.TXT.r#2454415#2454415#TD4037E.TXT.r_5346# thos pa dang bsam pa'i mthar thug pa des chos dang don de la dus gzhan na yongs su smin par byas pa'i dad  pa thob pa yang yin te / /
column15: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1667115#1667115#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3140# yang na dang po nyid du gtsug gi lus su gzhag pa ni rigs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes glengs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa gang zhe na / /
column16: 0.015#TD4003E.TXT.r#776138#776139#TD4003E.TXT.r_186;TD4003E.TXT.r_187# sangs rgyas mtshan ni ye shes te // / +lta ba'i nyes pa rnam spangs pa // /
column17: 0.015#TD4095E.TXT.r#157468#157468#TD4095E.TXT.r_4298# mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba de ni mthong ba dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pas myong ba de ni thos pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pas  myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pas myong ba ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do // /
column18: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#45877#45877#TD4036E.TXT.r_3799;TD4036E.TXT.r_3800# de la ji ltar na rjes su  mthun pa'i dmigs pa la sems nye bar gtod par byed pa yin zhe na / / +nam gru gal te dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa de 'dod chags spyad pa kho na zhig yin na ni / /
column19: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#1129677#1129677#TD4069E.TXT.r_1017;TD4069E.TXT.r_1018# sgrub pa'i chos kyang de dag gis 'jig rten pa'i lam yin te  nges so // / +nyan pa po rnams la blo du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi skyon ni 'dus pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis yongs su bstan pa yin te / /
column20: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#2467586#2467586#TD4037E.TXT.r_6416# de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o // /
column21: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#1229560#1229560#TD4083E.TXT.r_51;TD4083E.TXT.r_52# ci nus zhes bya ba ni 'byor pa dang rjes su mthun pas so // / +mchod nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrims gang de blang bar bya zhes bya bar sbyor ro // /
column22: 0.017#TD4061E.TXT.r#2767557#2767561#TD4061E.TXT.r_2049;TD4061E.TXT.r_2050# tshul khrims de'i rgyus mi thub dang  de'i gnyen po la brten pa ste / / +tshig gsum  dag gis dang lhag ma rnams kyis ni re re dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /

column3: lus 'dzin mi nus pa'i sems kyi 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60520#60529#TD4036E.TXT.r_5048# de ltar na bdag la rgyal po dang  blon po chen po dang  phyug po dang  tshong dpon dang  ded dpon gyi bar dag gis bsnyen bkur byas par mi 'gyur / /

column3: sems kyi 'jug pa gang gis lus 'dzin pa de rang dbang med par gang las 'gyur ba de nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60530#60542#TD4036E.TXT.r_5048;TD4036E.TXT.r_5049# de ltar na bdag la rgyal po dang  blon po chen po dang  phyug po dang  tshong dpon dang  ded dpon gyi bar dag gis bsnyen bkur byas par mi 'gyur / / +bla mar byas par mi 'gyur zhing chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal  cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad dag kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60565#60571#TD4036E.TXT.r_5050;TD4036E.TXT.r_5049;TD4036E.TXT.r_5051# de rnyed ba dang bkur sti 'dod pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas / /

column3: sdud pa  bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems sdud pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60543#60556#TD4036E.TXT.r_5049# bla mar byas par mi 'gyur zhing chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal  cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad dag kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#28087#28088#TD4036E.TXT.r_2280;TD4036E.TXT.r_2281# de la zos pa ni gang / /

column3: gang gi tshe mig la sogs pa dbang po'i sgo nas rnam par shes pa rnams mi 'byung ba de dag ni sdud pa'o // /
column4: 0.008#TD4036E.TXT.r#60538#60541#TD4036E.TXT.r_5049# bla mar byas par mi 'gyur zhing chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal  cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad dag kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'i phyir te / /

column3: 'jug pa rang dbang med pa smos pas ni ting nge 'dzin las dbye ba ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60568#60582#TD4036E.TXT.r_5050;TD4036E.TXT.r_5051;TD4036E.TXT.r_5052# de rnyed ba dang bkur sti 'dod pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas / /

column3: sdud pa smos pas ni  rmugs pa las dbye ba ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60580#60592#TD4036E.TXT.r_5051;TD4036E.TXT.r_5052;TD4036E.TXT.r_5053# chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes bzhin du / / +'du shes dang  'dod pa bsgyur nas  chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgo nas ston cing yang dag par ston par byed do // /

column3: btags pa'i yod pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +de ni gti mug gi cha la gdags pas gti mug gi char gtogs pa zhes bya ba smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60593#60609#TD4036E.TXT.r_5052;TD4036E.TXT.r_5053# 'du shes dang  'dod pa bsgyur nas  chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgo nas ston cing yang dag par ston par byed do // / +de la de'i lta ba dang mthun par sgrub par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa la chos su 'dus shes pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60610#60629#TD4036E.TXT.r_5053;TD4036E.TXT.r_5054;TD4036E.TXT.r_5055# de la de'i lta ba dang mthun par sgrub par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa la chos su 'dus shes pa yin te / /

column3: don de ni brda phrad par zad do // /
las bstan pa'i phyir / / +bya ba shor ba'i rten byed pa'i las can no zhes bya ba smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60629#60642#TD4036E.TXT.r_5054;TD4036E.TXT.r_5055# de dag ni dman pa dang rmongs pa yin pa'i phyir chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes pa    yin bas / / +ji ltar gtams pa bzhin sgrub par byed na yang log par sgrub pa kho na yin par rig par bya ste / /

column3: nyal ba ni bya ba nyams par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60640#60647#TD4036E.TXT.r_5055;TD4036E.TXT.r_5056# ji ltar gtams pa bzhin sgrub par byed na yang log par sgrub pa kho na yin par rig par bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60789#60791#TD4036E.TXT.r_5069;TD4036E.TXT.r_5068# yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'dun pa'i ni 'di ltar 'di nal la ma thos pa mnyan par bya ba dang  thos pa yongs su  byang bar bya ba'i phyir kun dga'i ra bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnal 'byor shes pa rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#57453#57456#TD4036E.TXT.r_4799# mnyan pa dang  rnal 'byor dang yid la byed pa la gus pa skyed par byed do // /

column3: rtog pa gang yin snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60648#60655#TD4036E.TXT.r_5055;TD4036E.TXT.r_5056# ji ltar gtams pa bzhin sgrub par byed na yang log par sgrub pa kho na yin par rig par bya ste / / +log par sgrub pas byas pa'i rnal 'byor nyams pa de lta bu de ni dam pa'i chos nub par bya ba'i phyir / /

column3: rtog pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60656#60671#TD4036E.TXT.r_5056;TD4036E.TXT.r_5057;TD4036E.TXT.r_5058# log par sgrub pas byas pa'i rnal 'byor nyams pa de lta bu de ni dam pa'i chos nub par bya ba'i phyir / /

column3: 'di ci yin te ltar rtog pa'i rnam par zhugs pa shes rab dang sems pa'i bye brag gi bdag nyid kyi brjod pa gang yin pa de rtog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60672#60687#TD4036E.TXT.r_5057;TD4036E.TXT.r_5058;TD4036E.TXT.r_5059# dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa yin gyi dam pa'i chos ni ma yin no // / +de ltar na rnal 'byor nyams pa bzhi po de dag ni dge slong bsam gtan pa rnal 'byor spyod pas yongs su shes par bya ba dang  yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no // /
column5: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2969098#2969098#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6666;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6667# 'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la // / +'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho  ba nyid yin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2474525#2474525#TD4037E.TXT.r_6981# phyi ma la yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi le'u las sngar bstan pa'i smon lam chen po bcu PO GANG YIN PA DE DAG bsam pa dag pa la brten nas rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa 'di la mngon par 'grub par byed do //// /

column3: yid kyi brjod pa bstan pa'i  phyir ; / +yid la brjod pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60687#60706#TD4036E.TXT.r_5058;TD4036E.TXT.r_5059;TD4036E.TXT.r_5060;TD4036E.TXT.r_5061;TD4036E.TXT.r_5062;TD4036E.TXT.r_5063# de ltar na rnal 'byor nyams pa bzhi po de dag ni dge slong bsam gtan pa rnal 'byor spyod pas yongs su shes par bya ba dang  yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no // / +de la rnal 'byor rnams gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3091884#3091884#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_543# rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang lus dang  yid  'jig cing rab tu 'jig pa dang  gang gi tshe chos dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de'i tshe yang     // /
column6: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2969096#2969097#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6666;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6667# 'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la // / +'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho  ba nyid yin no // /

column5: 0.021#TD4068E.TXT.r#1068365#1068366#TD4068E.TXT.r_2853# gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa so so'i rang bzhin yin pa dang  gzugs la sogs pa'i yul yang ser po dang  dkar po la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin yin la / /

column3: brjod pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60707#60714#TD4036E.TXT.r_5061;TD4036E.TXT.r_5062;TD4036E.TXT.r_5063# rnal 'byor ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +'di lta ste / / +dad pa dang  'dun  pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  thabs so // /

column3: brjod pa ni don bstan pa'o zhes bya ba smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60715#60724#TD4036E.TXT.r_5063;TD4036E.TXT.r_5064# dad pa dang  'dun  pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  thabs so // /

column3: sems kyi don brjod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60723#60734#TD4036E.TXT.r_5064;TD4036E.TXT.r_5065# de la dad pa ni rnam pa gnyis dang  gzhi rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: sems pa la sogs pa ji ltar 'di'i ngo bo nyid yin  snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60733#60745#TD4036E.TXT.r_5065# mngon par yid ches pa'i rnam pa dang  rab tu dang ba'i rnam pa dang  chos dang rigs pa rnam par dpyod pa'i gzhi dang  gang zag gi mthu la mos ba'i gzhi'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4065E.TXT.r#789378#789378#TD4065E.TXT.r_956# ji tsam du sgra'i rang bzhin dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos thos pa med pa de tsam du de dang mthun par sgrub cing byed mi nus so zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#2776017#2776017#TD4061E.TXT.r_2664# 'di ni de'i mtshams sbyar ba yin no // /

column3: sems pa dang shes rab kyi bye brag ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60744#60756#TD4036E.TXT.r_5065;TD4036E.TXT.r_5066# mngon par yid ches pa'i rnam pa dang  rab tu dang ba'i rnam pa dang  chos dang rigs pa rnam par dpyod pa'i gzhi dang  gang zag gi mthu la mos ba'i gzhi'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#2087818#2087818#TD4047E.TXT.r_4137# de ltar yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i bar dang ldan na mi dge ba'i chos  rnams ni spong bar byed / /
column6: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#2776051#2776051#TD4061E.TXT.r_2666# su zhig yid ches par 'gyur zhes gsungs nas spyan legs kyi skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa ni bdag nyid la dad pa nyid du 'gyur bar yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'di ltar sems pa ni sems kun tu gyo bar byed pa'i ngo bo yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60757#60770#TD4036E.TXT.r_5066;TD4036E.TXT.r_5067;TD4036E.TXT.r_5068# 'dun pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: shes rab ni yon tan dang nyes pa la rtog pa'i rnam par zhugs pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60769#60789#TD4036E.TXT.r_5068;TD4036E.TXT.r_5069# 'thob pa'i phyir 'dun pa ni 'di ltar 'di nal la rnam par thar pa gong ma la dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o zhes rgyas par sngar bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de gnyis kyi dbang gis sems 'jug pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60831#60838#TD4036E.TXT.r_5070# tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir 'dun pa ni 'di ltar 'di nal la tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zas kyi  tshod rig pa nyid dang  mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa dang  shes bzhin du spyod pa nyid la gong nas gong du dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#57469#57470#TD4036E.TXT.r_4800# de la kun du brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni sems kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su btsal nas so // /

column3: de'i phyir  bar 'ga' ni sems dang sems pa gnyis la rtog pa zhes gdags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60792#60799#TD4036E.TXT.r_5069# yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'dun pa'i ni 'di ltar 'di nal la ma thos pa mnyan par bya ba dang  thos pa yongs su  byang bar bya ba'i phyir kun dga'i ra bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnal 'byor shes pa rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60800#60807#TD4036E.TXT.r_5069# yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'dun pa'i ni 'di ltar 'di nal la ma thos pa mnyan par bya ba dang  thos pa yongs su  byang bar bya ba'i phyir kun dga'i ra bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnal 'byor shes pa rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o // /

column3: gang gi tshe ci yang mngon par mi rtogs pa'o // / +bar 'ga' ni shes rab dang sems gnyis la gdags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60806#60830#TD4036E.TXT.r_5069;TD4036E.TXT.r_5070# yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'dun pa'i ni 'di ltar 'di nal la ma thos pa mnyan par bya ba dang  thos pa yongs su  byang bar bya ba'i phyir kun dga'i ra bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnal 'byor shes pa rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4005E.TXT.r#991381#991382#TD4005E.TXT.r_310;TD4005E.TXT.r_311# sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i gyul ngo  bzlog pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#1161058#1161058#TD4069E.TXT.r_3399;TD4069E.TXT.r_3400# sogs pa'i sgras ni rigs pa dang  rus dang  na tshod dang  byad gzugs dang  thos pa la sogs pa bsdus so // / +chos dang chos smra ba  la zhes bya ba rgyas par bstan pa gang yin pa de'i rnam par bshad pa ni / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#962166#962166#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11002;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11003# kun brtags la sogs pa ni chos thams  cad kyi dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid yin pas mdor bsdu na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum la thams cad ces bya ste / / +'di ni bdag po'i dbang du mdzad nas rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column8: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1469446#1469446#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7123;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7124# nga'i dgra la don byas pa dang  byed pa dang  byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan gsum mo // / +gzugs med gtogs zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / /

column3: gang gi tshe mngon par rtogs pa'o // / +'di nyid la bshad pa gzhan bya ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60865#60873#TD4036E.TXT.r_5071;TD4036E.TXT.r_5072;TD4036E.TXT.r_5073# rjes su brtson pa'i phyir 'dun pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la rtag tu sbyor ba dang  gus par byas te sbyor ba dang  lam bsgom pa la dga' ba skyed  par byed cing / /

column3: yang na sems pa dang shes    rab gnyis kho na la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / /

column5: 0.012#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1401406#1401407#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1278# 'di ni de dag kho na'i ming gzhan yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column6: 0.012#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1595022#1595022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17477# chos rnams bstan pa de lta bu yang zhes bya ba rgyas  par 'byung ste / /
column7: 0.013#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1523471#1523471#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11671# mtshan nyid pa rnams kyi sems can du ston pa dang  sems can du ston pa ma yin pa dang  thob pa rnams dang  mtshan nyid pa rnams kyi khams gsum pa nyid dang  mi ldan pa nyid dang  dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa nyid dang  mi ldan pa'i khams gsum pa nyid dang  lung du ma bstan pa nyid dang  snyoms par 'jug bdag gi dge ba nyid dang  gzugs su gtogs pa nyid dang  gzugs med par gtogs pa nyid do // /
column8: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3085865#3085865#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_73;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_74# bcom pas bcom ldan zhes brjod do //// / +zhes bshad pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya / /
column9: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#2433684#2433684#TD4037E.TXT.r_3856# sman tsha ba bsten pa bzhin du mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#894382#894384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5982# gzugs la sogs par ming du btags ba'i dngos po de nyid la bdag dang  sems can dang  khyim dang  dmag dang  nags la sogs par 'dzin pa'o // /
column11: 0.018#TD4095E.TXT.r#135715#135719#TD4095E.TXT.r_2106;TD4095E.TXT.r_2107# bzhi pas ni brgyad pa yin // /
column12: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#904070#904073#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6689# de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ci dngos po lnga po de dag gis thams cad gsungs pa yin nam / /
column13: 0.018#TD4051E.TXT.r#2286247#2286247#TD4051E.TXT.r_4209# 'di gcig pu dbul ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba ni bla'i / /
column14: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2911643#2911644#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1984;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1985# yid bde ba la rnam par smin pa'i go skabs yod ji srid du zin  kyang ; / +yid mi bde ba ni rnam pa thams cad du yang kun du mi 'byung bas yid mi bde ba la rnam par smin pa med ces zer ro // /
column15: 0.019#TD4086E.TXT.r#2348368#2348368#TD4086E.TXT.r_1911# dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes  pa gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa / /
column16: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2611182#2611182#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4939# 'jigs par mi lta ba'i ngo bo ni 'jigs par mi lta ba nyid do zhes bya bar bshad na ni ma rig pa yin par shes par 'gyur te ma rig pa dang ldan pas 'jigs par lta  bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column17: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#321284#321284#TD4035E.TXT.r_8348# sngar zhi gnas la yongs su byang bar byas pa'i 'og tu lhag mthong dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa de gnyis bsgoms na shes bya yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar  'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#1155287#1155287#TD4069E.TXT.r_2963;TD4069E.TXT.r_2964# rab tu byung ba dang  rtogs pa brgyud pa gnyis kyis so // / +skye bo mang po la phan pa ni skye bo mang po la brten pas so // /
column19: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#2412385#2412385#TD4037E.TXT.r_2232# mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu ni ji skad bstan pa'i chos 'di dag nyid med pa dang bral ba nyid do // /
column20: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#1136733#1136734#TD4069E.TXT.r_1542# sngar ji skad bshad pa lta bu ni dgos pa dag ni brgyad de / /
column21: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#391377#391377#TD4035E.TXT.r_14774;TD4035E.TXT.r_14775# thabs yongs su bzung ba ste / / +thabs yongs su bzung ba de la brten nas / /
column22: 0.021#TD4027E.TXT.r#1006014#1006019#TD4027E.TXT.r_1217# ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni chos la sgra ji bzhin du rmongs pa dang bral bas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i chos la longs spyod pa myong ba dang  sems can rnams kyang yongs su  smin par byed do // /
column23: 0.021#TD4051E.TXT.r#2294154#2294157#TD4051E.TXT.r_4864# stobs la sogs  pa thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa dag dang ldan pa'i phyir yon tan dang 'brel pa yin no // /
column24: 0.021#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2919785#2919785#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2678;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2679# rang gi chos la chags pa yi // / +sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o // /
column25: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#2349657#2349658#TD4086E.TXT.r_1999# 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni sa'i khams dang  chu'i  khams dang  me'i khams dang  rlung gi khams dang  sems can sa la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod / /
column26: 0.022#TD4033E.TXT.r#2505633#2505633#TD4033E.TXT.r_595# byams pa de la rnam par byang ba'i don ni kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum po de dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column27: 0.022#TD4051E.TXT.r#2246652#2246653#TD4051E.TXT.r_958# yid bar mdo'i srid pa na GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA NI shi ba dang skye ba'i srid pa gnyis kyi bar gyi  srid pa la gnas pa'i sems so // /
column28: 0.023#TD4050E.TXT.r#2036030#2036030#TD4050E.TXT.r_3351;TD4050E.TXT.r_3352# yang ma nges pa rnams kyi don ni go sla'o // / +chos dang bdag med grol  mthun phyir // /
column29: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#388336#388337#TD4035E.TXT.r_14568;TD4035E.TXT.r_14569# 'du shes thams cad bsgom pa la zhugs pa la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba la 'dun pa  dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun du spyod pa dang du mi len cing spong ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir de'i gnyen po la shas cher gnas pa ste / / +chos gsum po 'di dag ni gnyen po bsgom pa thams cad dang mthun pa'i phyir gces spras byed pa zhes bya  ste / /
column30: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#266687#266687#TD4035E.TXT.r_3112;TD4035E.TXT.r_3113# las ni ci zhig byed cing 'jug ce na / / +de la sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni gcig tu nges par zhum pa'i rnam pa dang  mi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg    pa dang  sdug bsngal gyis bskyod pa dang  yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa dang  sdug bsngal las thar bar 'dod pa dang  sems kun nas 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go // /
column31: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#288150#288155#TD4035E.TXT.r_5121# byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa las langs ba la kha zas 'bul zhing bya ba byed pa dang  byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ji lta ba bzhin du snying rje dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang   rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa las langs pa la kha zas 'bul zhing bya ba byed pa dang  de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bya ba byed pa dang  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin du slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge 'dun la yang de dang  'dra'o // /
column32: 0.023#TD4004E.TXT.r#199266#199266#TD4004E.TXT.r_213# de'i 'og mas ni rnam par rtog pa dang bstun no // /
column33: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#2063176#2063178#TD4047E.TXT.r_2084# de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la chod gos la sogs pa na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams rab tu 'bul ba dang  nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa dang  sdud pa'i las ni sangs rgyas  dkon mchog la zang zing gi mchod pa'o // /
column34: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#1144352#1144352#TD4069E.TXT.r_2124# yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column35: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1399747#1399747#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1139# byed pa'i khyad par 'dus pa don med do zhe na / /
column36: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#1139136#1139136#TD4069E.TXT.r_1725;TD4069E.TXT.r_1726# mi shes pa dang the tshom dang ldan pa'i phyir ma yin zhe na / / +tshul bzhin ma yin pa la mkhas pa ni mi mkhas pa ste / /
column37: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#242105#242105#TD4035E.TXT.r_897# ri rab dang sa  chen po de ni gzugs ches sra ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor drug pa nyid dang  bdun pas sreg par byed de / /
column38: 0.026#TD4087E.TXT.r#2866526#2866526#TD4087E.TXT.r_3641# de dag gis chu'i khams de gcig tu bsdus la sa'i khams kyis kyang sra bar byas nas kha ba 'am / /
column39: 0.026#TD4091E.TXT.r#1250243#1250243#TD4091E.TXT.r_235;TD4091E.TXT.r_236# 'byung ba chen po dag bshad zin to // / +gang dag  gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin smras pa de dag nyid // /
column40: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#1234216#1234216#TD4083E.TXT.r_352# rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims ni thams  cad bkrus pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro // /
column41: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2480049#2480050#TD4037E.TXT.r_7283;TD4037E.TXT.r_7284# lus dang ngag dang  yid kyi las tshad med par 'jug go // / +de las gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas ma bsngags pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no // /

column3: yang na sems pa dang shes rab gnyis kho na la rtog pa gdags par bya'i / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#60857#60865#TD4036E.TXT.r_5071# rjes su brtson pa'i phyir 'dun pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la rtag tu sbyor ba dang  gus par byas te sbyor ba dang  lam bsgom pa la dga' ba skyed  par byed cing / /
column5: 0.024#TD4067E.TXT.r#1990541#1990541#TD4067E.TXT.r_1486;TD4067E.TXT.r_1487# lung gi bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mngon pa'i mdo las tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa / / +thog ma med pa'i dus kyi dbyings // /
column6: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#1262105#1262105#TD4091E.TXT.r_1361# de dag dang ldan pa ni re re zhing yang brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur te / /

column3: sems la ni ma yin te / /
'di ltar shes rab dang sems pa'i dbang gis sems de ltar mngon par rtogs pa dang  mngon par mi rtogs pa'i rnam par 'jug  par 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1708527#1708529#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6334;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6335# 'jig rten gyi khams    ni lan cig tu rnam pa sna tshogs shes par 'gyur bde bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang shes par bya ba thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs shes par byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1713103#1713106#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6673# sa dang po nas sa bdun man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa ni brtan par zhugs  pa'i mos pa zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1713191#1713194#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6678;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6679# tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis mos pa'i mtshan nyid dang rab tu dbye ba bstan nas tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis mos pa phye ste bshad pa de dag gis bgegs dang bar du gcod pa ston to zhes bya ba'i don to // / +yid la mi byed pa mang po dang zhes bya ba la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1736701#1736704#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8368;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8369# de gsum yang sems can la phan gdags par  bya ba'i phyir / / +sangs rgyas kyis bshad de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column25: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1888132#1888133#TD4054E.TXT.r_7921;TD4054E.TXT.r_7922# yon tan khyad par can rnams ni / / +'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyis bsgom pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam mngon par bsgrub ste / /
column26: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1888176#1888177#TD4054E.TXT.r_7925# tshad med rnams dang  rnam thar rnams dang  zil gyis non gyi skye mched rnams dang  ma lus pa'i skye mched rnams dang  nyon mongs med pa dang  smon nas    shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang  mngon shes rnams dang  mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams dang  yongs su dag pa rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  mi 'jigs pa rnams dang dran pa nye bar gnas dang  bsrung med rnams dang  bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid dang  bag  chags legs par bcom pa dang  thugs rje chen po dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos thun mong ma yin pa bco brgyad dang  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de / /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#61177#61184#TD4036E.TXT.r_5096# de la dad pas ni 'thob par bya ba'i don la mngon par yid ches par byed pa dang  'thob pa la mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la byed 'dod  ba skyed bar byed ba dang  de de ltar byed 'dod pas nyin mtshan du brtson par gnas shing spro ba dang ldan pa dang  pha rol gnon pa brtan par byed pa dang  brtson 'grus de yang thabs kyis yongs su zin na ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang  ma rtogs par bya ba dang  mngon    sum du ma byas ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ba'i de'i phyir chos bzhi po de dag ni rnal 'byor zhes bya'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#61135#61149#TD4036E.TXT.r_5095;TD4036E.TXT.r_5096# rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi bo de la yang rnam pa bcu drug yod do // / +de la dad pas ni 'thob par bya ba'i don la mngon par yid ches par byed pa dang  'thob pa la mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la byed 'dod  ba skyed bar byed ba dang  de de ltar byed 'dod pas nyin mtshan du brtson par gnas shing spro ba dang ldan pa dang  pha rol gnon pa brtan par byed pa dang  brtson 'grus de yang thabs kyis yongs su zin na ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang  ma rtogs par bya ba dang  mngon    sum du ma byas ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ba'i de'i phyir chos bzhi po de dag ni rnal 'byor zhes bya'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#879202#879204#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4782# byang chub  sems dpa' lnga brgya po la sogs pa de dag bskal pa 'di chags pa dang  'jig pa yod kyang lha'i gnas der skyes pa dag ni nams kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skye bar mi 'gyur te / /

column8: 1.192#TD4054E.TXT.r#1900531#1900535#TD4054E.TXT.r_8962;TD4054E.TXT.r_8963# phung po tsam la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / / +rnam par byad bar zad kyi bdag ni med do zhes rab tu bstan to // /
column9: 1.192#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2614845#2614845#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5155# yang zhes bya ba'i sgra smos pa ni de lta bu dang mthun pa'i ldan pa ma yin pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
